job_text: ['', 'A self-starter attitude, creative problem solving skills, and experience with diverse data processes and systems', 'Gather requirements (and of course, refine and clarify ambiguous requirements)', 'Analyze and present results through dashboards, web apps and static documentation', "Enterprising – and not defined by conventional roles. Our goal is to innovate, redefine, and break boundaries in expanding our modern data business. In Global Data's Technical Operations, our focus is on data engineering and how data is acquired, processed, validated and stored. We're constantly innovating to create better, more efficient systems to handle the huge variety of data we acquire and deliver to our clients.", 'Communicate consistently with project stakeholders throughout development lifecycle', 'Full spectrum of project management skills: ideation, prioritization, communication, delivery', 'Excellent communication skills, especially when explaining technical processes and solutions to business stakeholders and management', 'Identify opportunities and build flexible automated solutions for data acquisition, ETL and ML pipelines, and human-in-the-loop data processing', "Your projects will involve designing and implementing ETL systems, deploying machine learning and NLP algorithms, and calibrating automated quality control processes. You'll be expected to be able to work independently and to manage your own priorities, while also collaborating with other team members and colleagues across various businesses. We're looking for someone who embraces the challenge of understanding the business problems that your code is solving, so you don't just develop: you have a vision, you design, you simplify, you visualize, and you effectively communicate the business impact of your work.", 'A BA/BS degree or higher in Computer Science, Mathematics, or relevant data technology field, and up to 5 years of professional work experience in software development, data engineering, data science or information technologyA self-starter attitude, creative problem solving skills, and experience with diverse data processes and systemsApplied Python development experience (additional knowledge of C++ and JavaScript is a plus)Familiarity with git, unix, python ecosystem, web services, and API usageExperience with SQL & NoSQL database systems as well as distributed big data technologies including Hadoop and SparkExperience with data science and data visualization technologies for detecting anomalies, measuring and reporting on Machine Learning systems, and telemetry systems like SplunkFull spectrum of project management skills: ideation, prioritization, communication, deliveryExcellent communication skills, especially when explaining technical processes and solutions to business stakeholders and managementLegal authorization to work full-time in the United States and will not require visa sponsorship', "We're looking for a Data Engineer to join our Data Engineering team in Princeton. You'll be joining a small dynamic team responsible for using and developing cutting-edge technologies to enhance our acquisition, data processing workflows and automation methods. You will design and develop systems that improve internal processes and produce unique client-facing content. You'll work closely with data analysts, data scientists and infrastructure engineers to solve ambiguous and multi-faceted problems and lead the development of robust data systems from scoping to production.", 'A BA/BS degree or higher in Computer Science, Mathematics, or relevant data technology field, and up to 5 years of professional work experience in software development, data engineering, data science or information technology', 'Familiarity with git, unix, python ecosystem, web services, and API usage', 'Experience with data science and data visualization technologies for detecting anomalies, measuring and reporting on Machine Learning systems, and telemetry systems like Splunk', 'Promote the use of software development best practices and DevOps by participating in technical discussions, knowledge sharing sessions, and engaging with the open source software community', 'Legal authorization to work full-time in the United States and will not require visa sponsorship', 'Monitor, maintain and troubleshoot issues for the production systems you are responsible for', 'Experience with SQL & NoSQL database systems as well as distributed big data technologies including Hadoop and Spark', "At Bloomberg, our products are fueled by powerful information. We combine data and context to paint the whole picture for our clients, around the clock – from around the world. In Global Data, we're responsible for delivering this data, news and analytics through innovative technology - quickly and accurately.", "Design, develop, and deploy data processing pipelines written in Python to power Bloomberg's product offeringsIdentify opportunities and build flexible automated solutions for data acquisition, ETL and ML pipelines, and human-in-the-loop data processingPromote the use of software development best practices and DevOps by participating in technical discussions, knowledge sharing sessions, and engaging with the open source software communityGather requirements (and of course, refine and clarify ambiguous requirements)Communicate consistently with project stakeholders throughout development lifecycleCollaborate with data analysts, data scientists and infrastructure engineers to develop creative solutionsMonitor, maintain and troubleshoot issues for the production systems you are responsible forAnalyze and present results through dashboards, web apps and static documentation", 'Collaborate with data analysts, data scientists and infrastructure engineers to develop creative solutions', 'Applied Python development experience (additional knowledge of C++ and JavaScript is a plus)', "Design, develop, and deploy data processing pipelines written in Python to power Bloomberg's product offerings", 'We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.']

['', 'Job Overview', 'The Data Engineer will be responsible for the technical operation of the Opportunity Insights Economic Tracker. This person will report to the Principal Investigators, and work closely with the research team, web developers, and other OI staff to support the ongoing operation, continued expansion, and both internal and external usage of the OI Economic Tracker.', '3+ years of work experience in a data engineering or data science roleSignificant experience creating and managing applications with cloud infrastructure, version control, and data automation/pipelinesExperience processing large amounts of structured data, including integrating data from multiple sources.Ability to implement reliable ETL (extract, transform, load) processes drawing from APIs, public websites, and server-based data transfers.Ability to independently manage complex systems handling multi-terabyte databases.Knowledge of best practices for managing multi-terabyte datasets, including creating systems for ongoing access and analysis by team members.', 'Location', 'With oversight from the research team, work with the web developers to troubleshoot and solve errors in data aggregation or visualizations on the Economic Tracker that may connect back to source code, data synchronization, or other issue areas.', '\xa0', 'We are an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation, pregnancy and pregnancy-related conditions or any other characteristic protected by law.', 'NPR', 'Commitment to task ownership and ability to operate under deadlines', 'Qualifications', 'Enthusiasm for using data science to improve research and policymaking', 'As time permits, support data processes for other research projects at Opportunity Insights', 'New York Times', 'This is a twelve-month contract position, with an ASAP start date. Health, dental, and vision benefits are available, as well as an optional 401k.', 'Interest in learning new skills and applying existing skills in new settings', 'In response to the COVID-19 crisis, our team has developed the real-time Opportunity Insights Economic Tracker which combines anonymized data from leading private companies to provide a rapid picture of indicators such as employment rates, consumer spending, and job postings across counties, industries, and income groups. Results from this project are being actively used by the media and policymakers to address the effects of COVID-19, and have appeared in the New York Times, Vox, NPR, Reuters, and other media outlets.', 'Reuters', 'Attention to detail and commitment to error-free workCommitment to task ownership and ability to operate under deadlinesInterest in learning new skills and applying existing skills in new settingsCommitment to data privacy and data securityEffective communication with Principal Investigators and other OI staffInterest in applying data engineering and data science for social goodEnthusiasm for using data science to improve research and policymakingAbility to perform data analysis and data visualization', 'Must have legal ability to work in the United States and a Social Security Number', 'Vox', 'Our ideal candidate has the following experience:', 'Design, implement and maintain systems to sync data extracts from partner agencies with Opportunity Insights Economic Tracker.\xa0These activities will pertain to processes to sync new data series (in collaboration with Principal Investigators and research team, developers, and program manager) as well as processes to regularly update existing series with real-time (weekly or more frequent) data extracts.', 'As needed, support Principal Investigators and project team in meetings and communication pertaining to data leads and acquisition.', 'Design, implement and maintain systems to sync data extracts from partner agencies with Opportunity Insights Economic Tracker.\xa0These activities will pertain to processes to sync new data series (in collaboration with Principal Investigators and research team, developers, and program manager) as well as processes to regularly update existing series with real-time (weekly or more frequent) data extracts.Respond to technical issues that may arise in data inflows to and outflows from the OI Economic Tracker.Version control inbound data and outbound data, ensuring that internal and external analyses remain replicable as data is revised.With oversight from the research team, work with the web developers to troubleshoot and solve errors in data aggregation or visualizations on the Economic Tracker that may connect back to source code, data synchronization, or other issue areas.Design and maintain robust server management capacities for the OI Economic Tracker that reflects a structure that is aligned with best practices, maximizes efficiency and has the flexibility to add in expanded data over the long term.Implement data automation processes for the OI Economic Tracker, including development and oversight of quality control and validation checks.Develop documentation for data processing and management activities.As needed, support Principal Investigators and project team in meetings and communication pertaining to data leads and acquisition.As time permits, support data processes for other research projects at Opportunity Insights', 'Interest in applying data engineering and data science for social good', 'Ability to independently manage complex systems handling multi-terabyte databases.', 'Significant experience creating and managing applications with cloud infrastructure, version control, and data automation/pipelines', 'Ability to implement reliable ETL (extract, transform, load) processes drawing from APIs, public websites, and server-based data transfers.', 'Implement data automation processes for the OI Economic Tracker, including development and oversight of quality control and validation checks.', '3+ years of work experience in a data engineering or data science role', 'Experience processing large amounts of structured data, including integrating data from multiple sources.', 'Ability to perform data analysis and data visualization', 'Interested candidates must submit a resume/CV and cover letter to mstepner@opportunityinsights.org with the subject line “Data Engineer Application” to be considered. In your cover letter, please include information about relevant work experience and your interest in this role.', 'Commitment to data privacy and data security', 'Attention to detail and commitment to error-free work', 'Option to work remotelyOption to work in Cambridge, MA once Opportunity Insights office re-opensMust have legal ability to work in the United States and a Social Security Number', 'Respond to technical issues that may arise in data inflows to and outflows from the OI Economic Tracker.', 'Effective communication with Principal Investigators and other OI staff', 'Design and maintain robust server management capacities for the OI Economic Tracker that reflects a structure that is aligned with best practices, maximizes efficiency and has the flexibility to add in expanded data over the long term.', 'As an organization focused on economic mobility, we value having a diverse staff and particularly encourage applications from groups traditionally under-represented in software engineering and economics. Applicants need not have a computer science degree. A successful candidate may come from a variety of backgrounds, and will bring relevant experience in data engineering and an interest in applying those skills to achieve the social mission of Opportunity Insights by sustaining and improving the Opportunity Insights Economic Tracker.', 'Option to work in Cambridge, MA once Opportunity Insights office re-opens', 'twelve-month contract position', 'Competencies', 'Develop documentation for data processing and management activities.', 'Version control inbound data and outbound data, ensuring that internal and external analyses remain replicable as data is revised.', 'Key Responsibilities', 'We are hiring a full-time Data Engineer on a 12-month contract starting in summer 2020 to work with our research group, Opportunity Insights. Our team’s mission is to develop scalable policy solutions that will empower families throughout the United States to rise out of poverty and achieve better life outcomes. We pursue this mission primarily by conducting rigorous, scientific research that harnesses the power of “big data” using an interdisciplinary approach.', 'Option to work remotely', 'Knowledge of best practices for managing multi-terabyte datasets, including creating systems for ongoing access and analysis by team members.']

project descriptions on your resumeSQL Certifications you have earnedAnswering SQL questions in a phone interviewAdvanced SQL queries you wrote in your Github repository', 'The Data team’s mission at Kalderos is to provide data modeling expertise to internal teams, and build data storage and processing platforms that can scale as Kalderos scales. They can work within the Ledger and Master Data team, the Data Science team, or others as needs arise. Below are some possible day to day tasks for a data engineer at Kalderos.', 'Kalderos is an equal opportunity workplace.\xa0 We are committed to equal opportunity regardless of race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, or veteran status.', 'Online course completion in relevant areas', 'Experience with orchestration frameworks like Azure Data Factory or Airflow', 'Healthcare benefits', 'Proven data engineering experience that involved creating, and maintaining a database and implementing data processing pipelines', 'To learn more: https://www.kalderos.com/company/about\xa0', 'SQL Certifications you have earned', 'data engineer', 'Learn and apply knowledge about the drug discount space, and become a subject matter expert for internal teams to draw upon', 'Advanced SQL queries you wrote in your Github repository', 'Experience in the healthcare or pharmaceutical industries', 'Relevant work experience on a Agile team', 'Experience creating RESTful APIs to service data needs for web applications', 'Tune existing implementations to run more efficiently as they become bottlenecks, or migrate existing implementations to new paradigms as needed', 'If you think you meet some of the list of the above, but not everything, that’s perfectly fine! We encourage you to apply regardless. Below are a few of the employee-led programs that make working at Health IQ truly unique.\xa0', "Health IQ is the internet's fastest growing online Insurance Company in the US. In the last few years, we’ve gone from 0 to $24B in coverage, 0 to 230 employees, 0 to $139MM in venture capital raised. Why is our product selling so fast? We have a data advantage. Health IQ spent 6+ years gathering the science and the proprietary data from our popular Health IQ test (taken 10.2 million times) to convince insurance carriers to give lower rates on life insurance for vegans, marathoners, triathletes, well-controlled diabetics, yogis, Crossfitters, and more. These special rates are exclusive to us saving consumers thousands of dollars each and rewarding them for living a healthy lifestyle.\xa0", 'Strong communication skills and experience in working with stakeholders', 'Build tools to support common data science functions (feature extraction, experimentation, funnel metrics, etc…)', 'What you’ll be doing:', "Ever dream of coming to work in your casual fitness attire? Well, that's how we roll at Health IQ! Be comfortable and let your fitness fashion shine!\xa0", '1. Nutritionally Supportive Environment', 'Health IQ believes that everyone can make an impact, and we are proud to be an equal opportunity employer committed to providing employment opportunity regardless of sex, race, creed, color, gender, religion, marital status, domestic partner status, age, national origin or ancestry, physical or mental disability, medical condition, sexual orientation, pregnancy, military or veteran status, citizenship status,\xa0and genetic information.\xa0If you require an accommodation to complete the application or the interview process, please contact talent@healthiq.com.', 'Process and interpret data sets', ' Data Engineer', 'IMPORTANT: Please apply by using the link below', 'Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and handle multiple priorities or tasks', ':', 'Instead of the usual ping pong table, we’ve dedicated space for our employees to enjoy yoga, spin bikes, exercise equipment, and other wellness activities. We believe a healthy body is at the core of a healthy mind, so whether it’s time for a walk, using the exercise equipment, or daily meditation, we make it easy.\xa0', 'Many of our employees are current or former athletes who are competitive and like to win. They motivate each other to do their personal best every day, and together we win as a team and as a company!\xa0', 'To learn more visit https://www.dol.gov/ofccp/regs/compliance/posters/pdf/eeopost.pdf', 'Working knowledge of data structures, SQL, XML, JSON, Data visualization tools, Version Control Systems, Programming, and scripting', 'Hyper-growth means hyper opportunity for employees! Like-Minded Coworkers', 'Perform data cleansing and validation', 'Health IQ is adding a Data Engineer to its growing Business Intelligence team.\xa0As a Data Engineer, you will work with clients, team members, department heads, and 3rd party data providers, to develop, maintain, and enhance our data engineering capabilities in support of our data and predictive analytic offerings to the insurance marketplace.\xa0The ideal candidate demonstrates a curious analytical mind with the ability to understand business objectives, ask insightful questions, and be detail-oriented in implementation.', 'Anyone who has tried to stay healthy knows it’s hard to stick to your particular nutritional goals throughout the day with soda, chips, and sugary treats all around you. ['', 'Randstad iMSP\xa0has partnered with Lyft on an opportunity at Lyft HQ\xa0in San Francisco to add a\xa0Software Engineer\xa0to the team. ', '5+ years of relevant professional experience ', 'Responsibilities:', "5+ years of relevant professional experience Experience with Hadoop (or similar) Ecosystem (MapReduce, Yarn, HDFS, Hive, Spark, Presto, Pig, HBase, Parquet) Proficient in at least one of the SQL languages (MySQL, PostgreSQL, SqlServer, Oracle) Good understanding of SQL Engine and able to conduct advanced performance tuning Strong skills in a scripting language (Python, Ruby, Bash) 1+ years of experience with workflow management tools (Airflow, Oozie, Azkaban, UC4) Comfortable working directly with data analytics to bridge Lyft's business goals with data engineering ", 'If you feel that you would be a strong fit for this role, please send your resume directly to jbusbee@lyft.com', '1+ years of experience with workflow management tools (Airflow, Oozie, Azkaban, UC4) ', ' ', 'San Francisco', "As a Data Engineer at Lyft, you will be a part of an early stage team that builds the data transport, collection, and storage, and exposes services that make data a first-class citizen at Lyft. We are looking for a Data Engineer to build a scalable data platform. You'll have ownership of our core data pipeline that powers Lyft’s top-line metrics; You will also use data expertise to help evolve data models in several components of the data stack; You will help architect, building, and launching scalable data pipelines to support Lyft’s growing data processing and analytics needs. Your efforts will allow access to business and user behavior insights, using huge amounts of Lyft data to fuel several teams such as Analytics, Data Science, Marketplace, and many others. ", 'Proficient in at least one of the SQL languages (MySQL, PostgreSQL, SqlServer, Oracle) ', 'Strong skills in a scripting language (Python, Ruby, Bash) ', 'You will report to a Data Engineering Manager. ', 'Experience:', ' Lyft HQ\xa0', 'Responsibilities:Owner of the core company data pipeline, responsible for scaling up data processing flow to meet the rapid data growth at LyftEvolve data model and data schema based on business and engineering needsImplement systems tracking data quality and consistencyDevelop tools supporting self-service data pipeline management (ETL)SQL and MapReduce job tuning to improve data processing performanceExperience: ', 'Experience with Hadoop (or similar) Ecosystem (MapReduce, Yarn, HDFS, Hive, Spark, Presto, Pig, HBase, Parquet) ', "Comfortable working directly with data analytics to bridge Lyft's business goals with data engineering ", 'jbusbee@lyft.com', 'Good understanding of SQL Engine and able to conduct advanced performance tuning ', 'Lyft', 'Randstad iMSP', 'Software Engineer']

['', 'Work with a cross disciplinary team of scientists and engineers to analyze data gathered from our core pipelines', 'In this role, you will help our team interpret the performance data gathered from our write and read pipelines with statistical analysis and modeling.\xa0', 'A culture of excellence embedded in a collegial and supportive environment', 'Experience in developing statistical models to explain hardware, chemical, or biological dataExperience in developing cloud-based analysis pipelines in Python or in similar languagesExperience with analysis of NGS, imaging, or sensor data\xa0Facility with at least one cloud-based machine learning frameworkExcellent oral and written communication skillsAn MS or PhD in applied statistics or a related fieldExperience in a non-Academic/non-research environment', 'At Catalog, we value perseverance, leadership, teamwork, science, and communication. You will have the opportunity to shape the future of an entirely new way of manipulating information. You will have a chance to formulate and solve challenging computing problems arising in this uncharted territory. You will have a chance to work and learn with a team of talented scientists, engineers, and entrepreneurs, and a chance to wear multiple hats and grow with us.\xa0', 'Develop simulators to support strategic proof-of-concept demonstrations in DNA storage and computing', 'What you will do:', 'Responsibility, leadership, and trust', 'We hope that you will consider joining us for a chat; we promise it will be intriguing.', 'Experience in a non-Academic/non-research environment', 'Work with a cross disciplinary team of scientists and engineers to analyze data gathered from our core pipelinesDevelop statistical models to predict performance, troubleshoot experiments, and answer “what if” questionsDevelop simulators to support strategic proof-of-concept demonstrations in DNA storage and computingDefine and implement an automated data analysis pipeline to complement our core pipelinesApply machine learning to address analysis bottlenecksCommunicate results to a cross disciplinary audience', 'Define and implement an automated data analysis pipeline to complement our core pipelines', 'Excellent oral and written communication skills', 'Experience in developing cloud-based analysis pipelines in Python or in similar languages', 'The challenge of modeling large heterogeneous data about software, hardware, and chemistry', "At Catalog, we are building the world's first massive data storage and computing platform using DNA as the storage medium. As an information storage medium, DNA is unique in its stability over millennia (think fossils), information density (gigabits in a cellular volume), and replicability (billions of copies, made cheaply and efficiently). Among its many groundbreaking applications, these properties make DNA an attractive medium for high density storage of latency tolerant data and massively parallel computation. To this end, we are developing a novel exabyte-scale DNA computing platform and looking for motivated engineers to join us.", 'Communicate results to a cross disciplinary audience', 'Apply machine learning to address analysis bottlenecks', 'An MS or PhD in applied statistics or a related field', 'Work with the world’s fastest DNA data storage writer', 'Develop statistical models to predict performance, troubleshoot experiments, and answer “what if” questions', 'An opportunity to define the analysis pipeline for DNA data storage and computing', 'Facility with at least one cloud-based machine learning framework', 'Experience in developing statistical models to explain hardware, chemical, or biological data', 'Work with the world’s fastest DNA data storage writerAn opportunity to define the analysis pipeline for DNA data storage and computingThe challenge of modeling large heterogeneous data about software, hardware, and chemistryA culture of excellence embedded in a collegial and supportive environmentResponsibility, leadership, and trust', 'What we need:', 'Experience with analysis of NGS, imaging, or sensor data\xa0', 'What you want:']

', 'Ability to work in a self-guided manner', 'Job Responsibilities:', 'About Shogun:\xa0', ' More About Us:\xa0Shogun embraces diversity. We consider employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.\xa0', 'Shogun is a B2B2C fintech company that helps home improvement contractors grow their business by offering competitive financing options to their customers. ', 'Analyze experiment data, communicate results, and drive decisions.', 'About this Role:', 'Proven ability to wrangle large datasets, explore and utilize raw data feeds', 'Location: We are hiring for this position in our office in downtown San Francisco, CA (currently remote)', 'Partner with executives, product managers, engineers, marketers, designers to translate data insights into smarter decisions and applications.', 'More About Us:\xa0', 'Establish and manage KPIs that measure the health of the business, product performance, and customer experience quality.']

job_title: Software Engineer, Cloud Engineering (South San Francisco or Mountain View, CA)
job_text: ['', 'Experience with micro-services, devsecops, continuous integration, release management processes.', 'Qualifications', 'Prior experience with cloud deployment technologies: Docker, Kubernetes, Google Cloud Platform or other cloud providers.', 'Create and deliver solutions that address the needs of developers working on GCP, Azure, AWS and Alibaba Cloud.', 'Responsibilities', ' Prior experience with cloud deployment technologies: Docker, Kubernetes, Google Cloud Platform or other cloud providers. Experience with micro-services, devsecops, continuous integration, release management processes. A growth mindset and willingness to pick up new technologies and domain knowledge to be productive in role.', ' Create and deliver solutions that address the needs of developers working on GCP, Azure, AWS and Alibaba Cloud. Create cloud agnostic microservices infrastructure focused on improving developer velocity, scalability and testability, at scale. Drive improvements in product development velocity with metrics. ', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'BA/BS degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent practical experience in software engineering.', '3+ years experience with Go, Java, C++, or a similar general-purpose object-oriented programming language.', 'Create cloud agnostic microservices infrastructure focused on improving developer velocity, scalability and testability, at scale.', 'A growth mindset and willingness to pick up new technologies and domain knowledge to be productive in role.', 'Drive improvements in product development velocity with metrics.', 'Description', ' BA/BS degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent practical experience in software engineering. 3+ years experience with Go, Java, C++, or a similar general-purpose object-oriented programming language. ']

['', 'Basic Qualifications', ' Seasoned, professional data scientist with 5-7 years of experience in healthcare industry ', '  Experience working in an entrepreneurial/startup environment   Experience in a clinical setting and/or solving clinical problems   Experience working directly with patients or clinicians   Experiences where you needed to learn quickly in a new field   Experience in consulting or similar roles where you needed to deeply understand a business need and problem spac e ', ' Experience in a clinical setting and/or solving clinical problems ', ' Oversees and provides guidance for solutions to complex technical problems by challenging traditional technical assumptions ', ' Experiences where you needed to learn quickly in a new field ', ' Strong communication skills and ability to interact with business stakeholders at varying levels in the organization ', 'About The Role', ' Development of predictive and diagnostic algorithms to support Digital Health initiatives through collaboration and physical or virtual collocation with a Digital Health application product development team ', ' Experience with healthcare algorithms, their implementation and integration into healthcare systems and workflows ', 'Additional Locations:', " Career GrowthAt Boston Scientific, you will find a collaborative culture driven by a passion for innovation that keeps us connected on the most essential level. With determination, imagination and a deep caring for human life, we’re solving some of the most important healthcare industry challenges. Together, we’re one global team committed to making a difference in people’s lives around the world. This is a place where you can find a career with meaningful purpose—improving lives through your life’s work.About The RoleBoston Scientific is seeking an experienced Principal Data Scientist within the IT organization. This individual will have a unique opportunity to work across externally facing Digital Health initiatives as well internal data efforts to enable advanced analytics for the enterprise. This individual will have both a hands-on and strategic role in data science and data engineering efforts and will also help to define the future team structure and roles needed to accelerate advanced analytics at Boston Scientific.Your Respnsibilites Include  Development of predictive and diagnostic algorithms to support Digital Health initiatives through collaboration and physical or virtual collocation with a Digital Health application product development team   Assess internal data and processes to determine opportunities for application of advanced analytics to support internal business operations   Development of advanced analytics capabilities to improve internal business efficiencies   Collaborate with leadership on development and execution of advanced analytics strategic and tactical road maps   Train junior data engineers on advanced analytics tools, models, etc. and provide technical leadership for the IT organization   Analyze the analytics needs of functional departments, divisions and regions and makes recommendations for implementing advanced analytics solutions to support functional initiatives   Work collaboratively with cross-functional and technical teams to provide strategic direction to global groups and serve as an advocate to promote the benefits of existing and new analytics platforms and capabilities   Promotes and supports the principles and standards of the enterprise architecture and enterprise supported technologies   Additional Responsibilities   Collaborate with Data Architects, Data Engineers and Product Managers to contribute to the overall data modeling strategy and information flow decisions   Promotes simplified integrations and analytics solutions with a business process first approach   Support the development of integration systems throughout the Software Development Lifecycle according to the IT methodology, department SOP’s, and team guidelines   Maintains validated systems within the advanced analytics scope in accordance with internal software validation procedures and compliance to external controls such as GDPR, HIPAA, etc.   Oversees and provides guidance for solutions to complex technical problems by challenging traditional technical assumptions   Identifies innovative uses of Information Technology to provide a competitive advantage in healthcare analytics for Boston Scientific   Stays up-to-date with emerging business problems and how the industry is using AI/ML techniques   Participate and take lead role in enterprise communities of practice for analytics, AI, ML, etc.  Basic QualificationsWhat we're looking for:  Master’s level degree in engineering, statistics or mathematics  Seasoned, professional data scientist with 5-7 years of experience in healthcare industry   Expert in math and statistics with demonstrated ability using data to make intelligent business predictions and continually improves the way the company uses data   Experience managing or leading junior data scientists or teams with data engineering roles   Experience with agile methodology, design thinking, and lean startup approach   Experience with healthcare algorithms, their implementation and integration into healthcare systems and workflows   Strong communication skills and ability to interact with business stakeholders at varying levels in the organization   Able to understand/define business problem statements clearly   Multiple domain specialties in data and analytics   Understands statistical and ML/AL algorithms and how different parameters impact outcomes   Able to explain findings (statistical and analytical) to business partners and what they mean from business perspective, defines business value   Working knowledge of emerging cloud AI platforms and vendor’s analytics offerings   Have broad experience and expertise working with various technologies such as Python, SQL, R, SAS, Apache Spark MLib, Scala, BigML, D3, MATLAB, Google AI, Google Analytics, TensorFlow, Microsoft CNTK, Tableau and other frameworks and libraries for AI   Able to work on a team in person and in a collaborative virtual setting; self-motivated, self-directed, adaptable   Proven experience working in a regulated environment with quality systems which includes strong documentation skills, experience with Software-as-a-Medical Device a plus   Experience with software development life cycle, Waterfall, Agile and Dev/Ops methodologies  Transferrable Skills/ExperiencesWith the right mindset and ability to learn quickly on the job, the right candidate can thrive from a variety of functional backgrounds. A few of the examples of experiences and skills that will translate well as a successful Principal Data Scientist:  Experience working in an entrepreneurial/startup environment   Experience in a clinical setting and/or solving clinical problems   Experience working directly with patients or clinicians   Experiences where you needed to learn quickly in a new field   Experience in consulting or similar roles where you needed to deeply understand a business need and problem spac e About UsAs a global medical technology leader for more than 35 years, our mission at Boston Scientific (NYSE: BSX) is to transform lives through innovative medical solutions that improve the health of patients. ['', 'All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, or disability status.', "Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Robotics, or related field", "Develop products and features that get put to work to help improve the world's biggest companies todayCollaborate with cross-functional teams including product management, customer experience, engineering, and sales to design products with market impactDesign, build and maintain efficient, reliable, and reusable C++ codeWork closely with Seegrid's other software teams on platform-level features", 'Seegrid puts autonomous vehicles to work today with an emphasis on safety, reliability, and flexibility. We are passionate about making our customers successful in deploying end-to-end automation solutions and foster a culture of collaboration, active and open communication, integrity, and respect. The challenges before us are great, but we are a high-performance team driven to change how the world does logistics.', '2+ years of industry experience of deploying real solutions to the market', 'Ability to work in a highly collaborative and dynamic environment across a broad range of engineering disciplines', 'Practical knowledge of modern software development practices', "Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Robotics, or related field2+ years of industry experience of deploying real solutions to the marketStrong software engineering knowledge and demonstrated expertise in C++Practical knowledge of modern software development practicesExperience in writing maintainable, testable, and scalable code, identifying defects, and devising solutionsExperience developing in a Linux environmentAbility to work in a highly collaborative and dynamic environment across a broad range of engineering disciplines", 'As a Software Engineer on the vehicle software team, you will work closely with product management, hardware, software, and customer experience to conceive, design, implement and maintain new products and features in our portfolio of self-driving vehicles. You will engage with cross-functional teams to conceive, design, and implement new features, maintain existing code and debug the complex, multi-factored issues that arise when robots, humans, and the unconstrained real-world interact. This position is a key part of our engineering organization, so you must be able to communicate clearly with individuals from different backgrounds as your work progresses from design through coding and testing all the way to final delivery.', 'Key responsibilities', 'Design, build and maintain efficient, reliable, and reusable C++ code', 'Requirements & Experience', 'Experience in writing maintainable, testable, and scalable code, identifying defects, and devising solutions', 'Experience developing in a Linux environment', "Work closely with Seegrid's other software teams on platform-level features", 'We are seeking candidates with a curiosity for what could be and the drive to realize it. You will ideally have experience in coding C++ using modern software development practices, the Linux operating system, and, most importantly, delivering products to market. We are scaling our organization rapidly, so have many roles available for C++ developers across several areas in our embedded vehicle software.', 'Seegrid is embracing a remote workforce, so this position can be remotely located anywhere in the US or at HQ in Pittsburgh, PA.\xa0', 'Seegrid is an equal opportunity employer Minorities/Females/People with Disabilities/Protected Veterans/Sexual Orientation/Gender Identity.', 'Strong software engineering knowledge and demonstrated expertise in C++', "Develop products and features that get put to work to help improve the world's biggest companies today", 'Collaborate with cross-functional teams including product management, customer experience, engineering, and sales to design products with market impact', 'Seegrid is the leading provider of connected self-driving vehicles for materials handling with hundreds of thousands of miles driven. The Seegrid Smart Platform combines flexible and reliable infrastructure-free vision guided vehicles with fleet management and enterprise intelligence data for a complete connected solution. Seegrid accelerates Industry 4.0 and lean initiatives with incremental automation, helping companies achieve a truly connected enterprise and transform into smart factories of the future.']

', 'Communication Skills:', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0Serve as a coach and mentor to more junior developers to include delegating and managing tasks, as appropriate ', 'Education/Experience: ', '8+ years of experience in data engineering, batch and stream processing technologies, data science, and related data-centric fields using large-scale data environments. ', 'Good understanding of data engineering, ingestion and processing of data within Big Data ecosystems and performing complex query analysis on the data using cloud technologies, preferably with Google Cloud Platform would be a plus. ', 'Work Hours:', '5+ years of “hands on” experience with Python, Scala, Java developing ETL pipelines and data manipulation scripts using SQL, and modern relational, analytical and graph databases. ', 'Evaluate the applicability of leading-edge technologies and use this information to significantly influence future business strategies ', '\xa0 ', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and/or Engineering with 10+ years of related experience or an equivalent combination of education and experience; Master's degree preferred 8+ years of experience in data engineering, batch and stream processing technologies, data science, and related data-centric fields using large-scale data environments. 5+ years of “hands on” experience with Python, Scala, Java developing ETL pipelines and data manipulation scripts using SQL, and modern relational, analytical and graph databases. Provides technical leadership and mentoring to other team members. Experience working closely with cross functional analytics and Data Science teams. Experience in CI/CD, DevOps process and tools. ", 'Reasoning Ability: Very strong analysis/troubleshooting skills, strong partnering/relationship building skills. Ability to consider options and make business decisions (e.g. selection of tools/methodologies for projects). ', 'Experience working closely with cross functional analytics and Data Science teams. ', 'Essential Functions', 'Physical Demands:', 'Qualifications ', "If you're passionate about building highly scalable data & analytics models and architecture in the cloud, and you are motivated to make an impact in creating robust and scalable data models used by every team, come join us. You will help shape the vision and architecture of Macy’s next generation of enterprise data landscape, making it easy for reporting, analytics, data scientist and other data consumer to build data-driven products, features and insights. You’ll be responsible for developing a reliable data & analytics architecture that scales with the company's incredible growth. You will be a part of an experienced engineering team and work with passionate leaders on challenging data space. ", "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and/or Engineering with 10+ years of related experience or an equivalent combination of education and experience; Master's degree preferred "]

['', 'Since the 1990’s, the majority of commercial, aerospace, and defense Original Equipment Manufacturers (including virtually every major DOD prime contractor) have been outsourcing in order to take advantage of lower labor costs or to satisfy market localization requirements. An unintended consequence is the struggle to control and manage multi-tier, global supply chain interactions for raw materials and COTS components that go into those outsourced parts. Ironically, 30-60% of part costs are attributed to raw materials, COTS components and processes, not labor rates. Current toolsets, which range from massive spreadsheets and email, to costly ERP implementations, are not working, and millions of dollars in potential savings are being left on the table every day. Moreover, lack of traceability and the inability to choreograph the timely purchase and supply of material-inputs has led to late deliveries, lengthy lead- times, alternating periods of excess inventory and stock-outs, and significant risk when it comes counterfeit or obsolete parts making their way into critical and sensitive applications.', 'Technology & Use Cases', 'complex, distributed manufacturing supply', '30-60% of part costs', 'equates to higher profit margins), fewer stock-outs, more secure, resilient and responsive', 'giving them the ability to, among other', 'processes across all tiers of their supply chain', 'lower costs; quantify risks; drive material and process standardization and supplier', 'Knowledge and experience with an Object-Oriented programming language', 'If you are ambitious, eager to learn, and interested in developing great software solutions that help our customers, this position at Supply Dynamics has your name on it.', 'named the AFWERX Microelectronics Supply Chain Provenance Challenge “Champions” ', 'chains, that encompass multiple tiers of supply', 'Ability to deliver in a fast-paced environment', 'We are smart, honest, hardworking people who take pride in rolling up our sleeves and delivering for our customers. We place great value on integrity, and we pride ourselves on always doing the right thing! We also believe in balance. We know that your friends, family, hobbies, and passions are what make you great and so we strive to achieve appropriate work-life balance! We offer flexible work hours, competitive pay, PTO, medical, dental, vision, incentive compensation and a generous 401k match! ', 'Continual desire to stay current with technology', 'Experience in any of the following is a plus: Java, Groovy, Grails, Spring, Hibernate/JPA, JavaScript, AJAX, Bootstrap, Tomcat, MySQL', ' ', 'daily supply chain interactions with suppliers visible', 'time', 'Lower production costs (which in all cases', 'Supply Dynamics is a small, fast growing and intensely entrepreneurial company that delivers innovative, SaaS solutions and related engineering services to Fortune 500 companies. Our solutions provide a digital thread across distributed manufacturing networks, reconnecting finished parts with the raw materials and component parts that go into them. \xa0Our software enables our customers to collaborate with their suppliers on the purchase and supply of common materials (things like electronic components, metals, plastics etc.) Using advanced supply chain analytics and a re-imagined approach to procurement, we enable the ‘smart’ supply chain.\xa0In this field, Supply Dynamics is the undisputed leader, serving marquee customers such as General Electric, Collins Aerospace, Honeywell, Oshkosh Corporation, Westinghouse, the Department of Defense and hundreds of their sub-tier suppliers.', 'Participate in all aspects of the development lifecycle: requirements collection, system analysis, architecture, design, development, testing and documentation.', 'not ', 'materials and COTS components', 'things: consolidate common raw material and process purchases with fewer suppliers;', 'Experience with Amazon Web Services is a plus', 'Skills for Success', 'More about Supply Dynamics:', 'supply chains!', 'rationalization; find new supply sources; benchmark pricing; identify hedging', 'Key indicators of success in this role are writing quality code that operates correctly and coming up to speed quickly on the SDX platform and related technologies.\xa0', 'raw', 'Demonstrate information security awareness / understanding', 'Who Are You? ', 'opportunities; and last but not least, identify potential supply disruptions weeks and', 'Supply Dynamics’ product, SDX, is a highly secure business collaboration platform, designed for complex, distributed manufacturing supply chains, that encompass multiple tiers of supply.', 'Supply Dynamics serves both public and private sector customers, including Raytheon RTX, Oshkosh Corporation, Honeywell, Rolls Royce, Nissan, and thousands of their sub- tier suppliers.\xa0In 2019, Supply Dynamics was awarded its first DOD (OTA) contract awards – the first with the Naval Surface Warfare Center Crane Division (NSA Crane), and the second with the USAF (AFWERX). In November 2019, SDX competed in a 2-day, 12-hour challenge event sponsored by AFRL, NAVIDA and CISCO. At the end of that event, Supply Dynamics and its partner Brunel University, were named the AFWERX Microelectronics Supply Chain Provenance Challenge “Champions” at the International Test Conference (ITC) in Washington, D.C. 75 companies and 22 finalists were involved.', 'Knowledge of basic SQL queries', 'Computer / Engineering / Science related college degreeKnowledge and experience with an Object-Oriented programming languageWeb application development experienceKnowledge of basic SQL queriesContinual desire to stay current with technologyDemonstrate information security awareness / understandingGood communication and interpersonal skillsAbility to work both independently and in teamsAbility to deliver in a fast-paced environmentInterest and experience in Machine Learning / Artificial Intelligence is a plusExperience with Amazon Web Services is a plusExperience in any of the following is a plus: Java, Groovy, Grails, Spring, Hibernate/JPA, JavaScript, AJAX, Bootstrap, Tomcat, MySQL', 'Computer / Engineering / Science related college degree', 'their', 'A Day In The Life- Software Developer', 'Work cooperatively with the Business and IT team at Supply Dynamics.', 'You enjoy working with a group to develop software designs and working independently to design and develop software.\xa0In your work, you take a balanced approach between writing code that is high quality and easily maintainable, and the efficiency of getting the job done.\xa0', 'new intelligence', 'As needed, act as a development resource on other development efforts including a leading-edge crowd sourcing app. ', 'labor rates', 'Ability to work both independently and in teams', 'are attributed to raw materials, COTS components and processes, ', 'choreograph and monitor the timely purchase and supply of material-inputs and related', 'outsourcing in order to take advantage of lower labor costs or to satisfy market', 'You describe yourself as a quick learner, as organized and self-motivated. You have a bias for action and are meticulous about details.\xa0You have a passion for continuous learning.\xa0\xa0You are not easily intimidated by a challenge. Your friends and family describe you as friendly but also tenacious. ', 'NOT require the customer to change or modify any existing IT or ERP systems', 'Act as a key technical contributor on a SaaS application built on Grails, with a focus on Hibernate.As needed, act as a development resource on other development efforts including a leading-edge crowd sourcing app. Participate in all aspects of the development lifecycle: requirements collection, system analysis, architecture, design, development, testing and documentation.Work cooperatively with the Business and IT team at Supply Dynamics.', 'real-', 'As a Software Developer at Supply Dynamics, you will primarily be responsible for implementing features and improvements in our flagship software platform SDX.\xa0You will also support the software, troubleshooting and fixing any production issues.\xa0You will work within a team to accomplish this that will help you come up to speed with the design and architecture of the platform and will guide you in requirements gathering.\xa0', 'Our award winning (web-based) multi-enterprise platform, SDX, provides commercial and DOD customers with real-time visibility and control over the “material-input” requirements (metals, fasteners, plastics, electronics, etc.) that go into their products, equipment or weapons systems – facilitating real-time monitoring and control of Tier 1-Tier n suppliers. Supply Dynamics enables customers to reduce the cost of raw materials and component parts that go into their products, characterize and quantify risks, anticipate disruptions before they happen, enhance collaboration with supply chain stakeholders, and ensure that the timely purchase and supply of material-inputs is NEVER the reason parts are late to an end-use customer or in-field requirement.', 'Act as a key technical contributor on a SaaS application built on Grails, with a focus on Hibernate.', 'localization requirements', 'Good communication and interpersonal skills', 'Who Are We? \xa0', 'Website:', 'Part Attribute Characterization (PAC) is an ITAR compliant software-driven engineering service that delivers reliable, structured, bill-of-material information about the raw materials and COTS components that go into a customer’s products, equipment or weapons systems. The resulting output can then be used to classify parts by attribute (e.g. manufacturing processes, material type, special processes, finishes, sizes, etc.), determine opportunities to standardize raw material sizes and specifications, and identify equivalency relationships across multiple part numbers with same form, fit, and function. Importantly, this process utilizes a customer’s existing engineering drawings as the starting point and DOES NOT rely on lengthy and error prone supplier surveys.\xa0SDX makes a company’s daily supply chain interactions with suppliers visible, allowing the sharing of vital material and processing information to all stakeholders happen real- time. With this new intelligence, companies can use SDX’s intuitive user interface to choreograph and monitor the timely purchase and supply of material-inputs and related processes across all tiers of their supply chain, giving them the ability to, among other things: consolidate common raw material and process purchases with fewer suppliers; lower costs; quantify risks; drive material and process standardization and supplier rationalization; find new supply sources; benchmark pricing; identify hedging opportunities; and last but not least, identify potential supply disruptions weeks and months before they happen. The result? Lower production costs (which in all cases equates to higher profit margins), fewer stock-outs, more secure, resilient and responsive supply chains! Benefits are recognized within weeks of implementation, and importantly, SDX does NOT require the customer to change or modify any existing IT or ERP systems.', 'business collaboration platform, designed for', 'Website:\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0www.supplydynamics.com ', 'Interest and experience in Machine Learning / Artificial Intelligence is a plus', 'Web application development experience', 'Supply Dynamics Inc., is an Ohio based business founded in 2003 and backed (in 2017) by Queen City Angels, Cincinnati, and Rev 1 Ventures, Columbus, Ohio.', 'Responsibilities Include', 'months before they happen', 'structured']

['', 'Develop transformation logic to convert disparate datasets into Aetion’s proprietary format.\xa0Work with the Science team to develop this logic in Spark UDFs\xa0executed over a Spark cluster.Assess, develop, troubleshoot and enhance our measure system, which utilizes a combination of Java, Scala, Python, and R.\xa0Modify JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) files to describe the schemas of the datasets, ensuring system functionality through routine maintenance and testing.\xa0Work on a full-stack rapid-cycle analytic application.\xa0Develop highly effective, performant, and scalable components capable of handling large amounts of data for over 10 million patients.\xa0Work with the Science and Product teams to understand and assess client needs, and to ensure optimal system efficiency.\xa0', 'Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Systems, or a related field.4 years of experience in the position offered or related position, including 4 years of experience with: designing, developing, maintaining large-scale data ETL pipelines using Java/Scala in AWS, Hadoop, Spark, and DataBricks to manage Apache Spark infrastructure.Experience building backend modules, low latency REST API in distributed environment using Java, Docker, SQL, MVN, Spring, Jenkins.Experience writing complex SQL queries, UDFs to process large amounts of data across relational, non-relational databases, JSON and Spark SQLs.Experience translating requirements from product, DevOps teams to technology solutions using SDLC.\xa0', 'Your primary responsibility will be developing transformation logic against disparate datasets in Aetion Evidence Platform. You will work closely with our Product and Science team in developing custom transformation logic for longitudinal data, which is in Python, Scala, and R UDFs and executed over a Spark cluster. ['', 'Summary', 'A conviction is not an absolute bar to employment. Factors such as the age of the offense, evidence of rehabilitation, seriousness of violation, and job relatedness are considered in all employment decisions. Additionally, it’s the bank’s policy to only inquire into a candidate’s criminal history after an offer has been made. Federal law prohibits banks from employing individuals who have been convicted of, or received a pretrial diversion for, certain offenses.', ' Design, document, develop, test, implement, monitor, maintain, and support Risk Data platforms, including subject area marts and interfaces to downstream applications.  Function as Data Integration SME and supply business and technical knowledge on required subject-areas and systems.  Design & development of AWS Data & Analytics platform using Redshift & Tableau Responsible for developing and building the data pipeline from scratch, starting from extraction from on-prem to moving it over to processing and final output. Perform DUT/SIT/UAT/DR/regression testing activities.  Handle user inquiries and production support.  Conduct trainings and knowledge sharing sessions.  Early identification of development issues and corrective action to mitigate issues is required with these responsibilities. ['', '\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Maintain up-to-date knowledge regarding changes in the IT industry, share ideas with IT Department leadership, and propose changes based on these developments.Provide highly skilled operational support for a variety of user system platforms including handheld, desktop, workstation and laptop hardware, associated operating systems and application software.\xa0Specialize in providing advanced level technical support for entire County within specific, wide reaching, mission critical, assigned hardware or software tool areas.Provide advanced level technical strategic planning and implementation of new user system platform technology standards.\xa0Provide advanced direct consulting services for customer departments regarding technology budgeting, computing solutions, client-oriented technology project implementation, relocation services, and user application productivity including meeting training needs.', "A valid Washington State Driver's License may be required when travel is required of the position", 'Positions in specific program areas may require program-related experience, education, and/or training', 'Special Requirements/Qualifications:', "Pierce County Information Technology (IT), a Division of the\xa0Finance Department, has an exciting opportunity for an experienced IT Systems Engineer, Lead professional. The successful candidate will provide complex technical solutions, project management, and enterprise-wide technical support through collaboration and effective IT strategies.\xa0\xa0Our team of 130 staff directly supports Pierce County's 3,000 staff with their daily IT needs and provides solutions that support all County constituents. You will work with other talented, professional staff who are committed to meeting the highest principles of public service.", ' ', 'Experience and knowledge\xa0in enterprise cybersecurity practices\xa0Experience and knowledge with operational software tools for Windows computers and Apple iOS devices', 'Preferred Qualifications:', 'Six years of information technology experience', 'Experience and knowledge\xa0in enterprise cybersecurity practices\xa0', ' At Pierce County, diversity, equity, and inclusion means commitment, not a single step. We strive to foster an inclusive environment that supports equitable access to opportunities throughout your career. We want to recruit, develop, and maintain a talented workforce from various backgrounds, cultures, lifestyles, and perspectives, committed to our vision.\xa0Employees of the County have local, direct, and visible impact in our diverse community. Will you join us in keeping Pierce County a great place to live, work, and raise a family?', 'Provide highly skilled operational support for a variety of user system platforms including handheld, desktop, workstation and laptop hardware, associated operating systems and application software.\xa0', "Bachelor's degree in information technology, computer sciences, business/public administration or related field\xa0ANDSix years of information technology experienceAdditional education or experience may substitute for the recruiting requirements", "You will lead a small team of IT professionals in the delivery of service operations, user device management applications, and user services planning. Currently this team is upgrading Microsoft Windows enterprise-wide,\xa0migrating the organization to the new Microsoft Edge Browser, and enhancing secure and seamless access for our expanded remote workforce.\xa0As the team's mentor we are not only looking for someone with extensive experience and proven technical skills, but someone who supports a creative work environment and a consultative mindset.\xa0\xa0This is your opportunity to make a direct impact on your local community!", "Why It's a Great Opportunity:\xa0", ' Core Daily Responsibilities:', 'The IT Division has an excellent reputation for being an employer that is committed to providing top-notch service to its customers. We are a national leader in delivering public services through innovation.\xa0Our diverse technology solutions are all supported by a robust hybrid infrastructure of on-premises and cloud-based solutions and a secure network. We are a team that prominently endorses a positive and collaborative approach where we support one another and the work each one of us provides. The work you do in this Division matters because many Pierce County public services are provided\xa0through and supported by the technologies built, operated, and maintained by the IT team. IT and this unit exemplify a positive teamwork-based approach and support one another and the work each staff member provides. We focus on a continuous learning mindset for employee development and are excited for you to join our team!\xa0 ', 'Experience and knowledge with operational software tools for Windows computers and Apple iOS devices', 'The landscape of technology solutions is continuously evolving as new innovations take hold. The highly complex and evolving area of IT requires quick adaptation to stay current and ahead. A successful employee will provide responsive and professional service to Pierce County business units and cross unit IT teammates. This person is acknowledged as the subject matter expert in a distribution of assigned specialty areas and will communicate that expertise well. Throughout your employment\xa0you will receive direct, constructive feedback from peers and your supervisor to facilitate your success and allow you to meet your professional goals.', 'Additional education or experience may substitute for the recruiting requirements', '\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Maintain up-to-date knowledge regarding changes in the IT industry, share ideas with IT Department leadership, and propose changes based on these developments.', 'Specialize in providing advanced level technical support for entire County within specific, wide reaching, mission critical, assigned hardware or software tool areas.', "Why It's a Great Department:\xa0", "Bachelor's degree in information technology, computer sciences, business/public administration or related field\xa0AND", 'How to be Successful in the Role:\xa0', 'Provide advanced direct consulting services for customer departments regarding technology budgeting, computing solutions, client-oriented technology project implementation, relocation services, and user application productivity including meeting training needs.', "Positions in specific program areas may require program-related experience, education, and/or trainingAs a condition of employment, the applicant will need to authorize and complete a background check. Information received from the background check is reviewed case-by-case and will not necessarily remove an applicant from considerationA valid Washington State Driver's License may be required when travel is required of the position", 'At Pierce County, diversity, equity, and inclusion means commitment, not a single step. We strive to foster an inclusive environment that supports equitable access to opportunities throughout your career. We want to recruit, develop, and maintain a talented workforce from various backgrounds, cultures, lifestyles, and perspectives, committed to our vision.\xa0Employees of the County have local, direct, and visible impact in our diverse community. Will you join us in keeping Pierce County a great place to live, work, and raise a family?', '\xa0Recruiting Requirements:\xa0\xa0', 'As a condition of employment, the applicant will need to authorize and complete a background check. Information received from the background check is reviewed case-by-case and will not necessarily remove an applicant from consideration', 'The IT Division has access to numerous training and coaching opportunities, which include peer, industry, LinkedIn curriculum, and official Pierce County trainings as well as access to established procedures, standards, practices, and system documentation. Our training program is designed to help you develop as both a professional in your lead role as an IT Systems Engineer and as a Pierce County employee.\xa0Your work will offer a great foundation for future positions within the IT Division and Pierce County.\xa0', 'Your Future in this Role:\xa0', 'Provide advanced level technical strategic planning and implementation of new user system platform technology standards.\xa0']

Unlike other financial institutions, Aspiration is committed to building a relationship with our customers based on trust and aligning the customer’s success with our own. Aspiration has raised over $200M in funding to date, and is growing quickly.']

['', 'Work on a cross-functional team of engineers and data scientists to design and build a scalable and efficient data pipeline', 'Explore and pioneer novel technical solutions in the healthcare space. Most of this hasn’t been done before, so you’ll be uniquely positioned to pave the way', 'Experience working on data analytics or closely with data analytics teamsExperience with either full stack/frontend or devops work helpful', 'Proficiency in at least two commonly used programming languages, such as Python, JavaScript, Go, Java, or Scala', 'Explore and pioneer novel technical solutions in the healthcare space. Most of this hasn’t been done before, so you’ll be uniquely positioned to pave the wayHelp define a brand new product from the ground upUse the best tools/tech for the job, which means working on a diverse, polyglot codebaseWork on a cross-functional team of engineers and data scientists to design and build a scalable and efficient data pipelinePartner closely with data scientists to help them scale and productionalize the healthcare analytics they create', '\xa0', 'Working experience with distributed computing infrastructure (Hadoop, Spark, Flink, etc) and knowledge of large-scale, analysis-heavy database fundamentals', 'BONUSES', 'Experience with either full stack/frontend or devops work helpful', 'Nuna partners with healthcare payers, including government agencies and health plans, to turn data into learnings and information into meaning.', 'YOUR TEAM', 'Help define a brand new product from the ground up', 'A healthy bias towards action', 'YOU BRING', 'By joining the Value Platform team, you’ll have the unique opportunity to work with other passionate and skilled engineers to make a lasting impacting in improving the quality of healthcare.', 'A passion for developing scalable, maintainable, testable code', 'YOUR IMPACT', 'Nuna’s Value Platform team is building an impactful new product to help turn value-based care into a reality within the United States healthcare system. Value-based healthcare is a delivery model where hospitals are paid based on patient health outcomes, instead of the traditional fee for service model. These value-based payment arrangements are transforming healthcare, but operationalizing them is challenging and complex. That’s why we are tackling the daunting task of making it easier, by automating these value-based arrangements in an accurate, reliable, and transparent way.', 'Use the best tools/tech for the job, which means working on a diverse, polyglot codebase', '3+ years of software engineering experience with a clear understanding of industry best practicesProven leadership, organization, and communication skillsComfort with ambiguity and possessing the ability to prioritize tasks across multiple stakeholdersA healthy bias towards actionKnowledge of computer science fundamentals (such as debugging or object-oriented design) and software engineering processes (such as agile software development, test automation, and continuous integration)Working experience with distributed computing infrastructure (Hadoop, Spark, Flink, etc) and knowledge of large-scale, analysis-heavy database fundamentalsProficiency in at least two commonly used programming languages, such as Python, JavaScript, Go, Java, or ScalaA passion for developing scalable, maintainable, testable codeThe ability to understand the big picture and align your work with larger organizational priorities', 'Knowledge of computer science fundamentals (such as debugging or object-oriented design) and software engineering processes (such as agile software development, test automation, and continuous integration)', 'At Nuna, our mission is to make high-quality healthcare affordable for everyone. We are dedicated to tackling one of our nation’s biggest problems with ingenuity, creativity, and a keen moral compass.', 'Nuna is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability, genetics and/or veteran status.', 'YOUR OPPORTUNITIES', "Nuna is committed to simple principles: a rigorous understanding of data, modern technology, and most importantly, compassion and care for our fellow human. We want to know what really works, what doesn't—and why.", 'Comfort with ambiguity and possessing the ability to prioritize tasks across multiple stakeholders', '\ufeff', 'Proven leadership, organization, and communication skills', 'Partner closely with data scientists to help them scale and productionalize the healthcare analytics they create', '3+ years of software engineering experience with a clear understanding of industry best practices', 'At the core of these agreements is a considerable amount of data from various sources. The Value Platform team is building a high throughput pipeline to efficiently calculate performance measures for providers, identify opportunities for improvement, and present these insights in an easily digestible way. This involves running complicated data pipelines on distributed computing clusters with up to real-time data input.', 'Experience working on data analytics or closely with data analytics teams', 'The ability to understand the big picture and align your work with larger organizational priorities']

['', 'Job Description:', 'Strong interpersonal skills and motivated by impact', '3+ years of experience in a data science or analytics role\xa0Expert-level SQL skills and proficient in Python or R programming\xa0Prior experience working with data visualization tools (eg Mode, Looker, Tableau, Metabase)\xa0Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative field (eg Math, Economics, Statistics, CS, Engineering)\xa0Strong interpersonal skills and motivated by impact', 'Responsibilities:', 'Partner with teammates across the org to translate data into insights and actions\xa0Define and monitor key company-wide success metrics and OKRs\xa0Use visualization, reporting and other tools to improve how our team accesses and interprets datasets\xa0Create models to identify important segmentations and predict outcomes in specific subdomains\xa0Build data tools that help us scale manual processes\xa0Prototype new data-driven features that increase value for our learners, families, and teachers', 'Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative field (eg Math, Economics, Statistics, CS, Engineering)\xa0', 'Prior experience working with data visualization tools (eg Mode, Looker, Tableau, Metabase)\xa0', 'Company Description:', 'General Requirements:', 'Prototype new data-driven features that increase value for our learners, families, and teachers', '3+ years of experience in a data science or analytics role\xa0', 'Create models to identify important segmentations and predict outcomes in specific subdomains\xa0', 'Partner with teammates across the org to translate data into insights and actions\xa0', 'Required Skills: SQL, Python, R, data visualization tools', 'Define and monitor key company-wide success metrics and OKRs\xa0', 'Use visualization, reporting and other tools to improve how our team accesses and interprets datasets\xa0', 'Build data tools that help us scale manual processes\xa0', 'Our mission is to inspire kids to love learning. We believe the best way to do that is by linking learning to kids’ interests, connecting them with others who share those interests, and giving them the autonomy to pick their own path. We provide small group classes that meet over live video chat where learners are connected with teachers and classmates who share their interests. These classes are offered through our marketplace and conducted on our remote learning platform.', 'Expert-level SQL skills and proficient in Python or R programming\xa0', 'Data plays an important role in how we make decisions. As our second full-time Data team member, you’ll have an opportunity to work cross-functionally with teammates from Operations, Product, Marketing, and other internal teams as they tackle a variety of challenges and opportunities. You’ll help shape our strategy by sharing key insights, digging into some of our most pressing problems, and finding creative ways to use data to improve our products and services.']

['', 'Share what God is teaching him or her.', 'He/she performs a variety of tasks where a wide degree of creativity and latitude is expected.', 'Summary', 'Design each integration in accordance with functional policies, procedures, and quality assurance best practices.', ' The data integration Engineer/Developer supports and helps design and implement the integration architecture that will be used in interconnecting FamilyLife’s (FL) ecosystem. He/she performs a variety of tasks where a wide degree of creativity and latitude is expected. Analyze functional users’ needs and then design, develop, integrate, and test software and integrations to meet those needs. Become an expert on FL ecosystems and Data Management and Data Flows. Design each integration in accordance with functional policies, procedures, and quality assurance best practices. Ensured development projects meet business requirements and goals, fulfill end-user requirements, and identify and resolve system issues. Monitor and analyze the effectiveness and efficiency of existing applications; develop strategies for improving, upgrading or leveraging these systems. Lead the development of system architectures that define the interaction between systems to include the use of platforms and tools and definition of standard shared between systems. Create a variety of models and diagrams (such as flowcharts) that instruct other developers/programmers how integrations and data flows function. Document integrations, applications and system components as a reference for future maintenance and upgrades. Evaluate proposals to identify potential problem areas and make appropriate recommendations. Collaborate with analysts, designers, contractors/ consultants, system owners, and other developers/ programmers during system/ software implementation. Research technologies for possible placement/ adoption into FL’s back-office system. Actively and intentionally, grow in his/ her Christian faith. Maintain a positive witness for Christ. Share what God is teaching him or her. Consistently attend and participate in team/ Ministry devotional times.
