Individuals will be considered for positions for which they meet the minimum qualifications and are able to perform without regard to race, color, gender, age, religion, disability, national origin, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other basis protected by federal, state or local laws.', 'Actively pursues knowledge of new technologies in the areas of cloud native platforms and orchestration ', 'Charter Communications is an Equal Opportunity Employer - Minority/Female/Veteran/Disability ', 'Maximizes the efficiency of the various software systems by implementing, monitoring, testing and auditing new software programs ', 'MAJOR DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Develops and maintains technical documentation ', 'Skills/Abilities and Knowledge', 'Participates in continuous performance improvement sessions to discuss opportunities to improve processes or standards ', '\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 ', 'MAJOR DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES ', 'The successful candidate needs to have a proven software development methodology background with experience in any 2 of the following: Golang, Docker, Kubernetes API, Python, DevOps, CI/CD.  A commitment to collaborative problem solving and quality product is essential. Expect to think outside the box, solve real problems, and change how technology is used in our company.  We work in a Scrum environment where it’s every team member’s responsibility to ensure SDLC best practices are followed.  This role will focus on various aspects of the Kubernetes ecosystem, as well as other components of the platform. ['', 'Understanding of telecommunications "location standards" specific to the mobile industry ', '5+ years’ experience as a Product Owner, with a background in telecommunicationsUnderstanding of telecommunications "location standards" specific to the mobile industry Experience documenting and prioritizing requirementsUnderstand of APIs and software integrationStrong communication skills and business acumenExperience with a DevOps team and cultureFamiliarity with Kubernetes and OpenStack ideal, but not requiredAbility to travel 2-3 times a year, sometimes internationally', 'Skills/Experience We Seek for the Product Owner', 'REMOTE Product Owner - Telecommunications', 'Our global client is looking for a Principal level Product Owner to join their team for a 6-12 month contract-to-hire opportunity. This Product Owner will work closely with customers and development teams to create specifications documents, plan implementations, and be the subject matter expert for implementation of system features. Bonus points for containers and kernel configuration.', 'Coordinate and run test evolutions for software releases and as part of continuous integration.', '5+ years of experience working with both statically and dynamically typed languages. Prefer significant experience with C, C++, and Python. Bonus points for Rust, Java, and exposure to web development.', 'Familiarity with ROS is a plus.', 'Are you inspired by how robotics will change the world? Are you excited about real world applications for robotics? Would you like working directly with leading e-commerce companies who are deploying robotics? If you answered yes to any of these questions, you will be interested in one of our exciting employment opportunities! This is an opportunity to be part of an incredible team deploying a cutting-edge robotics solution to address real-world challenges in e-commerce fulfillment warehouses for major global brands.', '5+ years of experience working with both statically and dynamically typed languages. Prefer significant experience with C, C++, and Python. Bonus points for Rust, Java, and exposure to web development.Demonstrated experience designing and using test infrastructure for complex physical systems. Bonus points for containers and kernel configuration.Familiarity with ROS is a plus.']

['About Engineering', '', 'Get to be creative every day.', ' Are a successful, vibrant, fast-growing company Are a technologically and data-driven business. Are at the forefront of tech and fashion, redefining shopping for the next generation. Are passionate about our clients and live/breathe the client experience. Get to be creative every day. Have a smart, experienced, and diverse leadership team that wants to do it right & is open to new ideas. Believe in autonomy & taking initiative. Full support for remote work—and you get to connect with your peers and partners every few months. Offer transparent, equitable, and competitive compensation based on your level to help eliminate bias in salaries, as well as equity and comprehensive health benefits. Are serious about our commitment to life-work balance, and have generous parental leave policies. ', "You are enthusiastic about technology. You will collaborate to build solutions using the appropriate tools and contribute to design and architecture across multiple systems. You should believe in what you’re doing and inspire others around you to be their best selves? Do you feel ownership for the projects you are working on? You have deep respect for your craft. We are dedicated to building software sustainably, using modern techniques. You're always looking for more and better ways to write software, and enthusiastic about sharing them with your team. ['', '5+ years’ experience in software development, expert level of Java programming, design, and analysis.', 'Experience delivering high performance, active-active, scalable services (Enterprise Java/J2EE, Web Services, Big Data/NoSQL).', 'Track record monitoring and analyzing system performance, isolating issues or bottlenecks that could impact reliability, performance and scalability.', 'Solid understanding of the path(s) customer requests take from web browser to backend.', ' BS Degree in Engineering, Computer Science or equivalent experience. 5+ years’ experience in software development, expert level of Java programming, design, and analysis. Experience delivering high performance, active-active, scalable services (Enterprise Java/J2EE, Web Services, Big Data/NoSQL). Track record monitoring and analyzing system performance, isolating issues or bottlenecks that could impact reliability, performance and scalability. Strong knowledge of SQL and NoSQL programming (Oracle, Cassandra, Amazon Aurora, DynamoDB or similar) including both relational database schema designs and schema-less systems. Hands-on experience in Amazon Web Services, at enterprise scale is required including familiarity with DynamoDB, Aurora, EC2, and other AWS services. Experience executing performance testing and/or development efforts for a complex, high throughput system. Solid understanding of the path(s) customer requests take from web browser to backend. Extensive experience with agile development methodologies and test driven development processes required. Must possess the drive and passion for quality with the ability to inspire, excite and motivate other team members. Must possess strong verbal and written communication skills, and be able to work with others at all levels, effective at working with geographically remote and culturally diverse teams. ', 'You have deep expertise in system engineering and have successfully improved the performance of the software stack.', 'You are passionate about making distributed systems better and have an insatiable thirst to keep learning.', 'Qualifications', 'Hands-on experience in Amazon Web Services, at enterprise scale is required including familiarity with DynamoDB, Aurora, EC2, and other AWS services.', 'You know how to troubleshoot complicated issues throughout the software stack.', 'BS Degree in Engineering, Computer Science or equivalent experience.', 'You are able to build positive relationships with Architects to influence technology decisions.', 'You have implemented rigorous standard methodologies for measuring, understanding, predicting, and improving the performance of enterprise grade systems (even better if they happen to be Data oriented).', 'Experience executing performance testing and/or development efforts for a complex, high throughput system.', "Let's Talk, If", 'You have contributed to a development community establishing and influencing quality engineering standard methodologies across the development community.', 'Strong knowledge of SQL and NoSQL programming (Oracle, Cassandra, Amazon Aurora, DynamoDB or similar) including both relational database schema designs and schema-less systems.', 'Must possess the drive and passion for quality with the ability to inspire, excite and motivate other team members.', 'Extensive experience with agile development methodologies and test driven development processes required.', ' You are passionate about making distributed systems better and have an insatiable thirst to keep learning. You have deep expertise in system engineering and have successfully improved the performance of the software stack. You know how to troubleshoot complicated issues throughout the software stack. You have implemented rigorous standard methodologies for measuring, understanding, predicting, and improving the performance of enterprise grade systems (even better if they happen to be Data oriented). You are able to build positive relationships with Architects to influence technology decisions. You have contributed to a development community establishing and influencing quality engineering standard methodologies across the development community. ', 'Must possess strong verbal and written communication skills, and be able to work with others at all levels, effective at working with geographically remote and culturally diverse teams.']

job_text: ['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Minimum seven years of experience in programming with increasing project and team leadership responsibilities, or an equivalent combination of education and work experience', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with search engine frameworks like ElasticSearch or Apache Solr is desired.', 'Semantic Data Discovery Developer – Scientific Computing', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Assist management in determining computer systems requirements. Propose system and software designs to meet user requirements.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0May perform management functions in the absence of the manager and may act as a project manager/leader.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Enhance organization reputation by accepting ownership for accomplishing new and different requests. Resolve conflicting requirements by proposing alternatives', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Update job knowledge by researching new technologies and software products and languages, reading professional publications, maintaining personal networks and participating in professional organizations. Keep abreast of hardware and software developments, including theory and technique.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Analyze user requirements, develop, and prioritize the backlog of features and functionality.', '\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Design and conduct tests for the software. Assess software performance and troubleshoot end-to-end issues.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Master’s degree in Computer Science or a related discipline; Ph.D. preferred.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Design new and/or hybrid search solutions using off-the-shelf software. Test, deploy and evolve solutions.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Assume the responsibility for coordinating the activities of software programming with the other groups that are working with source data systems, or with end users to support research studies.', 'Requirements:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Knowledge and experience in ASP.NET, C# and IIS is a plus.', 'Over 38,000 employees strong, the mission of the Mount Sinai Health System is to provide compassionate patient care with seamless coordination and to advance medicine through unrivaled education, research, and outreach in the many diverse communities we serve.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Web server experience a strong plus, including JBoss/Wildfly, Tomcat, or nginx.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Database design and development, writing complex SQL is required;\xa0Experience with MS SQL Server or Oracle preferred.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0DevOps experience is a plus (Jenkins, Ansible, or other CI/CD tools).', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0The ability to communicate effectively and manage multiple conflicting priorities simultaneously', 'Roles & Responsibilities:\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Develop and monitor metrics to assess the quality of the software and production services.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work with research stakeholders to understand requirements for search tools for electronic medical record, genomic and other research databases and data. Develop use cases.', 'Formed in September 2013, The Mount Sinai Health System combines the excellence of the Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai with seven premier hospital campuses, including Mount Sinai Beth Israel, Mount Sinai Beth Israel Brooklyn, The Mount Sinai Hospital, Mount Sinai Queens, Mount Sinai West (formerly Mount Sinai Roosevelt), Mount Sinai St. Luke’s, and New York Eye and Ear Infirmary of Mount Sinai.', 'The Semantic Data Discover Developer in Scientific Computing designs and develops applications that enable Mount Sinai research scientists to discover, integrate, and analyze the diverse data assets throughout the hospital and medical school. The successful candidate will have demonstrated experience in building semantic data discovery solutions that employ search, data integration, and data visualization components that are targeted at end users with scientific research and data science backgrounds. The variety of data sources and formats that need to be discoverable is significant, including medical imagery, hospital patient records, doctor’s notes, laboratory measurements, genomics data, and controlled vocabularies of medical and scientific terms (diseases, phenotypes, organic compounds, etc.). Specific responsibilities are listed below.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Must be flexible in considering and learning all technology options (tools, methods, programming languages)', '\xa0Who We Are', 'The Mount Sinai Health System is an equal opportunity employer. We promote recognition and respect for individual and cultural differences, and we work to make our employees feel valued and appreciated, whatever their race, gender, background, or sexual orientation.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with JavaScript frameworks such as Node, Vue, and JQuery is desirable.', 'The Mount Sinai Health System believes that diversity is a driver for excellence. We share a common devotion to delivering exceptional patient care. Yet we’re as diverse as the city we call home- culturally, ethically, in outlook and lifestyle. When you join us, you become a part of Mount Sinai’s unrivaled record of achievement, education and advancement as we revolutionize medicine together.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Develop specifications for complex front-end software applications for web services such as a cohort query tool for a data warehouse, a research application portal, and other back end services.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Assist with the development of user surveys to actively solicit and respond to user feedback.', 'Ground breaking science. Advancing medicine. Healing made personal', 'Ground breaking science. Advancing medicine. Healing made personal.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with Semantic Web technologies is highly desirable (RDF, RDFS, OWL 2, SHACL, R2RML, SPARQL W3C recommendations, Apache Jena or RDF4J frameworks for managing Semantic Web data, semantic data integration for query virtualization or ETL and some 3GL and 4GL programming languages, such as Java, SQL, Scala, or JavaScript is required.', 'We work hard to acquire and retain the best people, and to create a welcoming, nurturing work environment where you can develop professionally. We share the belief that all employees, regardless of job title or expertise, can make an impact on quality patient care.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Evaluate approaches and technologies and propose alternatives. Recommend solutions by comparing advantages and disadvantages of custom development and purchase alternatives.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0May be involved in providing assistance, training, and mentoring other programmers', 'Strength Through Diversity', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with healthcare, research and/or genomic data is highly desirable.', 'Who We Are', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Develop scalable and reliable software following industry standard methodologies for software development, documentation, dev ops, and CI/CD practices.', 'Explore more about this opportunity and how you can help us write a new chapter in our story!', 'EOE Minorities/Women/Disabled/Veterans', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Incorporate semantic technology and ontologies as appropriate.']

job_title: Application Engineer IV - Full Stack Developer
job_text: ['', 'Generous Referral Bonuses!Comprehensive Benefits Package!', 'https://flashtg.com/flash-technology-careers/.', ' dmagruder@flashtg.com', 'Application Engineer IV - Full Stack Developer needed immediately!Must have a TS/SCI with an active polygraph!']

Engineer the IP (L2/L3) eNSE network configuration through the use of automated systems for configuration deployment. Provide budget input for ongoing life cycles of devices, software releases, licenses, and operating systems for build projects. Leading and road mapping with cross functional teams for alarms, call flows, and upgrades Building systems following designs and integrating them into production networks and infrastructure. Must be part of on-call rotation to respond to trouble issues after hours as part of as tier 2 or tier 3 team. Working with the OpenEdge development team to enhance orchestration, feature request and configuration management tools. Daily health checks to identify gaps and to mitigate possible issue found in the platform. Identify automation opportunities; plus, building and managing virtual machines in OpenStack or KVM environments Creating and using scripting with Ansible or Python for automation development and testing using an ad hoc basis or using vendor and home-grown system applications Leading with internal and external stakeholders to finalize enhancements to support business and operational needs. Defining in performance testing to ensure systems deliver services to their rated capacity. Working with internal and external teams to develop demand models for forecasting and trending system utilization. Creating system designs and understanding of application flows; which satisfy design security criteria and meet availability requirements in keeping with best practices. Driving the growing of the platform as needed to satisfy forecasted demand Ability to document complex platforms and procedures for internal and external teams. Excellent interpersonal and communication skills working closely with all application owners and vendors to ensure end-to-end service performance metrics are achieved.', ' Experience with Linux systems engineering.', ' Administration of RHEL platform host server and guest server configurations.', ' Overseeing network builds from procurement to "In Service”.', ' Experience with Software-Defined Networking Architecture', ' Must have a strong ability to understand end to end call flows for deploying network services.', ' Building systems following designs and integrating them into production networks and infrastructure.', ' Working with internal and external teams to develop demand models for forecasting and trending system utilization.', ' Hands on experience with virtualization of networks/servers.', ' Leading and road mapping with cross functional teams for alarms, call flows, and upgrades', " Work with peer teams to ensure new networks are built and migrated to meet KPI's.", " Bachelor's degree or four or more years of work experience. Experience with IP Layer 1-3 for Edge Networks and strong knowledge of MPLS. Worked with Cisco (VTS), Nokia (Nuage) or Itential (IAP) automation tools. Experience with Linux systems engineering. Hands on experience with virtualization of networks/servers. Four or more years of relevant work experience. Knowledge of fabric networking.", ' Working with the OpenEdge development team to enhance orchestration, feature request and configuration management tools.', " Bachelor's degree or four or more years of work experience.", ' Engineering network solutions with a strong interaction with PNF and VNF applications teams.', ' Experience with Juniper Route Reflectors', ' A strong ability to understand end to end call flows for deploying network services.', ' Leading with internal and external stakeholders to finalize enhancements to support business and operational needs.', ' Experience with Forward Networks', ' Experience with Pica8 OS', 'Desired Skills', ' Knowledge of fabric networking.', ' Experience with Lumina Open Daylight', ' Responsible for engineering IP edge networks at Service Aggregation Points (SAP) to support the networking configuration needed to build and migrate the VCP applications.', ' Engineer the IP (L2/L3) eNSE network configuration through the use of automated systems for configuration deployment.', ' Python scripting a plus.', ' Provide budget input for ongoing life cycles of devices, software releases, licenses, and operating systems for build projects.']

job_title: Senior Storage and Data Systems Engineer (C, C++) up to $200,000 [101]
job_text: ['', 'BS or MS in Computer Science or a similar field (PhD a plus)\xa0Track record of successfully shipping systems software\xa0Experience with lower level systems programming in C or C++\xa0Previous experience building distributed databases or storage software', 'Excellent algorithmic skills: you can tell O(n) from O(n2)\xa0', "Quality focused: you take pride in your code C / C++ programming guru: you are worshipped at school / work\xa0Excellent algorithmic skills: you can tell O(n) from O(n2)\xa0Very customer focused: love engineering that solves people's problems", 'You are passionate about building large distributed systems that will change the way organizations develop applications.\xa0', 'As a Founding Engineer, you will design, implement, and deploy highly distributed, large-scale services. You will translate complex functional and technical requirements into detailed architecture and design. You will be very hands on, and work with others on the engineering team to manage day-to-day development activities, and participate in designs, design reviews, code reviews, and implementation. Our ideal candidate will be passionate about delivering high quality solutions to complex engineering problems, while working within a team.\xa0', '\xa0', 'You are passionate about building large distributed systems that will change the way organizations develop applications.\xa0You are energized working in a startup environment.\xa0You are ready to work with a proven, experienced team to build the next major software platform company.', 'Quality focused: you take pride in your code C / C++ programming guru: you are worshipped at school / work\xa0', 'You are energized working in a startup environment.\xa0', 'Position Responsibilities:', 'One of our client is looking to hire a "Senior Storage and Data Systems Engineer" in Seattle, Washington. Please find the job details below-', 'Previous experience building distributed databases or storage software', "Very customer focused: love engineering that solves people's problems", 'Track record of successfully shipping systems software\xa0', 'Application complexity is shooting through the roof, and a large part of the reason is obsolescence of underlying data platforms that were built for centralized and simpler workloads. We are building the next generation data fabric for cloud native applications - where data mobility and portability is a central theme. This vision is matched by the passion of the founding team (with experience at Google, Facebook, and other internet scale companies), and we are recruiting our first engineers that will help establish the direction for the platform and establish the culture for the company.', 'Education and Previous Positions:', 'About Us:', 'BS or MS in Computer Science or a similar field (PhD a plus)\xa0', 'You are ready to work with a proven, experienced team to build the next major software platform company.', 'Required Skills and Attributes:', 'Why Us?\xa0', 'Experience with lower level systems programming in C or C++\xa0']

['', 'Contribute to new features, maintenance and bug fixing for web, api and backend capabilities using reactjs, nodejs, graphql and more', 'Qualifications:', 'Responsibilities:\xa0', 'This role is an exciting opportunity to join a thriving, well-funded startup with big ambitions. In addition to doing ground breaking work, this role will be pivotal in establishing a culture of open thinking, positive communication, and continuous learning. We are looking for the best and brightest to take our platform to the next level.\xa0', 'The ideal candidate will have a proven record of strong engineering capabilities with high team engagement, a history of leading large initiatives through collaboration, and a passion for architecting with integrity.\xa0', 'Our modern and cutting edge application stack includes kubernetes, docker, reactjs, nodejs,\xa0 graphql and blockchain all running on aws and google cloud and we are excited to find the right candidate to help us develop in this world.', 'Voice is seeking a well rounded, passionate mid to senior level Software Engineer to join our team in either our Brooklyn, NY or Blacksburg, VA office. As a Platform Engineer you will be part of a team of api and backend engineers of various levels and work across the organization to help develop, improve and scale the Voice platform.\xa0', 'Work to reduce or remove bottlenecks and inefficiencies within the platform.', '3 or more years of experience in engineering as an individual contributor using server side javascript\xa0A Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Engineering or relevant discipline.Comfortable facilitating between technology, creative, marketing, and executive teams.Strong software product lifecycle management experience.Track record of defining and launching successful software.The independence to manage, execute, and take initiative without supervision.', 'A Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Engineering or relevant discipline.', 'Understand fundamental design principles and patterns behind a scalable applications', 'Experience with Docker, Continuous Integration, and Continuous Delivery/Deployment and/or any related DevOps tasks', 'Required Technical Skills', 'Desired Technical Skills', 'Proficiency in at least 1 other language than JavaScript', 'Help hire, coach and mentor a team of engineers and/or vendors to greater excellence', 'We are compliant with official health and safety guidelines for COVID-19 workplace conditions, including social distancing and working remotely as appropriate. This position may begin working remotely, however the ability to work on-site in our Brooklyn, New York or Blacksburg, Virginia office is expected (as official guidelines evolve).', 'Track record of defining and launching successful software.', 'Experience with AWS and/or Google Cloud', 'Platform Engineers will be required to be strong in systems architecture, reactjs, api/backend development, and high availability all within the cloud.\xa0 Ideally this candidate will be open to not only teaching new technologies to the team but learning from existing technologies and processes as well.', 'Experience with Yarn, NPM, Jest, Redux, GraphQL, Buildkite, Jira, Atom, RedisExperience with ReactExperience with modern C++ (11 and above) & Blockchain TechnologiesExperience with Docker, Continuous Integration, and Continuous Delivery/Deployment and/or any related DevOps tasksExperience with AWS and/or Google Cloud', 'Contribute to the design and build of a highly scalable, secure and available web, api and backend capabilities', 'Voice is an equal opportunity employer and values diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', 'Experience with Node.js and GraphQL', 'Other duties as assigned.\xa0', 'Expert knowledge of Functional Programming in JavaScript and asynchronous programming', 'Help hire, coach and mentor a team of engineers and/or vendors to greater excellenceHelp estimate projects and tasks and take responsibility for on time deliveryResearch, evaluate and improve the Voice platform.Contribute to the design and build of a highly scalable, secure and available web, api and backend capabilitiesContribute to new features, maintenance and bug fixing for web, api and backend capabilities using reactjs, nodejs, graphql and moreWork to reduce or remove bottlenecks and inefficiencies within the platform.Other duties as assigned.\xa0', 'Experience with Node.js and GraphQLExpert knowledge of Functional Programming in JavaScript and asynchronous programmingProficiency in at least 1 other language than JavaScriptProficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as GitUnderstand fundamental design principles and patterns behind a scalable applications', 'At Voice, we are on a mission to take social media back from big tech. Voice is the first social media platform that empowers communities to self-govern, champions realness and respects user data.\xa0', 'Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git', 'Help estimate projects and tasks and take responsibility for on time delivery', 'Research, evaluate and improve the Voice platform.', '3 or more years of experience in engineering as an individual contributor using server side javascript\xa0', 'The independence to manage, execute, and take initiative without supervision.', 'Experience with modern C++ (11 and above) & Blockchain Technologies', 'Get To Know Voice', 'Strong software product lifecycle management experience.', 'Experience with Yarn, NPM, Jest, Redux, GraphQL, Buildkite, Jira, Atom, Redis', 'Description', 'Experience with React', 'Comfortable facilitating between technology, creative, marketing, and executive teams.']

', 'Essential Functions', 'Physical Demands:', 'Qualifications ', "If you're passionate about building highly scalable data & analytics models and architecture in the cloud, and you are motivated to make an impact in creating robust and scalable data models used by every team, come join us. job_title: Lead Software Engineer: Backend (API & Data Platform)
job_text: ['', 'Some of the technologies you like and what you’ll be working with', 'provide a playground of opportunity, and the tools you need to be productivetreat you as the expert you areallow you to move fast and make mistakescommunicate our expectations and keep you updated as plans changeregard you as an integral and valued member of our Tribetrust you', 'We are growing our tribe and looking for a diverse slate of individuals to help us democratize access to the financial data that reduces perceived risk in Africa and beyond. We love our product, but we love our people more, recognizing that without them, none of this would be possible. We know there is so much talent out there, with so much to offer, but who feel lost or unappreciated in their current position. We want to invite those folks to join Pngme. In case you missed it, we’re an API first data platform. As it so happens, we are in need of talented Software Engineers to scale our API and data infrastructure as we scale with clients to process millions of data points a day.', 'Experience using Apache Spark for ETL development', 'take raw data and build products and insights to inform, measure performance, and discover its greatest value', 'have the experience to manage a passionate and smart team of engineers while delivering your own code', "You are a technical architecture ninja and have a Masters or PhD in a technical fieldExpert with TypeScript, GraphQL, and AWS LambdaExpert architecting data models, and API schema's in production environments at scale.Experience using AWS EMR and AWS LambdaExperience using Apache Spark for ETL developmentExperience with Machine Learning EngineeringC#, Java, and Scala chops are nice to have :)", 'be the best friend of progress', 'As a member of the Engineering team you will provide great value by architecting and building the infrastructure needed to make sense and process our data. You are going to handle data that is completely novel in nature and incredibly rare. Success in this role will only come from a relationship based in trust.', 'You can trust us to...', 'feel comfortable taking risks', 'At Pngme, we are building a data platform to change the way individuals, entrepreneurs, and businesses access finance in sub-Saharan Africa. Financial institutions use our data to make mission critical decisions that drive access to finance in sub-Saharan Africa. While capital is plentiful, it does not flow equally. Why? Without access to the right data, financial institutions cannot properly measure risk or develop financial products tailored to their customers! Africa is the fastest growing developer ecosystem in the world, but there is still a high barrier to entry for developers to access holistic financial data on their customers. It is Pngme’s mission to democratize developers’ access to data and close the finance gap for millions of individuals, entrepreneurs, and businesses in sub-Saharan Africa.', 'allow you to move fast and make mistakes', 'communicate our expectations and keep you updated as plans change', 'treat you as the expert you are', 'C#, Java, and Scala chops are nice to have :)', 'have the experience to manage a passionate and smart team of engineers while delivering your own codehave the experience and desire to build in an empty playgroundbe someone who can come through the firefeel comfortable taking riskslearn and innovate quicklybe the best friend of progressalways iterate as neededtake raw data and build products and insights to inform, measure performance, and discover its greatest valuetrust us', 'trust you', 'always iterate as needed', 'You are a technical architecture ninja and have a Masters or PhD in a technical field', 'have the experience and desire to build in an empty playground', 'Expert with TypeScript, GraphQL, and AWS Lambda', 'trust us', 'learn and innovate quickly', 'Experience using AWS EMR and AWS Lambda', 'We see value in providing equal access to capital so people can increase their wealth and opportunity, despite their limited resources. By providing access to data, we enable financial institutions to comfortably deploy their capital and make data-driven decisions to drive the growth of their business. It isn’t just access to data, it’s also a matter of putting data ownership back into the hands of people. With equal access and ownership of data, we give people financial choice and freedom.', 'regard you as an integral and valued member of our Tribe', 'Experience with Machine Learning Engineering', 'You know Kiva (Oakland) as a mission-driven platform focused on expanding access to finance to help underserved entrepreneurs and communities thrive. We provide the data layer that enables financial institutions like Kiva to operate successfully. ', 'be someone who can come through the fire', 'provide a playground of opportunity, and the tools you need to be productive', "Expert architecting data models, and API schema's in production environments at scale.", 'We will trust you to...']

Ability to focus on given priorities and deliver artifacts on time (deadline driven). Ability to quickly communicate challenges incurred during projects. ', 'Support product documentation team in generating and reviewing product documentation.', 'Relational database (MySQL preferred)', 'Flexible work options, opportunities to give back to your community, social events with colleagues and a comprehensive benefits program inclusive of progressive parental leave.', ' AWS Experience Python Experience Cloud Infrastructure knowledge ', 'Experience and preference collaborating in a team environment.', 'FICO (NYSE: FICO)', 'GIT', ' Lending — 3/4 of US mortgages are approved using the FICO Score. ', 'AWS Experience', ' Java Apache Spark AWS (CloudFormation, EMR, Lambda, others). Spring Framework Web services (REST) Relational database (MySQL preferred) Microservices Kubernetes Docker GIT Gradle Angular  Object-to-relational mapping (e.g. Hibernate)  Object-oriented and functional design Windows and Linux operating system fundamentals ', ' Job Description ', 'you', 'Technical Skills', 'Gradle', ' Object-oriented and functional design', 'Windows and Linux operating system fundamentals', 'Soft Skills', 'Work with Scrum Master and local team designing and developing software and infrastructure.', 'The opportunity to make a difference by leveraging your unique strengths.', 'Python Experience', 'Preferred Skills', 'Support internal operations team for production deployments.', '  Credit Scoring — 150+ billion FICO Scores have been sold to date, making it the most used credit score in the world.   Fraud Detection and Security — 2.6+ billion payment cards globally are protected by FICO fraud systems.   Lending — 3/4 of US mortgages are approved using the FICO Score.   Anti-Money Laundering — our solutions check more than half a billion transactions a day to prevent criminal schemes such as terrorist financing ', 'Apache Spark', ' Credit Scoring — 150+ billion FICO Scores have been sold to date, making it the most used credit score in the world. ', ' "Looking for an opportunity to work with cutting edge technologies and have a rewarding and challenging career? We are looking for a Java Full Stack Software Engineer to work in our Fraud & Security area on our FICO Intelligence Network Insights (FINI) product which brings customers a cloud-based reporting and simulation solution that customers use to evaluate fraud models. As a Lead Software Engineer you will be working in an Agile environment, leading and working with a team of developers, in completing product features and designing software platforms that run in our AWS cloud infrastructure.” ', 'Support team in setting up and executing automated tests.', 'Role:', ' Our Offer to You ', ' Hiring Manager', 'Job Summary', ' Object-to-relational mapping (e.g. Hibernate)', ' Design, code, test and document selected features within the application (FINI product). Work with Scrum Master and local team designing and developing software and infrastructure. Support team in setting up and executing automated tests. Support product documentation team in generating and reviewing product documentation. Support internal operations team for production deployments. ', 'Ability to quickly communicate challenges incurred during projects.', ' FICO (NYSE: FICO) ', ' A culture and work environment strongly reflecting our core values: Act Like an Owner, Delight Our Customers and Earn the Respect of Others. ['', 'Here’s what you get:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or equivalent experience.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Design dimensional data models that satisfy data requirements and address ease of use and performance.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work with users to mock-up dashboards and proof of concept data models.', 'The Data Warehouse Engineer gathers and interprets user analytics requirements, then transforms those requirements into dimensional data models. They collaborate with data analysts, data scientists, and other data consumers within the business to gather and populate data warehouse table structures. The Data Warehouse Engineer implements dimensional models, from building the logical model to implementing the physical model and loading the data with ETL. The engineer makes big data easy through intuitive query writing, performance, and integrating BI tools. They run the full DW stack from design through implementation.', 'We are working on an exclusive retained search for a Data Warehouse Engineer for our client an industry leader experiencing hyper-growth headquartered in Boise, ID.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Charitable contributions and activities that make you feel like a better person', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Extract use cases and requirements from data warehouse users.', "Here's what you’ll be doing:", '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0WORK/LIFE Balance', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Regular team meetings and one-on-ones with your manager to make sure you are heard, and you are on track Career development and lots of internal promotion – this group is growing!', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Deep experience with database optimizer paths and data warehouse performance features.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0BEER30s/Snacks -once COVID passes', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0You will enjoy working with some of the smartest engineers in Boise', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0GREAT benefits', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Fun, collaborative work environment', 'Here’s what you bring to the table:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Design and build out monitoring and support elements to ensure data quality and timeliness.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Minimum of three years of experience implementing dimensional data models (star schemas).', 'Data Warehouse Engineer ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0yearly bonuses', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Tuition reimbursement', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with building data warehouses on cloud infrastructure preferred.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Instantiate the dimensional data models on the Snowflake cloud platform.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Working on the latest and coolest technologies', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Matching 401k contributions', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience dimensional data modeling for data warehousing using star schemas or Snowflake schemas.']

['', 'Ph.D. in Computational Biology, Bioinformatics, Biostatistics, Genetics, Mathematics, Physics, Engineering, or a related field.At least 5 years of experience working in the field data science and/or computational biology.\xa0Preferably 10 years or more experience.Knowledge of biology, particularly in relation to microbial metabolic engineering and discovery.Hands-on experience in analysis of RNA-seq or microarrays, and other large-scale omics datasets.Strong quantitative skills and a background in statistical data analysis and machine learning.Experience in writing robust code in R or Python.Working knowledge of code repository best practices and distributed version control.Exceptional communication skills, with an ability to convey complex computational results to colleagues from a wide range of life sciences backgrounds.Ability to work within a team, across functions (synthetic biology, analytical biochemistry, software, data science), and as an independent contributor, requiring minimal supervision.Ability to lead cross-functional teams to efficiently execute against aggressive goals.', 'We are looking for a quantitative Scientist\xa0with\xa0extensive experience in data science & computational biology. Ideal candidates will have demonstrated experience conducting creative and independent research analyzing a broad range of public and internally generated datasets, with emphases on experimental design, pattern discovery, and predictive modeling.', 'Ability to work within a team, across functions (synthetic biology, analytical biochemistry, software, data science), and as an independent contributor, requiring minimal supervision.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Knowledge of biology, particularly in relation to microbial metabolic engineering and discovery.', 'Design of high throughput, CRISPR based editing experiments using the Onyx™ Digital Genome Engineering Platform.', 'The role can be remote, with regular travel to Pleasanton, CA and Boulder, CO.', 'Develop new algorithms and maintain bioinformatics & data science pipelines.', 'Create and deliver both internal & public presentations on use of the Onyx™ platform to enable rapid Forward Genome Engineering & Discovery.', 'Requirements:', 'Development of tools and reports that integrate genetics and functional genomics to drive new target prediction and summarizing the results in ways that enable effective decision making.', 'Experience in writing robust code in R or Python.', 'Senior Scientist or Associate Director of Data Science', 'Hands-on experience in analysis of RNA-seq or microarrays, and other large-scale omics datasets.', 'Strong quantitative skills and a background in statistical data analysis and machine learning.', 'Discovery and elucidation of causal genetic factors in massively parallel genome editing experiments.\xa0', "Inscripta\xa0is developing the world's first scalable platform for benchtop Digital Genome Engineering. The company’s advanced CRISPR-based platform, consisting of an instrument, reagents, and software, will offer a fully automated workflow that enables multiplexed, trackable editing of cells at an unprecedented scale. Inscripta’s goal is to empower scientists whose gene editing research is stifled by current technical and licensing limitations. By providing this unique platform and engaging in collaborative business practices, such as making its MAD7 CRISPR nuclease free for research purposes, the company enables scientists to realize a new era of biological discovery.\xa0Due to rapid growth Inscripta has an opening for a\xa0Senior Scientist or Associate Director of Data Science.\xa0", "Inscripta\xa0offers a competitive base salary, bonus plan, benefits package and stock options to all team members.\xa0Join us and work with a great team of people developing the world's first scalable platform for benchtop Digital Genome Engineering. Inscripta is headquartered in Boulder, CO with offices in Pleasanton and San Diego, CA.\xa0The role can be remote, with regular travel to Pleasanton, CA and Boulder, CO.", 'Ability to lead cross-functional teams to efficiently execute against aggressive goals.', 'Communicate ideas and results to other scientists.', 'Inscripta', 'At least 5 years of experience working in the field data science and/or computational biology.\xa0Preferably 10 years or more experience.', 'Lead development of Knowledge Graph and machine learning based algorithms to establish useful relationships between many thousands of genetic, molecular and phenotypic entities, resulting in increased discovery rates for genome engineering applications.', 'Design of high throughput, CRISPR based editing experiments using the Onyx™ Digital Genome Engineering Platform.Lead development of Knowledge Graph and machine learning based algorithms to establish useful relationships between many thousands of genetic, molecular and phenotypic entities, resulting in increased discovery rates for genome engineering applications.Discovery and elucidation of causal genetic factors in massively parallel genome editing experiments.\xa0Development of tools and reports that integrate genetics and functional genomics to drive new target prediction and summarizing the results in ways that enable effective decision making.Communicate ideas and results to other scientists.Create and deliver both internal & public presentations on use of the Onyx™ platform to enable rapid Forward Genome Engineering & Discovery.Develop new algorithms and maintain bioinformatics & data science pipelines.', 'We are looking for a quantitative Scientist', 'extensive experience in data science & computational biology', 'with', 'Working knowledge of code repository best practices and distributed version control.', 'Ph.D. in Computational Biology, Bioinformatics, Biostatistics, Genetics, Mathematics, Physics, Engineering, or a related field.', 'Exceptional communication skills, with an ability to convey complex computational results to colleagues from a wide range of life sciences backgrounds.']

['', 'Experience with\xa0configuration as\xa0code tools such as Ansible, Terraform etc.\xa0', 'What We Offer:', 'This position will start remotely.\xa0', 'Location', '\xa0', 'A willingness to participating in an on-call rotation\xa0', 'At Vivid Seats, you will have the opportunity to work with the flexibility and speed of a startup; while operating at massive, profitable scale. We keep our teams lean, allowing each employee direct accountability of creating a positive ticket buying experience. We are relentless and move quickly to release new features and content to our applications. Good ideas are heard and implemented, and hard work rewarded. Being a part of our team means having the ability to drive impact and own the innovation that connects our tens of millions of unique monthly users to the memorable experiences that only live events create.\xa0\xa0', 'What We Offer:\xa0', 'Chicago, IL 60606\xa0\xa0', 'Experience in either modeling transaction or data warehousing with an interest in learning both methodologies\xa0', 'As a\xa0Senior Data Engineer,\xa0you will\xa0maintain a holistic view of the Vivid Seat’s data architecture with an understanding of how it relates to the systems that depend upon it. You’ll partner with engineering teams to create data models and assist in designing our transactional data stores. This includes designing and building data systems and automated processes\xa0for our\xa0underlying cloud infrastructure and deployment pipelines.\xa0You’ll mature operational stability of the data platform through best practices, automation and monitoring while staying up to date on new and emerging technologies, planning accordingly to incorporate valuable concepts to enhance our data schema and capabilities.\xa0', 'ETL pipeline and tooling experience\xa0', 'This position will start remotely.', 'To be successful, you’ll need:', '\ufeffLocation', 'Experience with\xa0configuration as\xa0code tools such as Ansible, Terraform etc.\xa0Experience with containerization such as Docker\xa0Experience with continuous integration, testing, and deployment using tools such as\xa0Jenkins\xa0', 'Experience with containerization such as Docker\xa0', '111 N Canal Suite #800\xa0\xa0', 'Expert knowledge of a relational database platform such as MySQL, Postgres, Oracle or SQL Server\xa0', 'Vivid Seats is the largest independent online ticket marketplace, sending tens of millions of fans to live events. Experiences Matter - which is why we continue to grow year over year. Working at Vivid Seats puts you front and center at the opportunity to scale our best in class platform that allows our fans to sit closer and experience more.\xa0\xa0', 'Proficiency in working in a Linux environment\xa0', 'Additional Experience of Interest:', '\ufeffLocation:\xa0', ':\xa0', 'Senior Data Engineer,\xa0', 'To be successful, you’ll need:\xa0', 'We are passionate about creating memorable experiences for our fans and the best in class experience for our employees. Vivid Seats offers competitive compensation levels, individual and team-based bonus opportunities, 401K matching, a generous benefits package and Flex PTO policy plus a variety of workplace perks.\xa0', 'The Opportunity:', 'Expert knowledge of a relational database platform such as MySQL, Postgres, Oracle or SQL Server\xa0Experience in either modeling transaction or data warehousing with an interest in learning both methodologies\xa0ETL pipeline and tooling experience\xa0Coding and scripting experience using Java, Python or Bash\xa0Proficiency in working in a Linux environment\xa0Cloud experience with either GCP, AWS or Azure and experience running data platforms within a cloud environment\xa0A willingness to participating in an on-call rotation\xa0', 'Cloud experience with either GCP, AWS or Azure and experience running data platforms within a cloud environment\xa0', 'Additional Experience of Interest:\xa0', 'Coding and scripting experience using Java, Python or Bash\xa0', 'Experience with continuous integration, testing, and deployment using tools such as\xa0Jenkins\xa0', 'The Opportunity:\xa0']

job_title: Staff Data Scientist - League Data Central, Gameplay
job_text: ['', 'Experience working in an Agile environment', 'Develop relationships with product and engineering teams to understand their data science needs', 'Required Qualifications', ' Ph.D. in Machine Learning, AI, Statistics, Math, Physics, or related Computer Science/Quantitative field with 3+ years of industry experience, or equivalent experience Deep knowledge of League of Legends gameplay and metagame systems (e.g. how progression through ranked ladder works) OR experience with a similar PVP competitive game Hands-on programming experience in Python and SQL Deep knowledge of data science methodologies, including machine learning, statistics, deep learning, optimization Experience in data science use cases and data engineering concepts (e.g., modeling, pipelines, distributed processing) Stakeholder management skills. Ability to build alignment, define scope, deliver, and maintain data science products Strong written and verbal communication skills. Ability to effectively present and share information across a wide array of technical expertise and seniority within the organization ', 'Act as a mentor to advise and level up data scientists in both data science and technical best practices', 'Hands-on programming experience in Python and SQL', 'Experience in data science use cases and data engineering concepts (e.g., modeling, pipelines, distributed processing)', 'Identify opportunities for data-driven approaches that deliver value to teams across the organization, and champion data solutions to product leads and engineers', '===', 'Work with stakeholders across the organization and on initiatives, gathering requirements, designing project plans, determining approaches, and defining success criteria', 'Deep knowledge of League of Legends gameplay and metagame systems (e.g. how progression through ranked ladder works) OR experience with a similar PVP competitive game', 'Experience with cloud data tools (AWS, GCP)', "It’s our policy to provide equal employment opportunity for all applicants and members of Riot Games, Inc. Riot Games makes reasonable accommodations for handicapped and disabled Rioters and does not unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, handicap, veteran status, marital status, criminal history, or any other category protected by applicable federal and state law, including the City of Los Angeles’ Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ordinance relating to an applicant's criminal history (LAMC 189.00).", 'Experience with elo rating or similar ranking and match-making systems', ' Experience with elo rating or similar ranking and match-making systems Experience with Scala, Spark, big data tech (e.g., Hadoop) Experience with cloud data tools (AWS, GCP) Experience working in an Agile environment ', 'Responsibilities', 'Improve our data science practice by identifying novel techniques and technical approaches', 'Our Perks', '.', 'Collaborate with team leadership, leading the execution and delivery of data science products that directly impact League of Legends systems and player experience ', 'Staff Data Scientist on the League Data Central team', 'Strong written and verbal communication skills. Ability to effectively present and share information across a wide array of technical expertise and seniority within the organization', 'Experience with Scala, Spark, big data tech (e.g., Hadoop)', ' Collaborate with team leadership, leading the execution and delivery of data science products that directly impact League of Legends systems and player experience  Develop relationships with product and engineering teams to understand their data science needs Identify opportunities for data-driven approaches that deliver value to teams across the organization, and champion data solutions to product leads and engineers Work with stakeholders across the organization and on initiatives, gathering requirements, designing project plans, determining approaches, and defining success criteria Improve our data science practice by identifying novel techniques and technical approaches Act as a mentor to advise and level up data scientists in both data science and technical best practices ', 'Ph.D. in Machine Learning, AI, Statistics, Math, Physics, or related Computer Science/Quantitative field with 3+ years of industry experience, or equivalent experience', 'Deep knowledge of data science methodologies, including machine learning, statistics, deep learning, optimization', 'Desired Qualifications', 'Stakeholder management skills. Ability to build alignment, define scope, deliver, and maintain data science products']

["Assess our current Data Science and ML capabilities and define & drive the execution of a world-class multi-year roadmap that impacts both our top line and bottom line. You will work closely with product and engineering leads in this effort. Responsible for owning and improving Crunchyroll's personalization algorithms and associated infrastructure Alongside infrastructure, improving the experimentation framework by building out a comprehensive A/B testing strategy Collaborate with Data Engineers in building a multi-functional feature repository Partner closely with Product teams in architecting, designing, and implementing features that scale. ", 'About You:', 'About the Team', 'At Crunchyroll, our motto is simple - we champion the extraordinary by super-serving our super-fans. Say that 5 times fast! What better way to do so than by helping our millions of fans across the globe discover their next favorite show? ', 'Competitive salary “Use What You Need” time away from work policy Medical, dental, vision, STD, LTD, and life insurance Health care and dependent care FSA 401(k) plan with employer match Employer-paid commuter benefit On-site gym, showers, yoga, and wellness classes Support program for new parents Catered lunch 4 days per week Fun, passionate and skilled co-workers Pet insurance and dog-friendly office ', "Questions about Crunchyroll's hiring process? Please check out our FAQ ", 'Join us in enhancing and building new personalization features for each of our millions of fans. ', 'Crunchyroll employees are currently working from home, and we are still conducting remote interviews and hiring during this time. This role is expected to start remotely, and we’ll work closely with you as we understand every person has unique circumstances. ', 'Partner closely with Product teams in architecting, designing, and implementing features that scale. ', 'Location: San Francisco', 'We are a humble team that takes on not-so-humble challenges. From supporting the reporting needs of a few partner teams way back in 2015, to building a widely used data platform that provides custom solutions to multiple downstream consumers today; our journey has been exciting, celebratory, and educational. ', 'A day in the life of our Staff Engineer:', "Master's Degree in computer science or equivalent experience ", '3+ years of experience with Spark ', 'Detailed understanding of software architecture, object-oriented design, and design patterns ', 'Alongside infrastructure, improving the experimentation framework by building out a comprehensive A/B testing strategy ', ' ', 'With our data platform, we now power reporting, personalization, analytics and other cross-functional integrations. ', 'Foundational computer science background ', 'Familiarity with RESTful APIs ', 'Comfortable with complex SQL querying and large datasets ', 'Familiarity/experience in building recommender systems ', 'Collaborate with Data Engineers in building a multi-functional feature repository ', 'Our values as a team - we love opensource, encourage collaboration, value opinions, and foster continuous learning. ', 'Experienced in conducting experimentation (A/B testing) ', 'Familiarity working with UNIX systems ', 'Pet insurance and dog-friendly office ', 'Medical, dental, vision, STD, LTD, and life insurance ', 'Benefits and Perks: San Francisco Office', 'Basic knowledge of Data Engineering and Database technologies ', 'Experience building highly scalable, distributed systems ', 'Crunchyroll is the world’s most popular anime brand, connects anime and manga fans across 200+ countries and territories with 360-degree experiences. ', 'You value, seek out, and foster diversity. We are a global team from many diverse backgrounds, with different experiences and perspectives. To complement this team, you will welcome ideas that are different from your own and be skilled at finding and building from common ground. ', "Parker + Lynch is looking for a Senior Software Engineer\xa0for one of our biggest clients in Orange, CA.\xa0Below is the qualification's summary about this position. If this Senior Software Engineer position is something you would be interested in, please feel free to call me directly at (310)-569-3091.    ", 'You are a broadly skilled engineer', 'You are a creative thinker, not bound by "the way things have always been done". What you know is less important than how well you learn and innovate. We don\'t need engineers who know all the answers; we need engineers who can invent the answers no one has thought of yet, to the questions yet to be asked. ', 'About The Role', 'Our Senior Engineers are end-to-end owners. You will participate actively in all aspects of designing, building, and delivering products for our clients. We have dozens of individual, mission-focused teams working across a wide spectrum of technological challenges. You will have the opportunity, depending on your interests and aptitude, to work on large-scale distributed systems coordinating thousands of servers in cloud and physical data centers around the world, petabyte-scale data challenges, machine learning, advanced visualizations, and interactive user interfaces – to name a few. Senior Engineers contribute to more than our product – they build up our team. Through a combination of mentoring, technical leadership, and/or direct management of small teams, they make others better and raise the bar for those around them. ', ' ', 'Equal Opportunity Employer/Veterans/Disabled ', 'You work with confidence and without ego. ', 'You value, seek out, and foster diversity. ', 'You have a sustained track record ', 'You have a product-focused mindset. You have the passion and ability to contribute to the process of discovering what will delight our clients and push forward one of the world’s largest and most influential industries toward a vision of openness, transparency, and evidence-based decision-making. ', 'You work with confidence and without ego. Our engineers have deep knowledge and exercise a high degree of leadership in their daily work. You have strongly-held, defensible ideas, and advocate for what you believe is right. You are also adept at identifying and evaluating trade-offs, willing to be proven wrong, and quick to walk through fire to support your fellow teammates. ', 'Senior Software Engineer', 'You understand engineering fundamentals. ', "You understand engineering fundamentals. At our scale, many off-the-shelf techniques and existing technologies (open source and enterprise) simply don't work. You are able to work from first principles to evaluate solutions and adapt them to a unique environment. ", 'You are a creative thinker, ', "You have a sustained track record of making significant, self-directed, and end-to-end contributions to large and impactful software projects. You think beyond just the task at hand to deeply understand the 'why' behind what you are doing. ", 'If you are interested in this Senior Software Engineer\xa0position in Orange County, CA or other IT & Engineering, please email your resume to Kevin.Schreiber@parkerlynch.com or apply at www.parkerlynch.com. ', 'Senior Engineers contribute to more than our product – they build up our team. Through a combination of mentoring, technical leadership, and/or direct management of small teams, they make others better and raise the bar for those around them. ', ' About The Role ', 'The Company will consider qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records', ' Who We Are Looking For:', 'To read our Candidate Privacy Information Statement, which explains how we will use your information, please Https://www.parkerlynch.com/candidate-privacy/. ', 'We have dozens of individual, mission-focused teams working across a wide spectrum of technological challenges. ', 'You have a product-focused mindset. ', 'You are a broadly skilled engineer, accustomed to developing web services. You have experience building always-on systems, working across a variety of technologies and service layers. ', 'You have a sustained track record of making significant, self-directed, and end-to-end contributions to large and impactful software projects. You think beyond just the task at hand to deeply understand the \'why\' behind what you are doing. You understand engineering fundamentals. At our scale, many off-the-shelf techniques and existing technologies (open source and enterprise) simply don\'t work. You are able to work from first principles to evaluate solutions and adapt them to a unique environment. You are a broadly skilled engineer, accustomed to developing web services. You have experience building always-on systems, working across a variety of technologies and service layers. You have a product-focused mindset. You have the passion and ability to contribute to the process of discovering what will delight our clients and push forward one of the world’s largest and most influential industries toward a vision of openness, transparency, and evidence-based decision-making. You work with confidence and without ego. Our engineers have deep knowledge and exercise a high degree of leadership in their daily work. You have strongly-held, defensible ideas, and advocate for what you believe is right. You are also adept at identifying and evaluating trade-offs, willing to be proven wrong, and quick to walk through fire to support your fellow teammates. You value, seek out, and foster diversity. We are a global team from many diverse backgrounds, with different experiences and perspectives. To complement this team, you will welcome ideas that are different from your own and be skilled at finding and building from common ground. You are a creative thinker, not bound by "the way things have always been done". What you know is less important than how well you learn and innovate. We don\'t need engineers who know all the answers; we need engineers who can invent the answers no one has thought of yet, to the questions yet to be asked. ']

We also have an annual company offsite, Shark Week, to get quality in-person time with the entire company at least once a year. We also allow employees to outfit their workstations to meet their needs—whether remote or in office.', 'We value development. You will work with some of the smartest and most interesting people in the industry. We are a high-performance organization that is always challenging ourselves to continuously grow. We also provide all employees with reimbursement for relevant conferences, training, and education.', 'API versioning, access control, and other best practices', 'We care about your physical, financial and mental well-being. We offer generous parental leave with transition time built-in upon return to work. We offer competitive compensation and a 401k plan with up to a 4% employer match. ['', 'The Talent Acquisition Team at Fauna works primarily on a direct sourcing model; Fauna does not accept resumes from recruitment agencies and is not responsible for any related fees for resumes submitted to job postings, directly to hiring managers, or any of our employees.', 'What You Will Do:', 'Why Fauna?', 'Bonus Points:', 'Document best practices, guides, systems design, reference architectures and implementations.', 'Experience deploying and operating services on AWS and GCP.', 'Fauna is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. Our company is committed to fair hiring practices, and building a diverse environment for our employees. You will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, age, or veteran status.', 'What You Will Bring:', 'Design, develop, maintain and support tools, services and processes across Amazon Web Services (AWS) and Google Cloud Platform (GCP).Build automation tools and frameworks that enable developers to effortlessly provision, deploy, and monitor their services.Evaluate new tools and technologies through POCs and propose solutions for implementation.Practice strong software development principles and best practices: Test-driven development (TDD), CI/CD, code refactoring, coding standards, etc.Document best practices, guides, systems design, reference architectures and implementations.Coach, mentor and cross-train team members.Participate in an on-call rotation to ensure timely resolution of incidents.', 'A self starter who takes the initiative to improve both themselves and the team through continuous learning and development.', 'Experience with log aggregation: DataDog, StackDriver, etc', "Backed by premier venture investors Madrona Venture Group, ADDITION, GV, and CRV, Fauna is a well-funded startup, with a 100% remote organization. We're led by an experienced leadership team hailing from Microsoft, Okta, Twitter, Elastic, Juniper and Oracle. Every day we are relentless in our mission to innovate, exceed customer expectations and continually disrupt our market. To build a great company requires exceptionally talented, passionate, and committed team members. If you are the type of person who commits to a mission, we want to hear from you! In exchange for your hard work and great contributions, Fauna provides all of its Fauns with an exceptional compensation, equity, and benefits package along with the opportunity to work remotely.", "Fauna is the data API for client-serverless applications. A web-native GraphQL interface with support for custom business logic and integration with the serverless ecosystem enables developers to simplify code and ship faster. The underlying globally distributed storage and compute fabric is fast, consistent, and reliable, with a modern cloud infrastructure that is highly secure and highly available. Fauna makes it easy for developers to get started and it removes the need to think about database operations and scalability. At Fauna, we're disrupting a $40B industry, and we're just getting started.", 'Design, develop, maintain and support tools, services and processes across Amazon Web Services (AWS) and Google Cloud Platform (GCP).', 'Experience with secrets management, certificates, encryption and keys: Vault, AWS KMS, etc.', 'Experience with Linux based production systems operations.', 'Hands-on knowledge of one or more infrastructure-as-code tools and technologies: Ansible, Terraform, Packer, CloudFormation, etc.', 'Experience with CI/CD and Pipeline-As-Code: Jenkins, CircleCI, Github Actions, Harness, etc.', 'Fauna is seeking an experienced software engineer with a passion for creating developer tools. ['Experience with embedded communications, particularly distributed systems and distributed communication architectures (e.g., MQTT) ', 'Why join us?', 'Oversee the design and implementation of instrument software architectures, from embedded firmware to cloud services integration Lead and grow a team of software engineers, working in close collaboration with technical leads on hardware, wetware, and cloud engineering teams Incorporate nascent advances in the fields of robotics, machine vision, imaging processing, and spatial data visualization into the team’s development efforts and workflows Produce highly reliable, maintainable, and test-driven codebases Manage software product life cycles in R&D and commercial pipelines ', 'Why join us? ', 'Oversee the design and implementation of instrument software architectures, from embedded firmware to cloud services integration ', 'Skills we are looking for: ', '\xa0 \xa0 \xa0Nice to have ', ' ', 'Extensive experience with Python, including Cython and/or the CPython C/C++ API ', 'Experience with real time image processing in high bandwidth environments ', 'All applicants must be legally entitled to work for any employer in the US.', 'Experience with multi-axis robotics, fluidic systems, and/or vision systems Experience developing firmware for or interfacing with modern embedded systems (e.g., STM32) Experience with embedded communications, particularly distributed systems and distributed communication architectures (e.g., MQTT) Experience with real time image processing in high bandwidth environments ', 'BS/MS in computer science or engineering, with 5+ years of industry experience ', 'Experience with multi-axis robotics, fluidic systems, and/or vision systems ', 'We are seeking an enthusiastic and experienced senior Python engineer to lead our systems software team. You will help design and orchestrate the implementation of the software infrastructure that drives our robotic spatial sequencing instrumentation. The systems software team works at the center of a highly cross-functional effort to realize our vision for a revolutionary spatial omics platform. \xa0 ', 'Experience developing firmware for or interfacing with modern embedded systems (e.g., STM32) ', 'Skills we are looking for:', 'Lead and grow a team of software engineers, working in close collaboration with technical leads on hardware, wetware, and cloud engineering teams ', 'BS/MS in computer science or engineering, with 5+ years of industry experience Extensive experience with Python, including Cython and/or the CPython C/C++ API Experience developing hardware-centric software involving: control systems (motion, pneumatic, fluidic, etc), distributed architectures, IPC, messaging queues, high reliability / uptime, etc. Experience managing a team of engineers in a production environment Experience with requirements development and project management Experience shipping a software product, including standing up CI/CD and managing deployments in remote environments Strong communication skills, including the ability to document and communicate concepts diagramatically Strong organizational skills; prioritization of planning, documentation, and team communication ', 'Experience with requirements development and project management ', 'This is a unique opportunity to apply cutting edge robotics design and control principles to enable breakthroughs at the cutting edge of genetics and medicine. ReadCoor is building a new tool that combines high-dimensional microscopy and gene sequencing to produce high-precision, three-dimensional localization of biomolecules in complex samples. As part of our dynamic and rapidly-growing team, you will: ', '\xa0 \xa0Nice to have', 'Strong communication skills, including the ability to document and communicate concepts diagramatically ', 'Manage software product life cycles in R&D and commercial pipelines ', 'Experience developing hardware-centric software involving: control systems (motion, pneumatic, fluidic, etc), distributed architectures, IPC, messaging queues, high reliability / uptime, etc. ', '\xa0 \xa0 \xa0Required ', 'Experience managing a team of engineers in a production environment ', '\xa0 \xa0Required', 'Produce highly reliable, maintainable, and test-driven codebases ', 'Incorporate nascent advances in the fields of robotics, machine vision, imaging processing, and spatial data visualization into the team’s development efforts and workflows ', 'Strong organizational skills; prioritization of planning, documentation, and team communication ', 'Experience shipping a software product, including standing up CI/CD and managing deployments in remote environments ']
