job_title: Sr. Software Engineer - Precision Medicine Data MGT
job_text: ['', 'Make recommendations for optimization and performance improvements to database design, as well as improvements to ETL processes and tuning of software and hardware for existing and projected needs;', 'Contribute to staff evaluations.', 'Lead and manage strategic activities, including adoption of cloud services and continuous integration strategies;', 'Preferred Job Qualifications:', 'Johns Hopkins Health System and its affiliates are drug-free workplace employers.', 'Johns Hopkins\xa0Health System\xa0and its affiliates\xa0are an Equal Opportunity / Affirmative Action employers. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, age, national origin, mental or physical disability, genetic information, veteran status, or any other status protected by federal, state, or local law.', 'Serve as a specialist/consultant on complex projects;', 'Develop and validate the creation and maintenance of enterprise data definitions and metadata;', '\xa0STRATEGY/LEADERSHIP', 'Extract and transform data to comply with researcher requirements;', 'Technical certifications in Epic Clarity or Caboodle, preferred.', 'IMPLEMENTATION AND MAINTENANCE', ' ', 'Work with source system owners to establish and measure data quality metrics, investigate and resolve source data issues, and continuously evaluate and refine transformation rules;', 'Design and deliver guidelines that allow a broad base of internal and external developers to build content sourced in the data lake while adhering to established standards and strategy;', 'Required Experience:', 'Required Education: ', 'Conform to data policies, governance structures and control frameworks for the ongoing management of data to ensure convergence, synchronization, accuracy, completeness and reliability;', 'Deliver data to research groups using the Precision Medicine Analytics Platform;', 'The primary responsibility of the Sr. Software\xa0Engineer is to work on data extraction, transformation and load to support research and data visualization projects. This may involve extending the data lake with additional data to meet business needs. To achieve this the Data Engineer will:', 'JHH:', 'Monitor changes and resolve highly complex problems by responding as problems arise; Accomplish this by reviewing all processing and output of the newly implemented solution, and by proactively ensuring the solution works successfully in order to satisfy customer requirements and to provide a smooth transition to the new solution;Oversee changes by adhering to the change management policies and procedures for any given project to communicate to all parties the nature, significance, and risk factors of the solution;Conform to data policies, governance structures and control frameworks for the ongoing management of data to ensure convergence, synchronization, accuracy, completeness and reliability;Make recommendations for optimization and performance improvements to database design, as well as improvements to ETL processes and tuning of software and hardware for existing and projected needs;Work with source system owners to establish and measure data quality metrics, investigate and resolve source data issues, and continuously evaluate and refine transformation rules;Define roles and responsibilities for centralized and decentralized data management functions.', '\xa0Equivalency Formula: ', 'Assess the relative impact to IT strategy and interpret meaning to senior IT leadership team;', 'Job Responsibilities:', 'Monitor changes and resolve highly complex problems by responding as problems arise; Accomplish this by reviewing all processing and output of the newly implemented solution, and by proactively ensuring the solution works successfully in order to satisfy customer requirements and to provide a smooth transition to the new solution;', 'We are committed to providing a healthy and safe environment for our patients, visitors and staff members. The Johns Hopkins Hospital has a tobacco-free at work policy. Employees must refrain from using any tobacco products during their work shifts — including while at lunch or on breaks, and whether they are on or off campus.', 'Formulate and articulate plans for data or infrastructure architecture as needed;', ' Six years of related work experience with computer systems and applications.', 'Implement data ingest pipelines and transformations into the Precision Medicine Analytics Platform data lake;', ' Knowledge in the assigned application as well as the platform on which it runs. Requires demonstrated experience in developing data models and data architecture. Experience with cloud-based data transformation technologies, preferred.', 'JHH: Related experience beyond minimum training experience qualifications may substitute for formal education requirement on a two years experience-for-one year education basis', 'Transform data to comply with standards such as the OMOP Common Data Model;', 'Implement data ingest pipelines and transformations into the Precision Medicine Analytics Platform data lake;Transform data to comply with standards such as the OMOP Common Data Model;Extract and transform data to comply with researcher requirements;Extract and transform data to comply with requirements from data visualization applications;Deliver data to research groups using the Precision Medicine Analytics Platform;Design and deliver guidelines that allow a broad base of internal and external developers to build content sourced in the data lake while adhering to established standards and strategy;Develop and validate the creation and maintenance of enterprise data definitions and metadata;Serve as a specialist/consultant on complex projects;Formulate and articulate plans for data or infrastructure architecture as needed;Participate in project planning to ensure effective use of technology and/or business process to meet customers’ needs;Track relevant cloud technologies to:Determine their maturity and applicability to the enterprise;Assess the relative impact to IT strategy and interpret meaning to senior IT leadership team;Lead and manage strategic activities, including adoption of cloud services and continuous integration strategies;', 'Extract and transform data to comply with requirements from data visualization applications;', 'Define roles and responsibilities for centralized and decentralized data management functions.', 'Participate in project planning to ensure effective use of technology and/or business process to meet customers’ needs;', 'Establish and monitor project and task schedules and ensure adherence to work deadlines;', '\xa0Required Experience:', 'Track relevant cloud technologies to:Determine their maturity and applicability to the enterprise;', ' Bachelor’s degree required. Additional experience may be substituted for education. ', 'Position Summary:', 'DESIGN, DEVELOPMENT, and DEPLOYMENT ', 'Oversee changes by adhering to the change management policies and procedures for any given project to communicate to all parties the nature, significance, and risk factors of the solution;', 'Establish and monitor project and task schedules and ensure adherence to work deadlines;Contribute to staff evaluations.', 'The Sr. Software Engineer\xa0supports the Johns Hopkins in Health Precision Medicine initiative. The position has several responsibilities, including building ingest of data from source systems to the Precision Medicine data lake and transforming data to serve a number of different data consumers, including researchers for COVID-19.\xa0The Sr. Software Engineer\xa0reports to a Johns Hopkins IT Health Data Integration Services manager but is also expected to work closely with the Technology Innovation Center. This position plays an important role in helping Johns Hopkins leverage Electronic Medical Record and other data assets for clinical research and for the development of clinical and patient facing applications. It is important for this role to understand the information and integration needs, source systems, quality standards, report and analytic requirements, and electronic medical record data to support centralized and decentralized development of institutional and business intelligence content.', 'Equivalency Formula: ']

establish/maintain effective working relationships and provide support to data engineer, report developers, analysts and other staff as it relates to data, reporting, testing and communications', '·\xa0\xa0Good knowledge of industry leading data quality and data protection management practices', '·\xa0\xa0Good knowledge of Oracle databases', '·\xa0\xa0Skill in keyboarding accurately at a moderate rate of speed', 'SUMMARY OF RESPONSIBILITIES:', 'The Fayetteville Public Works Commission is looking for an individual to our Data Governance Administrator within our Data and Analystics team!', '·\xa0\xa0Good knowledge of data related government regulatory requirements and emerging trends and issues', 'SUMMARY OF RESPONSIBILITIES: This class is responsible for creating, implementing and maintaining data governance activities, communications, standards, goals, processes and technologies that will support organization-wide data quality, consistency, protection of sensitive data and complex analytic use cases focused on meeting business requirements.\xa0Responsibilities will include, but not be limited to the following:\xa0working with data, IT and business teams to identify known data protection requirements and to define, establish, maintain and communicate data quality, retention, and protection rules and definitions; lead users through data governance concepts, benefits of policies and procedures and ensure adoption and adherence to the enterprise data governance framework; leading teams focused on executing data governance initiatives around tools, technologies, resources and processes; serving as the primary knowledge source and point of escalation for business users for data governance, quality, retention, and protection issues; leading teams to facilitate issue resolution, responding to regulatory protection requirements, implementing process change, and improving the quality and value of core data assets to support stakeholder objectives and the strategic requirements of the organization; providing governance leadership to projects involving any of the upstream or downstream data flows and processes such as analytic use case development; defining performance and quality metrics to indicate compliance with data related policies, standards, roles, responsibilities and adoption requirements; applying data governance concepts, principles and frameworks to execute data profiling, data quality, data catalog, metadata management, and sensitive data management activities; and maintaining all data governance artifacts surrounding best practices, standards, tools and technologies. job_title: Senior Software Engineer, Supply Growth Team
job_text: ['', 'Who we are:', 'Chartboost is looking for an experienced Senior Software Engineer to build tools and micro-services that support our supply business. You will be a key member of a team that builds different products focused on supply growth and can have a big impact on the company. If you enjoy being challenged, learning new things, and finding creative solutions to problems this is the place for you!', 'More about us:', 'BS in Computer Science or equivalent on-the-job experience', 'Who you are:', 'Catered lunches and fully stocked kitchens', 'Bonus points:', "We are proud of the product we have built and appreciate the impact it has on other people's businesses and lives. We want to be surrounded by people who are always finding opportunities to try something new and grow. We love data and anything that helps drive intelligent decisions and always design with the user in mind. Sounds like a fit? Join us, and be part of the team that will change the future of mobile gaming!", 'Investigate, audit, and migrate databases (MongoDB, MySQL)', 'About the role:', 'Maintain and improve existing ad operations services (Python, Node.js, Javascript, MySQL, MongoDB, AWS, Jenkins)Improve monitoring and alerting on service health and business KPIsRapidly prototype and deploy new services required to support new business and growthDesign and develop tools and systems to improve the efficacy and efficiency of the ad operations teamsHelp design, implement, and monitor proof-of-concept experimentsInvestigate, audit, and migrate databases (MongoDB, MySQL)Collaborate with product and engineering teams within Chartboost to define specifications for new features and products across our entire tech stack', 'Experience building data pipelines, especially for machine learning', 'The opportunity to help build a company with the founding team', 'Any cool Full Stack projects you can share with us!', 'Experience working with Flask appsExperience with OpenRTB/programmatic advertising, mobile games, or game advertisers/publishersYou have worked with React/Redux\xa0Experience building data pipelines, especially for machine learningExperience with AirflowYou’re familiar with Hadoop or BigQueryAny cool Full Stack projects you can share with us!', 'Flex Vacation – personal time to refresh your mind/body/soul, spend time with loved ones and celebrate life events. There is no accrual or specific limit to the amount of time an employee may use', 'Commuter Program and 401k savings plan', 'Experience working with Flask apps', 'Help design, implement, and monitor proof-of-concept experiments', 'Experience with Airflow', 'What we offer:', 'Stock Options - you will have a stake in the future success of Chartboost', 'Rapidly prototype and deploy new services required to support new business and growth', 'Improve monitoring and alerting on service health and business KPIs', '5+ years of professional experience in software development', 'Experience with OpenRTB/programmatic advertising, mobile games, or game advertisers/publishers', 'Design and develop tools and systems to improve the efficacy and efficiency of the ad operations teams', 'You have worked with React/Redux\xa0', 'What you’ll do:', 'Chartboost is the leading in-app monetization and programmatic advertising platform. We reach an audience of over 900M unique users every month across more than 300,000 mobile games and work with 90% of the top grossing iOS and Android game developers, globally. The Chartboost SDK is the highest-integrated independent mobile ad SDK and through Chartboost Exchange, Ad Network, and other services, we empower developers to build businesses, while connecting advertisers to highly engaged audiences.\xa0', 'You have experience in web, API, and Python development', 'Maintain and improve existing ad operations services (Python, Node.js, Javascript, MySQL, MongoDB, AWS, Jenkins)', 'We are an equal opportunity employer — we celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees and make our hiring decisions without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.', 'Experience working with databases: SQL, NoSQL, Key-value stores, etc.', '5+ years of professional experience in software developmentYou have experience in web, API, and Python developmentExperience working with databases: SQL, NoSQL, Key-value stores, etc.BS in Computer Science or equivalent on-the-job experience', 'The opportunity to help build a company with the founding teamStock Options - you will have a stake in the future success of ChartboostComprehensive medical, dental and vision insurance optionsCatered lunches and fully stocked kitchensCommuter Program and 401k savings planFlex Vacation – personal time to refresh your mind/body/soul, spend time with loved ones and celebrate life events. There is no accrual or specific limit to the amount of time an employee may use', 'Collaborate with product and engineering teams within Chartboost to define specifications for new features and products across our entire tech stack', 'Comprehensive medical, dental and vision insurance options', 'You’re familiar with Hadoop or BigQuery']

We are deeply collaborative, apolitical, and mission-oriented.', 'Experience building cloud-scale applications in AWS and/or GCP', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Experience building containerized applications with Docker/Kubernetes', 'Coordinate with engineering and product leads to define, prioritize, and task projects that help us meet business objectives', 'At least 3 years of experience with scalable, API based agent or service oriented software architecture', 'At least 5 years of professional experience in software development', 'Experience leading the delivery of large-scale distributed systems', 'Responsibilities', 'Experience working remotely in a distributed company', 'Own both customer and developer happiness for your products in production, working with your own and other teams to build operational transparency and resiliency into every layer of deployed applications', "Gretel is a startup founded by engineers from AWS and Google to help developers to safely and quickly experiment, build, and collaborate with data. At Gretel, we believe that access to data needs to become easier, more accessible, and safe. We are innovating with machine learning to help developers make sense of complex data, and privacy-enhancing technologies to streamline developer access to data safely. We're looking for a senior software engineer to join a passionate, collaborative, distributed group of engineers working with machine learning at cloud scale.\xa0", 'Be a core contributor of code, tests, and application/data/systems architecture on a small team of engineers working across the stackOwn both customer and developer happiness for your products in production, working with your own and other teams to build operational transparency and resiliency into every layer of deployed applicationsCoordinate with engineering and product leads to define, prioritize, and task projects that help us meet business objectivesProvide technical leadership, mentorship, pairing opportunities, and code reviews to encourage the growth of others', 'B.S. in Computer Science, Math, or an algorithmic-centric discipline', 'Be a core contributor of code, tests, and application/data/systems architecture on a small team of engineers working across the stack']

['', '• Excellent technical expertise in relevant state of the art data technologies, data security, data systems, and its design.', '• Primary focus of this position will be Data engineering product support, automation and service of operational and business processes for internet sites and corporate applications for the client.', 'Ciber is seeking an experienced Database Engineer. 100 % REMOTE during COVID supporting a major headline company and in Seattle WA area. Ideal candidate will have experience with managing large clusters for technologies such as: MongoDB, Spark. The ideal candidate will have strong experience with at least one of the Public Cloud providers like AWS, Google Cloud Services and Azure and 5-7 years of experience with products such as Cassandra, MongoDB, Spark etc.', 'Remote during COVID\xa0', '• Relational Database Administration experience in the past is a plus.', 'Key responsibilities include:', 'Primary responsibilities include:', 'JO 206687 ', '• Upholds and maintains strong documentation.', '• Responsible for level 2 systems management and exercises project-level control over initiatives.', '\xa0', '• The ideal candidate will have strong experience with at least one of the Public Cloud providers like AWS, Google Cloud Services and Azure and 5-7 years of experience with products such as Cassandra, MongoDB, Spark etc.', '• DB technology evaluation, guidance and consultation, design support, task automation and scripting, best practice and standards development, capacity planning, optimization and tuning, system upgrades and migrations, performance management, monitoring, security, backup and recovery, issue troubleshooting, and documentation.', '• The Sr. Database Engineer position works on a central team of Data Systems Engineers and Administrators supporting Distributed Data Platforms for Advanced Technologies and corporate development teams and customers.', '• Develops, enhances and adheres to engineering and administration standards.']

['', 'The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing high-quality applications. They will also be responsible for designing and implementing testable and scalable code.\xa0', 'In this line of work, Engineers and Computer Scientists develop and sustain operational programs and software tools on various aircraft and weapon systems, utilize their hardware and software skills to integrate and test avionics/weapons systems and associated tools, and develop and sustain various web-based, remotely-controlled, networks and systems for the Air Force.\xa0Work is done on the B-1, B-2, B-52, E-3, KC-10/KC-135, KC-46, MQ-9/MQ-25 and trainer aircraft.\xa0The workload includes, but is not limited to: Open Missions System architecture, Mission Planning software, Mission Computing software, Operational Flight Programs, Ground Support systems, Data Management Systems, Cruise Missile Software, and Simulators, Pilot Evaluation Simulators (PES), Threat Emitter Location Systems (TELS), Air Traffic Control systems, Navigation systems, Space Fence, tablet and mobile applications, squadron applications.\xa0Depending on the workload, time is usually spent in the office or split between the office and a relevant lab.\xa0Some areas focus more on teamwork while others have more independent tasks. Some of the skills we look for in these areas can include: Knowledge of C, C++, C#, Java, iOS/Android development, web development, cloud services/architecture/migration, Visual Studio .NET, VBA, JavaScript, BASH/BATCH scripting, Ada, Jovial, Assembly, Linux OS, familiarity with object-oriented programming, knowledge of the agile development process, electronic warfare concepts, radar and antenna theory, communication systems, MatLab, LabView, IBM Doors/Clearcase/Clearquest, PowerHawks, scripting, Devops implementation, CSS, HTML, PHP, XML,Team Foundation server, SharePoint programming, and general software troubleshooting/testing skills.', 'To receive additional information about current and future job openings with AFCS via email notification, please register at www.Afciviliancareers.com/linkedin-careers and sign up to “Get Career Updates.”', 'Come be a part of something big! Smart Minds, Cool Jobs and Awesome Rewards! Fueled by innovation, talent and ambition, the Air Force Civilian Service (AFCS) is seeking civilian professionals prepared to deploy war-winning capabilities on behalf of the United States Air Force.', 'The 76 Software Engineering Group is the S&E civilian employer at Tinker AFB in OK with a workforce of 1200 engineering professionals. We are looking for talented entry-level and experienced Computer Science, Computer Engineering, and Electrical Engineering majors interested in developing and using their skills in aircraft software maintenance to support the U.S. Air Force! Our group hosts a variety of workloads ranging from systems engineering, coding/programming, cybersecurity, information assurance, and software/hardware opportunities. Our teams consist of multiple squadrons with differing areas of technical focus such as Engine Testing, Trainers & Simulation Software, Avionics Testing Development, Mission Planning, Systems Development, Industrial Automation, and Lab Simulation/Systems Integration Labs.', '\xa0']

['', 'Job Overview', 'Leverage unique mobile capabilities to enhance our verification processes', 'Responsibilities and Duties', 'Lead the implementation and successful launch of iOS and Android SDKs and applicationsCollaborate across the engineering team to ship new features and productsImprove the processes, code quality and robustness of our mobile codebaseLeverage unique mobile capabilities to enhance our verification processesCollaborate with design to create intuitive, seamless user experiencesOwn and evolve the native mobile technology architecture to utilize modern best practicesBuild systems to solicit feedback and improvements from our customers, triage relative importance and implement features and fixesRelease new versions of our SDK and communicate with customers about new features and fixesLaunch demo applications that prospective customers could use to try our mobile SDKs', '- 401 (k) retirement plan + company match, AD&D + life insurance', 'Willingness to work with loosely-defined problem statements and execute autonomously', '\xa0', 'Lead the implementation and successful launch of iOS and Android SDKs and applications', 'Collaborate across the engineering team to ship new features and products', 'Qualifications', 'This is a question many online platforms need to answer about their users. We help by providing developer friendly SDKs that allows our customers to easily leverage our best-in-class ID verification and proprietary fraud detection services. This enables our customers to determine if users on the other side of the screen are who they say they are.', 'Launch demo applications that prospective customers could use to try our mobile SDKs', '- Regular office social activities like Fun Fridays and Monthly Bagel Breakfasts', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills in both technical and non-technical subjects', 'Currently half of our verifications are processed via our mobile SDKs. We aspire to promote a diverse and inclusive environment for all current and future employees.', 'Build systems to solicit feedback and improvements from our customers, triage relative importance and implement features and fixes', 'Improve the processes, code quality and robustness of our mobile codebase', '- Daily in office lunch + healthy office snacks and Ritual Coffee\xa0', '- Commuter benefits - pre-tax + $50 monthly stipend to use on commuting or parking', '5+ years of work experience in software design and development, with 3+ years in mobile application development', 'Berbix is looking for an experienced iOS and Android mobile engineer to own our mobile SDKs. Our Android and iOS SDKs currently process thousands of verifications every day. As the owner of these systems, you will be responsible for investing in and improving our mobile experience, working collaboratively across the organization to understand requirements, building roadmaps and implementing features.', '- Monthly wellness allowance to spend on your mind and body', 'Release new versions of our SDK and communicate with customers about new features and fixes', 'Deep understanding of the iOS and Android platforms and capabilities', 'Own and evolve the native mobile technology architecture to utilize modern best practices', 'Strong iOS and Android programming skills in the typical languages for those domains', 'Berbix is building identity verification and fraud deterrence as a service. Founded by the former engineering and product leaders for Trust & Safety at Airbnb, we empower companies to confidently answer the question: “Are you who you say you are?"\u200b', '- 12 week, 100% paid parental leave for all new parents\xa0', "Office located in the Castro, close to great restaurants, gyms, coffee, and bars (we've temporarily transitioned to distributed work to do our part in protecting the health and safety of our team and our community and are monitoring the situation and will only return to the office when safe to do so). Located near the Castro Muni station and 6 blocks from 16th & Mission BART station. We are a company that values the well-being of our employees and we strive to cultivate a healthy and inclusive work culture. We offer a robust benefits package to our full-time employees, including:", 'About Berbix', 'Portfolio of released applications on the App Store or Google Play Store or open source SDKs available for review']

['At Auterion we are on a mission to power any drone, anywhere, whilst shaping the future of drone operations at scale. We enable this by building the operating system for safe, reliable and efficient drone missions. Our comprehensive\xa0enterprise software\xa0is developed on top of the most widely used open-source flight controller for drones - PX4 - and it includes the ground station as well as the cloud tools to manage and monitor the drone fleet. ['Cryptography for Hyper-scale Architectures in a Robust Fifth Generation (5G) and Internet Of Things (IOT)', 'Objective', "The exponential price/performance improvements in semiconductor technology stemming from Moore's Law are enabling even the smallest and most application-specific devices, such as sensors and actuators, to include networking capabilities. The overwhelming majority of such devices will be cheap and power constrained. Low device costs permit deployment in unprecedented numbers, with some estimates as high as a trillion devices, 5G wireless networks makes them “hyper-connected” and collectively they form what is called an Internet of Things (IoT).\xa0\xa0Revolutionary security technologies are needed for IoT devices. The emergence of public-key cryptography, such as the RSA (Rivest-Shamir-Adleman) scheme predicated on the hardness of factoring, used number-theoretic concepts to derive protocols for confidential communications, identity verification with digital signatures, message integrity checking with secure hashing, etc. A logistical challenge arises, however, as these protocols presume the legitimacy of the public key used. While no universal public key infrastructure (PKI) exists, legitimacy is now “certified” using a sequence of digital signatures starting from a trusted authority.", '5.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Prototype designs/models;', 'evaluations of security risks and vulnerabilities of existing IoT devices; definition and characterization of post-quantum security core competencies and attributes; and comparisons with alternative state-of-the-art methodologies (competing approaches). Essential competencies include:', '1.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Technical reports describing results and conclusions of existing work, particularly regarding the commercial opportunity insertion opportunity, and risks/mitigations assessments', '2.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Presentation materials and/or white papers', 'Develop revolutionary approaches for fast, efficient, and quantum resistant cryptographic operations for Internet of Things (IoT) devices. Confidential communications, message integrity, group membership, and scalable key management must be demonstrated.', '6.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Performance projections, goals, or results on systems at multiple price points.', '7.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Documentation of related topics such as how the proposed solution can enable zero-trust networking.', '4.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Test and measurement data;', 'Essential Requirements', 'Description', 'The prototype will be low-cost, small-footprint, post-quantum cryptographic techniques with minimal energy use for devices in an IoT. Technical requirements should have their genesis in expected use cases. Vehicle-embedded and wearable uses with a zero-trust networking architecture are of particular interest, e.g., uses within a larger scenario of wearable- equipped passengers entering, traveling in and departing from a vehicle such as school bus.', '3.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Technical papers', 'A 10+ year deployment lifetime is expected for some types of IoT devices. Today, energy (such as battery power) consumed by cryptographic operations reduces deployment lifetimes, discouraging manufacturers from including security. Further, Shor’s algorithm, which uses quantum computing to accelerate factoring, undermines the security model of RSA-based cryptography. Quantum computing may appear before today’s deployments end. The objective is solutions that are fast, efficient, and quantum-resistant on even the cheapest devices.']

Strong debugging skills at the software/hardware boundary, and familiarity with software verification approaches.', 'RESPONSIBILITIES:', '29418 Embedded Software Engineer ', 'Define and develop tests to assure code meets mission and safety critical standards and functions.', 'Exciting space exploration engineering company in Puget Sound is seeking to hire an Embedded Software Engineer. You will be responsible for designing, implementing and verifying embedded software for mission and safety-critical spaceflight systems. ', ' Experience with search engines such as Elasticsearch', ' 6-10 years of experience delivering large, complex software platforms Previous experience with RESTful web services and should be comfortable with Agile processes, with an emphasis on writing high-quality, easily testable code Proven work experience in Java development, and experience with test frameworks like Junit, Mockito Excellent object oriented or functional analysis and design skills Must be a hands-on software developer, comfortable multi-tasking, and able to work independently Experience with running and troubleshooting software on the UNIX platform', 'Accelerate', ' We are looking for a Java developer to join our team of software and network platform engineers The developer will be part of the core engineering team that will be responsible for the incremental delivery of a resilient and scalable firewall automation solution You’ll work with RESTful web services, distributed database technologies, and network devices like firewalls and routers to build cutting automation software You can expect to deliver incremental business value through an agile SDLC', ' https:// www.goldmansachs.com/careers/footer/disability-statement.html ', ' You’ll work with RESTful web services, distributed database technologies, and network devices like firewalls and routers to build cutting automation software', ' Must be a hands-on software developer, comfortable multi-tasking, and able to work independently', ' We are looking for a Java developer to join our team of software and network platform engineers', ' The developer will be part of the core engineering team that will be responsible for the incremental delivery of a resilient and scalable firewall automation solution', ' 6-10 years of experience delivering large, complex software platforms', ' RESPONSIBILITIES AND QUALIFICATIONS ']

job_text: ['', 'Implements and maintains VNSNY’s Enterprise Data Warehouse. Responsible for populating the data warehouse using extracts from platforms including but not limited to Oracle, Microsoft SQL Server, NoSQL databases, flat files, JSON files, XML files, spread sheets and API data access using REST/SOAP.', 'Assists in planning and organizing the activities/duties of the area and in the development of the overall project plans and timetables. Designs and develops ETL to load the data warehouse and data marts, utilizing reusable design components. Tunes ETL code for efficiency.', 'Qualifications', 'Maintains knowledge of software tools, languages, scripts, and shells that effectively support the data warehouse environment in different operating systems.', 'Supports the user community and Information Systems Development groups.', 'Participates in special projects and performs other related duties as required. ', 'Responsibilities', 'Experience:', 'Prototypes solutions, prepares test scripts, and conducts tests for data replication, extraction, loading, cleansing, and data modeling for data warehouse. ', 'Overview', 'Implements and maintains VNSNY’s Enterprise Data Warehouse. Responsible for populating the data warehouse using extracts from platforms including but not limited to Oracle, Microsoft SQL Server, NoSQL databases, flat files, JSON files, XML files, spread sheets and API data access using REST/SOAP.Creates the end-to-end solutions for ETL/ELT transformational jobs that involve writing the Informatica workflows and mappings, Oracle PL SQL procedures and functions, SQLServer T-SQL procedures and Unix shell and Python scripting to load VNSNY data into Operational Staging, Warehouse and Reporting layers of the Data Lake stack from disparate source systems.Assists in planning and organizing the activities/duties of the area and in the development of the overall project plans and timetables. Designs and develops ETL to load the data warehouse and data marts, utilizing reusable design components. Tunes ETL code for efficiency.Supports the user community and Information Systems Development groups.Maps data sources, data movement, interfaces, and analytics, with the goal of ensuring data quality and lineage.Prototypes solutions, prepares test scripts, and conducts tests for data replication, extraction, loading, cleansing, and data modeling for data warehouse. Maintains knowledge of software tools, languages, scripts, and shells that effectively support the data warehouse environment in different operating systems.Participates in special projects and performs other related duties as required. ', 'Maps data sources, data movement, interfaces, and analytics, with the goal of ensuring data quality and lineage.', 'Education:', 'Creates the end-to-end solutions for ETL/ELT transformational jobs that involve writing the Informatica workflows and mappings, Oracle PL SQL procedures and functions, SQLServer T-SQL procedures and Unix shell and Python scripting to load VNSNY data into Operational Staging, Warehouse and Reporting layers of the Data Lake stack from disparate source systems.']

['Familiarity with the Linux operating system internals, kernel modules a plus ', 'BS with 2+ years of experience or MS in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science or Related Equivalent Strong C/C++, BASH, Python programming and debugging skills Experience with implementing Linux applications and daemons Experience with the Yocto Project, Debian/Ubuntu distribution desired Experience with developing or customizing board support packages (BSP) desired Experience with embedded systems and Linux kernel/driver development for multi-processor heterogeneous systems a plus Familiarity with the Linux operating system internals, kernel modules a plus Experience with source control (Git) Strong analytical and problem-solving skills Excellent communication skills You must be capable of working in a dynamic, high pressure environment', 'BS with 2+ years of experience or MS in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science or Related Equivalent ', 'Excellent communication skills ', "Software Engineer - Yocto Project158777San Jose, CA, United StatesSep 8, 2020 DescriptionJob DescriptionAt Xilinx, we are leading the industry transformation to build an adaptable, intelligent world. ARE YOU bold, collaborative, and creative? At Xilinx, we hire and develop leaders and innovators who want to revolutionize the world of technology. We believe that by embracing diverse ideas, pushing boundaries, and working together as ONEXILINX, anything is possible.Our culture of innovation began with the invention of the Field Programmable Gate Array (FPGA), and with the 2018 introduction of our Adaptive Compute Acceleration Platform (ACAP), has made a quantum leap in capability, solidifying our role as the adaptable platform supplier of choice. From the start, we have always believed in providing inventors with products and platforms that are infinitely adaptable. From self-driving cars, to world-record genome processing, to AI and big data, to the world's first 5G networks, we empower the world's builders and visionaries whose ideas solve every day problems and enhance people's lives.If you are PASSIONATE, ADAPTABLE, and INNOVATIVE, Xilinx is the right place for you! At Xilinx we care deeply about creating meaningful development experiences while building a strong sense of belonging and connection. We foster an environment of empowered learning, wellness, community engagement, and recognition, so you can focus on work that matters - world class technology that improves the way we live and work. We are ONEXILINX.Job DescriptionXilinx is looking for a talented individual for the position of Embedded Software Engineer. This team develops the Linux operating system that runs on Xilinx embedded devices along with its applications. As an Embedded Software Engineer, you will have the opportunity to design, develop, and debug various software components and tools for Yocto Project. Deliverables include building complex software related to embedded Linux, e.g. systems software, software development tools, applications, kernel development, and board support packages (BSP).#mhJob RequirementsBS with 2+ years of experience or MS in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science or Related Equivalent Strong C/C++, BASH, Python programming and debugging skills Experience with implementing Linux applications and daemons Experience with the Yocto Project, Debian/Ubuntu distribution desired Experience with developing or customizing board support packages (BSP) desired Experience with embedded systems and Linux kernel/driver development for multi-processor heterogeneous systems a plus Familiarity with the Linux operating system internals, kernel modules a plus Experience with source control (Git) Strong analytical and problem-solving skills Excellent communication skills You must be capable of working in a dynamic, high pressure environment", 'Job Requirements', 'Experience with the Yocto Project, Debian/Ubuntu distribution desired ', 'Software Engineer - Yocto Project', 'Experience with implementing Linux applications and daemons ', 'You must be capable of working in a dynamic, high pressure environment', 'Experience with developing or customizing board support packages (BSP) desired ', 'Strong analytical and problem-solving skills ', 'Experience with source control (Git) ', 'Job Description', 'Description', 'Experience with embedded systems and Linux kernel/driver development for multi-processor heterogeneous systems a plus ', 'Strong C/C++, BASH, Python programming and debugging skills ']

['', 'Experience with natural language processing would be very useful.', "WHAT YOU'LL DO", 'Work collaboratively with designers, engineers, customer service, and the community team.', 'NCSOFT is a premiere digital entertainment company and global publisher with worldwide locations and more than 4,000 employees focused on bringing extraordinary games to life for millions of fans around the world. Established in 1997 and headquartered in Seoul, South Korea, we quickly became a key leader in online games. Best known for critically acclaimed franchises including Lineage, Aion, Guild Wars, and Blade & Soul, NCSOFT is also one of the world’s top mobile developers with Lineage 2M occupying the #1 grossing revenue slot on Google Play. Our core goal is to make people in this world happier by delivering games that entertain a globally connected audience has remained the same.', 'Prior experience in fraud detection.Experience playing NCSOFT and ArenaNet games.Experience with big data software like Hadoop.Experience with other Business Intelligence backend and analytics applications.', 'Ability to effectively communicate with people at various levels of business and technical expertise, including the ability to simplify difficult technical concepts.', 'You are a passionate gamer', 'Strong quantitative skills, and experience utilizing scientific analytic methods, qualitative methods, and quantitative analysis techniques, as well as predictive modeling.', 'PLUSES', 'A passion for games and the gaming industry.', '5+ years hands-on experience working with data.', 'Ability to translate academic research into application.', 'We are looking for a Data Scientist to join our Fraud and Game Surveillance Unit and help us keep our games safe and fun for all our players.\xa0We are looking for someone with a burning curiosity about our players and our games, someone who can go deep to find answers and bring back actionable insights.\xa0The ideal candidate is equally passionate about machine learning and improving the player experience.\xa0This role will partner closely with design, engineering, and customer service to help create and maintain a safe and welcoming environment for all our players.\xa0You will help build tools to detect toxic chat and sift PvP match records to find cheats and bots.\xa0This is your chance to help make our games safer, friendlier, and more fun.', 'Conduct quantitative and statistical analyses on gameplay and financial data.', 'Bachelor’s degree in statistics, analytics, data science, psychology, or related quantitative field. MS or PhD strongly preferred.', 'You enjoy creating positive user experiences. ', 'Create and maintain accurate and comprehensible data visualizations and dashboards.', 'You are a passionate gamer. You will join us in supporting multiple AAA titles. We are all gamers and we love helping our fellow players!', 'Demonstrated history of turning raw data into actionable insights.', 'You enjoy creating positive user experiences. This is at the core of what we do. You think about how we best prevent players from having to contact us and how to make their interactions with our team seamless. You learn from negative feedback and get satisfaction from positive outcomes.', 'WHY JOIN THE CUSTOMER CARE TEAM?', 'Bachelor’s degree in statistics, analytics, data science, psychology, or related quantitative field. MS or PhD strongly preferred.5+ years hands-on experience working with data.Experience with natural language processing would be very useful.', 'You love to share your knowledge and experience. We know our games and our player base inside and out and we leverage that knowledge to drive improvement. You are good at finding ways to best impart your knowledge to internal teams and our customers.', "WHAT YOU'LL NEED TO BE SUCCESSFUL", 'A passion for games and the gaming industry.Demonstrated history of turning raw data into actionable insights.Advanced SQL proficiency, including experience querying and visualizing large, complex data sets.Strong quantitative skills, and experience utilizing scientific analytic methods, qualitative methods, and quantitative analysis techniques, as well as predictive modeling.Ability to effectively communicate with people at various levels of business and technical expertise, including the ability to simplify difficult technical concepts.Ability to translate academic research into application.', 'EDUCATION/TRAINING/EXPERIENCE', 'WHO WE ARE', 'Experience playing NCSOFT and ArenaNet games.', 'You love a challenge. You will encounter daily opportunities to overcome new challenges and problems. ['What You Would Do', 'Work within a remote friendly engineering team, following Agile and continuous automation processes to build our Ruby on Rails/React based architecture.', 'Experience participating in agile and test driven development models.', 'Good organization skills, excellent written and verbal communication in English.', 'Description', 'Comfortable working in distributed environment', 'Experience working with microservices architecture, distributed systems, RESTful APIs, and relational databases', '401(k) program to help you save for the future (US only)', 'Work in a small, fast-paced, collaborative startup environment where you will certainly be able to make an impact, as we aim to build the best penetration testing as a service platform.', ' Opportunity to join and grow in a passionate, rapidly expanding industry Competitive compensation & attractive equity plan Flexible paid time-off & travel policies Regularly planned team outings and company events Paid parental leave 401(k) program to help you save for the future (US only) Medical, dental, and life insurance benefits (US only', 'Partner with product teams to gather requirements and deliver creative solutions that meet needs of functionality, performance, scalability, reliability and realistic implementation schedules.', 'Paid parental leave', 'Opportunity to join and grow in a passionate, rapidly expanding industry', 'Experience with continuous deployment processes', 'Knowledge of application architecture, networking, security, reliability, and scalability concepts.', 'You Must Have', 'Cobalt (cobalt.io) is a fast growing cybersecurity start-up headquartered in San Francisco. Cobalt is providing a Pentest as a Service Platform which leverages the sharing economy to find global security talent to help secure companies and their users. We have Scandinavian roots, an American base and a global outlook. Our offices in San Francisco, Berlin, and remote roles are characterized by a fun, fast-paced and collaborative culture based on individual responsibility and ownership.', 'Flexible paid time-off & travel policies', 'Competitive compensation & attractive equity plan', 'Regularly planned team outings and company events', 'Medical, dental, and life insurance benefits (US only', '4+ years of professional experience with Ruby on Rails.', '4+ years of professional experience with Javascript.', 'Work with multi-tiered distributed systems, web services, APIs, relational and NoSQL databases.', 'Why You Should Join Us', ' 4+ years of professional experience with Ruby on Rails. 4+ years of professional experience with Javascript. Experience working with microservices architecture, distributed systems, RESTful APIs, and relational databases Experience with continuous deployment processes Experience participating in agile and test driven development models. Knowledge of application architecture, networking, security, reliability, and scalability concepts. Good organization skills, excellent written and verbal communication in English. Comfortable working in distributed environment Knowledge of Docker and Kubernetes, GCP or other cloud infrastructure, and/or a JVM language is a big plus. ', ' Work within a remote friendly engineering team, following Agile and continuous automation processes to build our Ruby on Rails/React based architecture. Work with multi-tiered distributed systems, web services, APIs, relational and NoSQL databases. Partner with product teams to gather requirements and deliver creative solutions that meet needs of functionality, performance, scalability, reliability and realistic implementation schedules. Work in a small, fast-paced, collaborative startup environment where you will certainly be able to make an impact, as we aim to build the best penetration testing as a service platform. ', 'Who We Are', 'Knowledge of Docker and Kubernetes, GCP or other cloud infrastructure, and/or a JVM language is a big plus.', 'We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to work in a full-stack capacity, to help build our platform and suite of customer facing Pentest as a Service features. You will contribute to the way we build, maintain, and improve our software stack. You will work in an agile environment, collaborating on a daily basis with our Engineering teams and Product Management.']

job_title: Vision Software Engineer - Driver Assist Technologies
job_text: ['', "2+ years' experience in imaging, image processing and/or computer vision to support active safety features ", 'M.S. in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science or similar field of study ', 'Developing and conducting laboratory and vehicle tests. Data collection and analysis of Active Safety sensor systems ', 'Support Sign off of software functionality, performance, and overall quality per a given vehicle ', 'Git, Github, Jira, Agile, Misra C\\\\C++, ISO 26262 ', 'Take possession of algorithm models and develop C++ based embedded software ', 'Understand sensor system interactions in terms of vehicle dynamics to identify possible improvements and trade-offs. Identify changes needed to improve performance and to meet objectives ', 'Design and development of vision applications ', 'Control algorithm development using Matlab, Simulink or equivalent ', 'Preferred Qualifications:', 'Lead the software development and implementation of algorithms related to imaging, image processing and vision. ', 'Familiarity with open source vision, sensor fusion and machine learning frameworks (OpenCV, ROS, Tensorflow, PyTorch, Caffe2, scikit-learn) ', 'Lead the development of software designs, FMEAs, robustness disciplines, and DVP ', "Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science or similar field of study  7+ years' experience in software development in C or C++  5+ years of experience designing and testing embedded systems for high performance, high reliability computing applications  2+ years' experience in imaging, image processing and/or computer vision to support active safety features  ", 'Software architecture, modular application development with Model/software, strong embedded experience, developing production algorithm experience ', 'M.S. in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science or similar field of study  Experience mapping image processing algorithms to HW (DSP, SIMD, NEON, GPU, FPGA)  Understanding of ISP algorithms, human vision system and image quality metrics  Familiarity with open source vision, sensor fusion and machine learning frameworks (OpenCV, ROS, Tensorflow, PyTorch, Caffe2, scikit-learn)  Simulating vision and/or Lidar sensors for algorithm training, validation and testing  Design and development of vision applications  Python, ipython, jupyter notebooks  Git, Github, Jira, Agile, Misra C\\\\C++, ISO 26262  Control algorithm development using Matlab, Simulink or equivalent  Software architecture, modular application development with Model/software, strong embedded experience, developing production algorithm experience  1+ years of experience as an Applications engineer for active safety systems such as ACC, AEB, LKA, TJA, Collision Avoidance.  Developing and conducting laboratory and vehicle tests. Data collection and analysis of Active Safety sensor systems  ', 'Work with the Ford Hardware in the Loop Team to establish test procedures to reduce dependence on vehicle level testing ', '5+ years of experience designing and testing embedded systems for high performance, high reliability computing applications ', 'Responsibilities', "Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science or similar field of study ", 'Understanding of ISP algorithms, human vision system and image quality metrics ', '1+ years of experience as an Applications engineer for active safety systems such as ACC, AEB, LKA, TJA, Collision Avoidance. ', "Lead the software development and implementation of algorithms related to imaging, image processing and vision.  Take possession of algorithm models and develop C++ based embedded software  Provide high quality embedded feature software solutions for Active Safety ECU's  Understand sensor system interactions in terms of vehicle dynamics to identify possible improvements and trade-offs. Identify changes needed to improve performance and to meet objectives  Lead the development of software designs, FMEAs, robustness disciplines, and DVP  Understand the performance requirements for the sensing system, establish feature models to operate with the sensor performance envelope, andestablish procedures to verify performance both quantitatively and subjectively  Work with the Ford Hardware in the Loop Team to establish test procedures to reduce dependence on vehicle level testing  Support Sign off of software functionality, performance, and overall quality per a given vehicle  ", 'Experience mapping image processing algorithms to HW (DSP, SIMD, NEON, GPU, FPGA) ', 'Simulating vision and/or Lidar sensors for algorithm training, validation and testing ', "7+ years' experience in software development in C or C++ ", 'Understand the performance requirements for the sensing system, establish feature models to operate with the sensor performance envelope, andestablish procedures to verify performance both quantitatively and subjectively ', 'Basic Qualifications:', 'Python, ipython, jupyter notebooks ', "Provide high quality embedded feature software solutions for Active Safety ECU's "]

['  Collaborate with peers on designs, code reviews, and testing    \u2028  ', '  Recharge your batteries with a flexible vacation policy and paid holidays\u202f    \u2028  ', ' Preferred ', '  We are looking for software engineers who are passionate about solving problems    to join our fast    -    growing team to build services that constitute identity governance. ['', 'About You:', 'Opportunity to make a huge impact and define the future of the product', 'Collaborative start-up culture with a close-knit, all star team', 'Competitive compensation package with meaningful equity', 'Experience with C++ test, CI/CD, and code quality standards', 'Please apply and we will contact you!', 'Comfortable with modern multithreading primitives and techniques', "As a Senior C++ Engineer for Tempo, you will help us improve the stability and performance of the pipeline that powers our computer vision systems, tracking and analyzing the technique of our customers during their workouts. You'll work tightly with our Computer Vision team, contributing to the core software running on our product as well as GUI tools that help us develop new product features. You'll also work with our data collection team to optimize our cloud tools for storage and analysis of our extensive human motion dataset.", 'Familiarity with basic OpenGL, DirectX, and 3D graphics programming', "Tempo is thriving and we’re experiencing growth of over 300% in sales. We recently raised $17.5M\xa0in Series A funding from Founders Fund, Khosla Ventures, DCM, Bling Capital, and Signal Fire. Tempo's all-star team includes alumni from Apple, Pixar, Airbnb, YouTube, Netflix, Equinox, and Orangetheory.", '8+ years professional experience developing C++', '8+ years professional experience developing C++Familiarity with basic OpenGL, DirectX, and 3D graphics programmingFluency with C++17Comfortable with modern multithreading primitives and techniquesStrong background in software architectureExpertise in modern CMakeExperience with C++ test, CI/CD, and code quality standardsPassion for optimized, well-covered code and using types to prevent developer errorStrong communication skills', 'Competitive compensation package with meaningful equityCollaborative start-up culture with a close-knit, all star teamTremendous opportunities for personal growth\xa0Comprehensive health benefits and unlimited PTOOpportunity to make a huge impact and define the future of the product', 'Expertise in modern CMake', 'Tremendous opportunities for personal growth\xa0', 'Fluency with C++17', 'Strong communication skills', 'Strong background in software architecture', 'What We Can Offer You:', 'Tempo is the next-generation home fitness system—and the first and only strength training solution that can track your motion and use that data to give you a richer, more effective, and safer workout in live and on-demand classes. Using 3D sensors and A.I., Tempo enables expert coaches to correct your form and provide personalized feedback in real-time. It captures motion by emitting pulses of infrared light 30 times a second, generating a 3D model of your body made up of 80,000 individual points.\xa0', 'Comprehensive health benefits and unlimited PTO', 'Passion for optimized, well-covered code and using types to prevent developer error']

['Be a proactive communicator who enjoys working closely with creative and technical peers.\xa0', 'Play a hands-on role as part of an engineering team developing solutions for planning and scheduling the fleet of mobile robots.', 'Work in a dynamic Agile/Scrum based environment.', 'As a\xa0Software Engineer in the System Controls team you will play a hands-on role in the development of a suite of services and applications for our next generation of software which controls fleets of mobile robots and industrial systems. The qualified candidate will make key contributions to bring our robotics solutions to our customers. We are looking for people who thrive in a creative, collaborative and agile development environment.\xa0', '\xa0Responsibilities', 'Design and develop real-time distributed software to communicate with and manage data for fleets of mobile robots and other warehouse automation hardware.', 'Design and develop real-time distributed software to communicate with and manage data for fleets of mobile robots and other warehouse automation hardware.Research, develop, and productize solutions for NP-Hard optimization problems.Play a hands-on role as part of an engineering team developing solutions for planning and scheduling the fleet of mobile robots.Demonstrate passion about building high quality software, love solving problems and facing new challenges.\xa0Be a proactive communicator who enjoys working closely with creative and technical peers.\xa0Work in a dynamic Agile/Scrum based environment.', 'Research, develop, and productize solutions for NP-Hard optimization problems.', 'Demonstrate passion about building high quality software, love solving problems and facing new challenges.\xa0']

job_title: Senior Data Analytics and Research Lead
job_text: ['', ' Develop and manage end-to-end project plans and ensure on-time delivery.', 'About Avalara', ' Build strong and captivating data visualizations in PowerBI/Tableau Experience building powerful dashboards which are embedded in web and mobile applications is a major plus.', ' Advanced SQL, scripting (Python or R) and advanced data visualization experience a must.', " Build a long term 'data analytics stack' for Avalara. Work with the product managers, DBA teams and broader engineering teams build scalable data orchestration, transformation and reporting streams that can capture and prepare billions of transactions per day for customer reporting. Build strong and captivating data visualizations in PowerBI/Tableau Experience building powerful dashboards which are embedded in web and mobile applications is a major plus. Practice/Implement data security, encryption and masking policies across various data sets and data sources. Develop and manage end-to-end project plans and ensure on-time delivery. Communicate status and big picture to the project team and management. Work with business and engineering teams to identify scope, constraints, dependencies, and risks. Identify risks and opportunities across the business and drive solutions.", ' Proven ability to combine business acumen, technical acumen and process expertise to define client (internal/external) engagement and program execution', " 8+ years combined in data engineer, business intelligence and in-app embedded analytics. Advanced SQL, scripting (Python or R) and advanced data visualization experience a must. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or Engineering Experience managing efforts in distributed systems and/or developing large scale web applications Proven ability to combine business acumen, technical acumen and process expertise to define client (internal/external) engagement and program execution Ability to communicate effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholders across multiple business units Excellent problem-solving skills", ' Work with business and engineering teams to identify scope, constraints, dependencies, and risks.', ' Experience managing efforts in distributed systems and/or developing large scale web applications', ' Practice/Implement data security, encryption and masking policies across various data sets and data sources.', 'Minimum Qualifications', ' Ability to communicate effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholders across multiple business units', ' Identify risks and opportunities across the business and drive solutions.', " Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or Engineering", 'Other Responsibilities', 'Job Description', ' 8+ years combined in data engineer, business intelligence and in-app embedded analytics.', ' Communicate status and big picture to the project team and management.', ' Excellent problem-solving skills', " Build a long term 'data analytics stack' for Avalara. Work with the product managers, DBA teams and broader engineering teams build scalable data orchestration, transformation and reporting streams that can capture and prepare billions of transactions per day for customer reporting.", 'Description']

['', 'In keeping with our beliefs and goals, no employee or applicant will face discrimination or harassment based on: race, color, ancestry, national origin, religion, age, gender, marital/domestic partner status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability status, or veteran status. Above and beyond discrimination and harassment based on “protected categories,” we also strive to prevent other subtler forms of inappropriate behavior (i.e., stereotyping) from ever gaining a foothold in our office. Whether blatant or hidden, barriers to success have no place at Karat.', 'Statement of Non-Discrimination:', 'Technical interviews are broken. Come help Karat fix them.', 'Flexible vacation and paid company holidays', '10+ years developing and launching web applications/systems into a production environmentTechnical leadership experience across projects and teamsDeep proficiency in at least one of Ruby, Python, or similar languageUI/ UX experience using AJAX and modern frameworks like React as well as plain JavaScriptComfortable in a Unix/Linux workflowPrior experience designing and building APIsStrong ability to effectively identify and pursue challenging problemsSome project management experience, ability to lead a project end-to-endInterviewing, teaching, and/or mentoring experience as it will help you relate to our mission and cultureExcellent English communication skills to collaborate with a service-oriented team', 'Strong ability to effectively identify and pursue challenging problems', 'Competitive salary and benefitsMedical / dental / vision insurance\xa0Flexible vacation and paid company holidaysPaid parental leave\xa0State-of-the-art equipment for your work station', 'Founded in 2014, Karat is a privately held and venture-funded company based in Seattle.', 'UI/ UX experience using AJAX and modern frameworks like React as well as plain JavaScript', 'Core Responsibilities', "Karat conducts first-round technical interviews on behalf of companies like Indeed, Intuit, Pinterest, and Wayfair. We do this through a community of Interview Engineers who are equipped with Karat's interviewing infrastructure, battle-tested questions, and data-informed best practices.\xa0", 'We value a diverse workforce: people of color, womxn, and LGBTQIA+ individuals are strongly encouraged to apply.', 'For software engineering job candidates, technical interview experiences can range from haphazard to outright hazing. At Karat, it’s our mission to break down the gatekeeping and barriers that push people out of careers in tech by making every interview predictive, fair, and enjoyable.', 'Competitive salary and benefits', 'Remain flexible enough to handle all of the unknowns that come with fast growth in the company', 'Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define features and build powerful and easy-to-use products and customer-facing workflow tools', 'The result is highly predictive and fair interviews at scale that candidates truly enjoy. Karat has amassed the largest, most robust dataset of structured interview intelligence to produce never-before-seen hiring analytics.\xa0', 'Benefits of joining Karat:', 'Medical / dental / vision insurance\xa0', 'Lay the foundation for new systems while revamping the existing', 'While doing meaningful work is rewarding in itself, we also offer the following programs and benefits for all our full-time employees:', '10+ years developing and launching web applications/systems into a production environment', 'Own projects from design to release and beyond', 'State-of-the-art equipment for your work station', 'You will have the opportunity to be a technical leader on a team working to build products serving engineers, candidates, and internal teams as we scale. Your work will be the bridge between users, providing the backbone of our platform.', 'Build up engineers through direct mentorship and strategic processes', 'Deep proficiency in at least one of Ruby, Python, or similar language', 'Paid parental leave\xa0', 'Lay the foundation for new systems while revamping the existingBuild up engineers through direct mentorship and strategic processesRemain flexible enough to handle all of the unknowns that come with fast growth in the companyCollaborate with cross-functional teams to define features and build powerful and easy-to-use products and customer-facing workflow toolsOwn projects from design to release and beyond', 'Comfortable in a Unix/Linux workflow', 'Technical leadership experience across projects and teams', 'Some project management experience, ability to lead a project end-to-end', 'Excellent English communication skills to collaborate with a service-oriented team', '\ufeff', 'As the world continues to transition to virtual work, and the fairness of hiring practices in the tech industry come under greater scrutiny, Karat is uniquely positioned to be a helpful, strategic partner as companies transition to 100% remote hiring.', 'Prior experience designing and building APIs', "As a Staff Software Engineer at Karat, you will work on an exciting mission with a highly collaborative team and relatable product. As a core member of our growing company, you will work closely with leaders and members of other teams, contribute to team culture and practices, and mentor members of the product team. We're looking for individuals hungry to take ownership of new projects and initiatives, making a significant impact on the product and beyond.", 'Engineering at Karat', '\xa0Benefits of joining Karat:', 'Interviewing, teaching, and/or mentoring experience as it will help you relate to our mission and culture', 'About You']

Focused exclusively on perioperative IT, SIS serves over 2900 facilities across the United States and Canada.', "As a Sr. Software Engineer, you will work with a high-energy Agile team on the next-generation products.\xa0 You'll help define architecture and standards, play a key role in developing new product features, and work closely with the team to deliver great results.\xa0 You’ll work across the full stack of the platform and drive full features from concept to implementation and customer success.\xa0 You love solving hard problems and getting things done and want to help drive a major initiative and have a significant impact on customers and end users.\xa0 You’re a team player and want to build your own skills as well as those around you. ['', 'Uphold our high engineering standards and bring consistency to the codebases and processes you encounter.', 'We aim to lead the markets we serve by requiring the solutions we offer customers provide an improved benefit/risk profile as compared to existing standards of care; a performance threshold that by definition, guides and ensures the productive output of our engineering, business development, and clinical research efforts result in outcomes that advance the standard of care.', ' Responsibilities:', ' Education\xa0:', 'Identify areas of improvement and advocate for front-end best practices', 'We believe in small, accountable, and autonomous teams of amazing people, eager to learn, teach, and constantly improve our way of working.', '4-8 years of experience in software engineering in developing web apps with JavaScript', 'Responsibilities:', '\xa0', 'Software Engineer - FRONT END - ANGULAR', 'Headquartered in the heart of Silicon Valley, California, VitalConnect was founded in 2011 with a vision of changing the paradigm of healthcare as we know it by creating a new world of information with predictive data analytics at everyone’s fingertips. Vital Connect provides physicians, nurses, and patients with an extraordinary advancement in healthcare. Never before has so much continuous monitoring of vital signs and arrhythmia’s been possible in a single, small—yet powerful—device. VitalConnect has consolidated eight critical vital signs into one wireless biosensor.', 'Own problems end-to-end, thinking through everything from user experience, data models, scalability, and operability.', 'Benefits:', ' ', 'Writing high quality, well-tested code to meet the needs of your customers', 'We work in an environment where it matters to make the right design decisions the first time, and as a result, take on less technical debt than other companies.', 'Apply Now', 'History:', 'Who is VitalConnect, Inc.:', "We'd rather have one strong, well-compensated engineer, instead of having 5 average engineers. Our customers are fine with fewer features but are not ok with broken features.", 'Education\xa0:', 'Design and implement features to improve our customer’s experiences.', 'Knowledge and Training May Require:', 'We are very frank in discussing technical matters. If one disagrees with how things are being done, we encourage them to speak up and help us get to the truth faster.', 'People have a strong sense of ownership and accountability for what they’re building. What we build today will be the foundation for dozens of other systems in the future.', 'Gathering and refining specifications and requirements based on technical needs', 'Engineering at VitalConnect:', 'Full benefits provided and fully paid for employees AND all dependents!Pre IPO stock', '4-8 years of experience in software engineering in developing web apps with JavaScriptExperience building user experiences with modern tools like ES6, Webpack, Babel, Typescript, RxJS, and AngularEnjoying being a generalist, working on both the frontend, backend/JAVA, and everything in between to tackle problems and delight customers.Taking pride in working on projects to successful completion, involving a wide variety of technologies and systems.Putting yourself in the shoes of your users, and creating an intuitive, delightful experience.Holding yourself and others to a high bar when working with production systems.Stitching many different services and processes together, even if you have not worked with them before.Writing high quality, well-tested code to meet the needs of your customers', 'Software Engineer – Front End Angular', 'Bachelor’s and/or Master’s degree, preferably in CS, or equivalent experience', 'Taking pride in working on projects to successful completion, involving a wide variety of technologies and systems.', 'Full benefits provided and fully paid for employees AND all dependents!', 'Our Purpose:', 'We’re looking for people with a strong background or interest in building front-end applications with interactive user experiences, comfortable in dealing with lots of moving pieces, with a keen eye towards detail.\xa0', 'We are presently assisting the New York and New Jersey hospitals with fighting COVID-19 by remotely monitoring patients both in the hospital and remotely.', 'Product is a highly collaborative initiative across multiple teams. Engineers are expected to understand and have product input, designing systems towards our long-term product vision.', 'Experience building user experiences with modern tools like ES6, Webpack, Babel,
