['', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience in full lifecycle development including software requirements and design, system-level integration, validation, and verification', 'Celebrating its twenty-fifth anniversary in 2016, Cyient is an acknowledged leader in engineering design services, design-led manufacturing, networks and operations, data transformation, and analytics. We collaborate with our clients to help them achieve more and together shape a better future. We call it Designing Tomorrow Together.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Develop and update software verification test environments', 'You Will:', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa04+ years experience in creating engineering documentation', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience in integration, verification, and testing of \xa0electronic equipment utilizing embedded hardware/software', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with flight critical fly-by-wire Flight Controls, Actuators, Air Data Systems, Pilot Inceptors, Inertial Sensors and/or Autopilot systems\xa0', 'Cyient', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0US Person Required', 'Rockford, IL', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa07+ years of experience with the development of requirements and operational software concepts\xa0', 'Our industry focus includes aerospace, defense, rail transportation, off-highway & industrial, power generation, mining, oil & gas, communications, utilities, geospatial, semiconductor and medical technology. We align closely with the needs, goals, culture, and core values of our clients. This reflects in the long-standing relationships we have developed with some of the leading names in these industries.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Review safety critical software requirements, tests, and results against specific criteria', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Prepare and review documentation for software full development life cycle following established software development processes', 'Preferred Skills:\xa0', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Familiar with data bus protocols (1553B, ARINC 429, RS422/485, AFDX or CDN)', 'Embedded Software Engineer', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Test and document safety critical software', "You'll Need:", 'About us:', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Develop and manage complex software high and low level requirements', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with DO-178B/C\xa0', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bachelor of Science degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science or Software Engineering or a related field', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Provide validation and verification for avionics software on safety critical software in collaboration with the internal team and external large system integrators', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa07+ years of experience in avionics or electronic controls related development']

job_title: Product Machine Learning Engineer, Massachusetts - US
job_text: ['', ' Extremely solid fundamentals in statistical learning methods ', ' Excellent interpersonal and communication skills ', 'Location: ', ' Deep experience with multiple ML stacks, such as Keras, Pytorch, Tensorflow, scikit-learn ', ' Knowledge of software engineering best practices (Agile, Continuous Value Delivery, CI/CD, DevOps, NoOps, PaaS, IaaS, LEAN software, Service Oriented Architecture, cloud computing) ', ' At least 3 years’ experience in ML engineering ', 'Application process ', ' A flexible, friendly and international working environment with a collaborative atmosphere  An exciting company mission that brings together science and technology to directly impact the lives of patients with life threatening illness.  A fast-growing company with plenty of opportunity for personal growth and development  A hard technical challenge to solve with exciting modern technology - machine learning , cloud computing, Big Data, DevOps ', ' Experience with genomics, digital image analysis, and clinical data analysis is an asset ', ' A hard technical challenge to solve with exciting modern technology - machine learning , cloud computing, Big Data, DevOps ', 'We offer', 'Contract type', ' Master’s degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Engineering, or a similar field, or equivalent professional experience  Extremely solid fundamentals in statistical learning methods  At least 3 years’ experience in ML engineering  Deep experience with multiple ML stacks, such as Keras, Pytorch, Tensorflow, scikit-learn  Expertise in exploratory analysis and data visualization  Expertise in building and supporting large-scale production ML models through multiple iterations.  Well-rounded software engineering experience, including a variety of technology ecosystems such as Python, Java, and C++.  Experience with genomics, digital image analysis, and clinical data analysis is an asset  Excellent interpersonal and communication skills  Knowledge of software engineering best practices (Agile, Continuous Value Delivery, CI/CD, DevOps, NoOps, PaaS, IaaS, LEAN software, Service Oriented Architecture, cloud computing) ', ' Well-rounded software engineering experience, including a variety of technology ecosystems such as Python, Java, and C++. ', ' A fast-growing company with plenty of opportunity for personal growth and development ', ' A flexible, friendly and international working environment with a collaborative atmosphere ', ' Expertise in exploratory analysis and data visualization ', 'Product ML Engineer', 'Start', ' Expertise in building and supporting large-scale production ML models through multiple iterations. ', 'HOME OFFICE ', ' An exciting company mission that brings together science and technology to directly impact the lives of patients with life threatening illness. ', 'Your Profile', ' Master’s degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Engineering, or a similar field, or equivalent professional experience ', 'Mission']

['* Experience with networking software (routers, firewalls, pcap, etc.).', '\xa0', '* Build and maintain Linux distributions for the various platforms supported by the sensors.', 'About us', "* Our mission is to use the power of information to detect, track and dismantle hackers' means of attacking our customers.", 'Job Requirements', '* Monitor and troubleshoot core sensor platform issues.', '* 5 or more years of professional software engineering experience.', '* Maintain multi-platform code across different CPU architectures.', '* Our team has seen all sides of the equation, as attackers and defenders, in addition to the complex engineering required to solve these problems at scale.', '* Flexible work and vacation schedule', '* Experience deploying, monitoring and maintaining Linux based systems.', 'Employment at Gigamon is contingent on meeting eligibility requirements which may include additional security screening on being able to obtain a government sponsored security clearance.', '* Design, build, test and deploy performant file analysis code.', '* Familiarity with software engineering modeling and concepts.', '* The candidate must be able to successfully complete a criminal background investigation.', '* We put great emphasis building well tested and stable solutions', '* Exceptional documentation and thorough QA.', '* 3 or more years of Golang experience.', 'If you are passionate about building robust, high-scale systems and working with on high throughput packet-capture and analysis code, then Gigamon might be the place for you.', 'We are looking for more Sensor Engineers to work on our deep packet inspection stack. Our sensors are an appliance that our customers deploy on their networks. They are responsible to processing traffic in real-time on networks upwards of 10Gb/s. The appliance analyzes traffic and uploads relevant information to our centralized service and data tiers. We are looking for someone to help us with optimizing our DPI stack for performance and throughput, adding new capabilities in terms of packet analysis and file analysis as well as to help us further improve our sensor deployment and provisioning automation.', '* Engineer solutions to maintain high SLAs in a rapidly evolving production environment.', '* Familiarity with Linux operating system concepts and networking.', '* Competitive pay and benefits', 'Core Job Role', '* Design, build, test and deploy performant packet capture and analysis code.', '* Our software helps security professionals get an unparalleled view into their networks, perform forensics on security incidents and build effective early warning systems.', 'Gigamon is an enterprise network security company focused on building capabilities that empower our customers to detect and track adversaries in real-time.']

['', "Bachelor's degree preferred but not required.Expertise in Object Oriented Design, Front End Design/Development/Architecture.Experience with Agile or Scrum software development methodologies.", 'Qualifications', 'Expertise in Object Oriented Design, Front End Design/Development/Architecture.', '5 years experience in .Net Development.Heavy experience working with different JavaScript frameworks (AngularJS preferred but expeirence with Node.js, Vue.js, etc... is also acceptable.Developing in an Agile environment is a must.Full Stack Development with HTML5/CSS, JavaScript, C#/.Net, SQL Server.Ability to pick up new Front End technologies and become the Subject Matter Expert.', 'Developing in an Agile environment is a must.', 'Heavy experience working with different JavaScript frameworks (AngularJS preferred but expeirence with Node.js, Vue.js, etc... is also acceptable.', 'Sorry, no C2C offered for this role.', 'Ability to pick up new Front End technologies and become the Subject Matter Expert.', "Our client just outside of downtown Milwaukee has an immediate need for a Sr. Software Engineer (Direct Hire/Permanent position) with a heavy Front End (AngularJS) focus. With our client being a Microsoft shop, experience with C#/.Net and SQL is also required as is working within an Agile shop since our client is looking for someone that is used to pushing out new code multiple times on a monthly basis. Since our client has a heavy Product focus, we're looking for an individual that likes to be knowledgeable within new and emerging technologies in order to help with the continued growth efforts. With a heavy front end focus, experience in UI/UX best practices also is highly desired.", 'Full Stack Development with HTML5/CSS, JavaScript, C#/.Net, SQL Server.', '5 years experience in .Net Development.', 'Qualified candidates are welcome to apply to this posting or feel free to submit your resume/cover letter to drew.pollek@connectsearchllc.com', '\xa0', 'Required background: ', "Bachelor's degree preferred but not required.", 'Experience with Agile or Scrum software development methodologies.']

This may be a combination of advanced engineering degree and industry experience.', ' Integrate Graphical User Interface (GUI) for software applications into systems control architecture.', 'Competitive compensation', ' Must be able to analyze digital electronics, especially microcontroller systems. ['', 'Duration:\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa012 Months+', "We are seeking engineers and scientists interested in a fast-paced design-test-learn life cycle for innovative computer vision projects for space. Utilizing world-class space development and test facilities, LM seeks to engineer the next generation of robust, autonomous space vehicle perception and visible navigation solutions across a variety of challenging missions. Desired experience in and/or knowledge of feature detection, tracking, matching, 3D reconstruction from multiple views, optimization for estimation problems, optical calibration, optical radiometry, image simulation, pose estimation, and algorithm implementation in embedded platforms is desired. With an appetite for accepting risk and a drive for innovation, this team intends to employ the latest advances in machine learning, autonomous driving, and deep learning research to meet exciting, emerging customer needs. In this role, you can expect to be immersed within a talented team of engineers working across a variety of potential roles. Maturation of simulation environments across a range of phenomenology's are utilized for synthetic image generation. Simulation based performance analysis within a closed-loop simulation environment, inclusive of vehicle guidance, navigation, and control (GNC) simulations, demonstrates end-to-end mission capability. Porting C/C++ code to space-industry leading avionics platforms run within real-time hardware-in-the-loop (HWIL) environments enables the team to demonstrate platform performance. Within this group, we value employees, their contributions, and work hard to build cohesive teams aligned to meet mission needs.", '• C/C++ programing background • Image Processing • Fundamental understanding in Computer Vision • Algorithm development • Feature detection, matching, and estimation', 'Please find below the job details:', 'Client:\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Lockheed Martin', "Bachelor's degree and 3 - 5 years or master's degree 0 - 3 years Active TS Clearance", 'Job Description', 'Top Secret clearance is required', 'Title\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Software Engineer (194)', 'Location:\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Littleton/Waterton CO']

['Charlotte, NC', 'A degree in Computer Science, IT, Systems Engineering or a related qualification', 'Knoxville, TN', 'Responding to system and/or network security breaches', '\xa0', 'Great awareness of cybersecurity trends, current news and events and evolving hacking techniques', 'This role would report to InfoSystems’ CISO and work directly with sales, technical, managed services and marketing teams. Top candidates would reside in one of the following Southeast locations:', 'Lexington, KY', 'Chattanooga, TN', 'Nashville, TNChattanooga, TNKnoxville, TNBirmingham, ALHuntsville, ALCharlotte, NCLexington, KY', 'Daily administrative tasks, reporting and communication with the relevant departments in the organization', 'Troubleshooting of security and network problems', 'Ability to work under pressure in a fast-paced environment', 'Nashville, TN', 'Strong knowledge in the following areas of cybersecurity: Firewall Management Services, HIPAA Risk & Gap Assessment, Incident Response & Remediation, Mobile Device Management, NIST Security Controls, Penetration Testing, Security Information & Event Management, Simulated Phishing & Employee Awareness Training, SOC 2 Compliance, Vendor Risk Assessment', 'InfoSystems is seeking to hire a Cybersecurity Engineer with an analytical mind and a detailed understanding of cybersecurity methodologies to support business development and client relations. The ideal candidate is expected to have a meticulous attention to detail, outstanding problem-solving skills, work comfortably under pressure and deliver on tight deadlines.', 'Huntsville, AL', 'Testing and identifying network and system vulnerabilities', 'Cybersecurity Engineer Responsibilities', 'Participating in the change management process', 'Planning, implementing, managing, monitoring and upgrading security measures for the protection of our clients’ data, systems and networks', 'Cybersecurity Engineer Requirements', 'Birmingham, AL', 'Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) credentials', '5+ years of work experience with in the cybersecurity arena', 'A degree in Computer Science, IT, Systems Engineering or a related qualification5+ years of work experience with in the cybersecurity arenaCertified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) credentialsStrong knowledge in the following areas of cybersecurity: Firewall Management Services, HIPAA Risk & Gap Assessment, Incident Response & Remediation, Mobile Device Management, NIST Security Controls, Penetration Testing, Security Information & Event Management, Simulated Phishing & Employee Awareness Training, SOC 2 Compliance, Vendor Risk AssessmentAbility to work under pressure in a fast-paced environmentGreat awareness of cybersecurity trends, current news and events and evolving hacking techniques', 'To ensure success, our Cybersecurity Engineer must display an excellent understanding of technology infrastructures using firewalls, VPN, data loss prevention, IDS/IPS, vulnerability management, end-point protection, MDR, MFA, networking architecture, CIS benchmarke, web-proxy and various security audits. Top candidates will be comfortable working with a variety of technologies, including (but not limited to) servers and infrastructure, hypervisors and virtualization, Cisco, SonicWall, Cylance and SIEM. The candidate should be able to confidently analyze clients’ security posture and seek improvements on a continuous basis, report possible threats, research weaknesses and find ways to counter them and find cost-effective solutions to their cybersecurity challenges.', 'Planning, implementing, managing, monitoring and upgrading security measures for the protection of our clients’ data, systems and networksTroubleshooting of security and network problemsResponding to system and/or network security breachesEnsuring that client data and infrastructure are protected by enabling the appropriate security controlsParticipating in the change management processTesting and identifying network and system vulnerabilitiesDaily administrative tasks, reporting and communication with the relevant departments in the organization', 'Ensuring that client data and infrastructure are protected by enabling the appropriate security controls']

['', '  5+ years of Engineering experience, developing and maintaining high traffic services.   Strong fundamental knowledge of software development and best practices, especially with respect to web service implementation.   Experience with the ins and outs of external systems integration, with defensive and hardened approaches to mitigate downstream issues.   Technical leader and a mentor to junior members of the team.   Some background of JVM languages (Scala is a plus, but Java/Kotlin experience is fine). Python familiarity is helpful.   RDBMS design and best practices (we use MySQL, but anything related is perfectly ok). Familiarity with key/value stores is also helpful.   Familiarity with Kubernetes, containers, AWS, and other at-scale infrastructure is awesome, but not strictly required.   An unwillingness to settle for “good enough”, instead staying focused on longevity through well-tested code and continuous improvement.   Past experience working in a distributed-first team and collaborating with a variety of engineer and non-engineer roles. ', ' Past experience working in a distributed-first team and collaborating with a variety of engineer and non-engineer roles. ', 'Who?', ' 5+ years of Engineering experience, developing and maintaining high traffic services. ', '  BE AN OWNER & BE BOLD: Own multiple services powering Twilio’s suite of “over-the-top” messaging channels: MMS, WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, Verified SMS, and other providers   DRAW THE OWL: Design and develop elegant and scalable solutions across a wide variety of contexts, fronted with a highly available and responsive API guaranteeing 99.999% SLA.   EMPOWER OTHERS: Interact extensively across all other engineering teams within Twilio and more specifically within other messaging teams to align on engineering architecture decisions. Development, Test, Production and Disaster Recovery) and in accordance with industry best practices and internal change management standards.\xa0\xa0', '2+ years’ experience in utilizing SQL to retrieve and/or update data\xa0', 'Basic Qualifications\xa0', 'Bachelor’s degree in Management Information Systems or Computer Science\xa0\xa0', 'Primary\xa0Responsibilities\xa0', 'Extensive knowledge of complex Windows Server configurations, architecture, and high availability options. Demonstrated knowledge of SQL server and SQL query writing and custom scripting\xa0', 'Primary\xa0Responsibilities', 'Design, coordinate, configure and install highly secure and scalable applications across multiple environments (ex. Development, Test, Production and Disaster Recovery) and in accordance with industry best practices and internal change management standards.\xa0\xa0Coordinate upgrades and patches with other technology teams and business owners.\xa0Utilize advanced scripting techniques and/or current Windows based programming languages to automate processes or enhance/customize third party software that is supported by the team.\xa0Manage data movement for supported systems by leveraging an enterprise scheduling system, advanced scripting techniques and SSIS development.\xa0', 'We are looking for an experienced Software Systems Engineer\xa0to join the Business Information Management team.\xa0This\xa0is\xa0a\xa0hybrid team that supports the systems\xa0implementation, configuration, monitoring and ongoing support of 3rd party technology solutions and their supporting subsystems in legal, risk, business technology\xa0and\xa0other areas of the organization.\xa0', 'Coordinate upgrades and patches with other technology teams and business owners.\xa0', 'Manage data movement for supported systems by leveraging an enterprise scheduling system, advanced scripting techniques and SSIS development.\xa0', "Bachelor’s degree in Management Information Systems or Computer Science\xa0\xa05+ years’ relevant experience in implementing, configuring, automating, and monitoring enterprise systems (e.g. customer relationship management systems, records management, and financial systems)\xa02+ years’ experience in utilizing advanced scripting techniques or developing applications\xa02+ years’ experience in utilizing SQL to retrieve and/or update data\xa0Technical certification such as Microsoft's MCSD, MCSA, MCSE are a plus\xa0Extensive knowledge of complex Windows Server configurations, architecture, and high availability options. Demonstrated knowledge of SQL server and SQL query writing and custom scripting\xa0", 'In this role you must apply sound software engineering and business principles in the administration and documentation of software for products and systems. You will be responsible for administering business-facing applications using Office 365,\xa0enterprise scheduling systems, advanced scripting techniques, SSIS development, PowerShell, and other\xa0windows-based\xa0technologies.\xa0', '2+ years’ experience in utilizing advanced scripting techniques or developing applications\xa0', 'Utilize advanced scripting techniques and/or current Windows based programming languages to automate processes or enhance/customize third party software that is supported by the team.\xa0', "Technical certification such as Microsoft's MCSD, MCSA, MCSE are a plus\xa0", 'Basic Qualifications\xa0\xa0']

', ' Fueled by a fundamental belief that having access to financial services creates opportunity, PayPal (NASDAQ: PYPL) is committed to democratizing financial services and empowering people and businesses to join and thrive in the global economy. Our open digital payments platform gives PayPal’s 305 million active account holders the confidence to connect and transact in new and powerful ways, whether they are online, on a mobile device, in an app, or in person. Through a combination of technological innovation and strategic partnerships, PayPal creates better ways to manage and move money, and offers choice and flexibility when sending payments, paying or getting paid. Available in more than 200 markets around the world, the PayPal platform, including Braintree, Venmo and Xoom, enables consumers and merchants to receive money in more than 100 currencies, withdraw funds in 56 currencies and hold balances in their PayPal accounts in 25 currencies. Our employees challenge the status quo, ask questions, and find solutions. We want to break down barriers to financial empowerment. Join us as we change the way the world defines financial freedom. ['Deliverables • Enable metadata management program to represent inventory, classification and lineage • Configure metadata fields (context descriptions, owners, etc.) and integrate with Informatica Axon • Connect resources holding structured data to Informatica EDC • Perform data discovery and set initial classifications/categorizations • With technical lead, stand up tooling to discover semi and unstructured data • Interpret semi-structured data formats, including XML, JSON, and other proprietary formats • Document functional requirements for technical resources that implement and operate machine learning production models. ', 'Deliverables', 'Skills', ' Skills • Seven to ten years of experience in data governance, data quality, data preparation, or data architecture • Experience in SAP, SAP MDG, SFDC (Salesforce), Informatica, HANA, and Tableau environments • Prior experience in all stages of data discovery, classification, categorization and tagging required. • Preferred experience with set up, development and configuration of Informatica Enterprise Data Catalog • Application administration and troubleshooting; Strong understanding of databases and database structures and connecting to databases. • Understand and demonstrate experience working with semi-structured and unstructured data at Terabyte scale • Comfortable working with business and technical stakeholders to enable networking crawling solutions, ediscovery, and/or data and file cataloging solutions • Comfortable working with business and technical stakeholders to support data classification at scale • Familiarity with Big Data solution architecture from a user perspective, and capable of supporting users that work in a Big Data environment • Familiarity with Machine Learning and Advanced analytics. • Ability to effectively communicate technical issues and solutions to business partners, verbally and in writing - MUST be an outstanding communicator.’ • Hands-on person with exceptional analytical and problem-solving abilities.']

['', 'A strong sense of accountability and ownership and the ability to proactively manage multiple priorities, and adapt to a rapidly changing environment', 'Comfort with A/B Testing methodologies, experiment design and segmentation', 'A highly analytical mind with a demonstrated ability to conduct and interpret quantitative and qualitative analyses', '\xa0', "You’re a curious, highly motivated, quantitative-minded thinker who enjoys helping design data systems and analyze behavior at the crossroads of mobile, local, social and commerce. Perhaps you’re a Data Analyst with a curiosity around data infrastructure and data architecture. Perhaps you’re a Data Engineer with an interest in building deeper business domain expertise. Perhaps you love translating business requirements into elegant tables and dashboards. In this role, you'll have an opportunity to do all of the above and drive impact on a large scale by delivering trusted, transformed data that the entire company and senior leadership will use to power product and business decisions.", 'Improve our team workflow through knowledge sharing and documentation around our data.', 'Be a key curator of our data. The tags, Hive views, dashboards and reports you will help design will ultimately impact how our stakeholders and broader company; access, understand and utilize our proprietary data set built around structured web event logs and key transactional dataWork closely with Product, Engineering, and Finance teams to ensure upstream changes to our product and business can be captured and integrated into our existing data model, and when needed manage the design and development of additional assets and capabilitiesDesign client-side analytics tags and methodologies for tag documentation, testing protocols, ensuring data consistency across new and existing data trackingCollaborate with data scientists, product managers, marketers, and analysts to craft analytics deliverables and integrate analytics into strategic-minded dashboards, reports, and ad-hoc analyses.Improve our team workflow through knowledge sharing and documentation around our data.', 'Some Challenges You’ll Tackle:', 'Excellent communication skills and the ability to be a quick learner who thrives under ambiguity', 'About the right team member:', 'Fantastic database experience - architecting data collection solutions and dealing with very large session and web event data sets', 'A deep understanding and experience with structured web event data, specifically front end tag creation, collection, data architecture, and data analysis', 'You Should Have:', 'A great team player with a strong value system, unquestioned integrity and solid listening skills', 'We work in close collaboration with teams across Product, Engineering, Finance, Marketing and Design to understand and anticipate the needs of our business and ensure that our data can be utilized to understand, evaluate, and measure the performance and progress of our product features, initiatives, and markets. You’ll work on key projects alongside our product managers, data scientists, data engineers, and our senior leadership team. These projects add tremendous value to the business and we are looking for a thoughtful, driven, and curious analytics lead to push the business even further.', 'Bachelors degree required', 'Inspired by our mission to deliver food happiness', 'Collaborate with data scientists, product managers, marketers, and analysts to craft analytics deliverables and integrate analytics into strategic-minded dashboards, reports, and ad-hoc analyses.', '5-7 years of relevant web and native app data analytics/ data engineering experienceFantastic database experience - architecting data collection solutions and dealing with very large session and web event data setsExperience mining data with advanced SQL and business intelligence tools - we leverage Presto and Redash as well as TableauA deep understanding and experience with structured web event data, specifically front end tag creation, collection, data architecture, and data analysisComfort with A/B Testing methodologies, experiment design and segmentationA highly analytical mind with a demonstrated ability to conduct and interpret quantitative and qualitative analysesComfort drawing insights from analysis and building support for your perspective, having a keen eye to simplify complex, large data sets into easily digestible visualizationsA strong sense of accountability and ownership and the ability to proactively manage multiple priorities, and adapt to a rapidly changing environmentExcellent communication skills and the ability to be a quick learner who thrives under ambiguityA great team player with a strong value system, unquestioned integrity and solid listening skillsInspired by our mission to deliver food happinessBachelors degree required', 'Be a key curator of our data. The tags, Hive views, dashboards and reports you will help design will ultimately impact how our stakeholders and broader company; access, understand and utilize our proprietary data set built around structured web event logs and key transactional data', 'Comfort drawing insights from analysis and building support for your perspective, having a keen eye to simplify complex, large data sets into easily digestible visualizations', '5-7 years of relevant web and native app data analytics/ data engineering experience', 'The Data Analytics team at Grubhub is responsible for data architecture, instrumentation, and reporting. We own data cleanliness end-to-end, from architecting and transforming raw data, to serving as the domain and technical experts that translate business needs into beautiful data products.', 'Design client-side analytics tags and methodologies for tag documentation, testing protocols, ensuring data consistency across new and existing data tracking', 'Work closely with Product, Engineering, and Finance teams to ensure upstream changes to our product and business can be captured and integrated into our existing data model, and when needed manage the design and development of additional assets and capabilities', 'Experience mining data with advanced SQL and business intelligence tools - we leverage Presto and Redash as well as Tableau']

job_title: Sr. Data Engineer - Claims Data Science
job_text: ['', 'Bachelor degree or equivalent experience in a related quantitative fieldExperience accessing and retrieving data from disparate large data sources, by creating and tuning SQL queries. Experience with object oriented programming and software development a plus. Proficiency with Github and Linux highly desired.Ability to analyze data sources and provide technical solutions. Strong exploratory and problem solving skills to check for data quality issues.Determine business recommendations and translate into actionable steps Self-starter with curiosity and a willingness to become a data expertDemonstrate a passion to both learn new skills and lead discovery of the data research Results oriented with the ability to multi-task and adjust priorities when necessary Ability to work both independently and in a team environment with internal customers Ability to articulate and train technical concepts regarding data to both data scientists and partners', 'Identify and validate internal and external data sources for availability and quality. job_title: Sr. Software Engineer, Oracle Cloud Infrastructure
job_text: ['We’re looking for hands-on engineers with expertise and passion in solving difficult problems in distributed systems, virtualized infrastructure, and highly available services. If this is you, at Oracle you can design and build innovative new systems from the ground up. These are exciting times in our space - we are growing fast, still at an early stage, and working on ambitious new initiatives. An engineer at any level can have significant technical and business impact. ', 'Be a generalist,      able to debug issues across a wide breadth of our stack. ', 'History of working      in large codebases in C/C++, C#, Java, or Go, and experience with      scripting languages such as Python, Perl, etc. ', ' Architect and      design new features and systems for our customers.  Work across teams      to engineer the best system (both for operations and for customers)      regardless of org boundaries or ownership.  Debug, maintain and      improve existing systems, with a focus especially for reducing operational      burden and on performance.  Be a generalist,      able to debug issues across a wide breadth of our stack.  Scale our systems      by building tooling and automation.  Work with partner      teams outside our org and external to Oracle.  ', 'Debug, maintain and      improve existing systems, with a focus especially for reducing operational      burden and on performance. ', 'Strong knowledge of      data structures, algorithms, operating systems, and distributed systems      fundamentals. ', ' \xa0BS degree in      Computer Science or related technical field involving coding or equivalent      practical experience.  2+ years experience      delivering and operating large scale, highly available distributed      systems.  History of working      in large codebases in C/C++, C#, Java, or Go, and experience with      scripting languages such as Python, Perl, etc.  Strong knowledge of      data structures, algorithms, operating systems, and distributed systems      fundamentals.  Systematic      problem-solving approach, strong communication skills, a sense of      ownership and drive.  \xa0Experience      building multi-tenant, virtualized infrastructure a strong plus.', "Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) combines the elasticity and utility of public cloud with the granular control, security, and predictability of on-premises infrastructure to deliver high-performance, high availability and cost-effective infrastructure services. Multiple compute options provide the flexibility to run the most demanding workloads, as well as less compute-intensive applications, in a secure and highly available cloud environment. Customers can self-service provision virtual machines right alongside bare metal servers and clusters on the same virtual cloud networks, through a unified web console, APIs, CLI or via industry standard tools such as Terraform and Chef. OCI's approach gives the customer choices for storage us industry leading local NVME storage or elastic network block storage. ", '2+ years experience      delivering and operating large scale, highly available distributed      systems. ', 'The ideal software engineer candidate for the Imaging team is a proficient programmer who has large breadth of knowledge and experience including areas such as networking, storage, internet protocols and operating systems. We write distributed, highly available systems to build, update and deploy Kubernetes, plus automation and tooling for testing, deployments and other needs. ', 'Position Overview: ', '\xa0BS degree in      Computer Science or related technical field involving coding or equivalent      practical experience. ', 'Architect and      design new features and systems for our customers. ', '\xa0Experience      building multi-tenant, virtualized infrastructure a strong plus.', "The Oracle Kubernetes Engine (OKE) team builds the OCI service that runs our managed Kubernetes experience. \xa0It is in use by a variety of internal and external customers, and we're actively adding features - from Kubernetes, to deeper integrations with OCI, and to better allow cluster management. \xa0The team operates a 24x7 service at scale. \xa0We have a large roadmap of features to enable scenarios for new customers coming onboard in the coming quarters. ", '\xa0 ', 'Work across teams      to engineer the best system (both for operations and for customers)      regardless of org boundaries or ownership. ', 'Work with partner      teams outside our org and external to Oracle. ', 'Qualifications ', 'Systematic      problem-solving approach, strong communication skills, a sense of      ownership and drive. ', 'Scale our systems      by building tooling and automation. ', 'Responsibilities ']

job_text: ['', 'Preferred (not required) Skills:', 'Active TS/SCI clearance with polygraph', 'Designs, develops, builds, analyzes, evaluates and installs database management systems to include database modeling and design, relational database architecture, metadata and repository creation and configuration management.\xa0Uses data mapping, data mining and data transformational analysis tools to design and develop databases.\xa0Determines data storage and optimum storage requirements.\xa0Prepares system requirements, source analysis and process analyses and design throughout the database implementation.\xa0Technologies include:\xa0HBASE/Hadoop, ElasticSearch, AWS (EMR, DynamoDB, S3) Relational databases (DBMS), SQL (PostgreSQL/MySQL/ Oracle) Database Models, scripting', HBASE/Hadoop', 'Experience with relational databases and database models such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle', 'Proficiency with SQL', 'Uses data mapping, data mining and data transformational analysis tools to design and develop databases.\xa0', 'We are looking for a senior database engineer to design, develop, and build data repositories using both relational and non relational technologies as part of our talented team.\xa0\xa0', 'Determines data storage and optimum storage requirements.\xa0', 'Experience working in a development environment with application scheduled releases.\xa0', 'Minimum of 4 years of experience (within the last 10 years) in database development\xa0', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Electrical or Computer Engineering or a related technical discipline, or the equivalent combination of education, technical training, or work/military experience ', 'Data Works, an E3/Sentinel company, is an employee-focused technology company that supports the Intelligence Community by providing Big Data solutions including data transformation, advanced analytics, custom web application development, data architecture, data science, cloud and systems engineering solutions.\xa0We favor a high-quality workforce over aggressive growth and provide opportunities on programs that fill mission-critical needs. Due to our emphasis on employee engagement and development, we’ve been named a Great Place to Work by Washingtonian Magazine (2015-2019).', 'Prepares system requirements, source analysis and process analyses and design throughout the database implementation.\xa0', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Electrical or Computer Engineering or a related technical discipline, or the equivalent combination of education, technical training, or work/military experience Minimum of 4 years of experience (within the last 10 years) in database development\xa0Experience working in a development environment with application scheduled releases.\xa0Familiarity with Amazon Web Services such as EMR, DynamoDB, S3Experience with relational databases and database models such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, OracleProficiency with SQLActive TS/SCI clearance with polygraph', 'Required Skills:', 'Familiarity with Amazon Web Services such as EMR, DynamoDB, S3', 'Data Works, an E3/Sentinel company, is an equal opportunity employer and Vietnam Era Veterans Readjustment Assistance Act (VEVRAA) federal contractor. All qualified applicants receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, national origin, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, protected veteran status, or status as a qualified individual with a disability. Data Works, an E3/Sentinel company, hires and promotes individuals solely on the basis of their qualifications for the job to be filled.', 'Designs, develops, builds, analyzes, evaluates and installs database management systems to include database modeling and design, relational database architecture, metadata and repository creation and configuration management.\xa0']

['', 'Skills/Experience We Seek for the Product Owner', 'REMOTE Product Owner - Telecommunications', 'Experience with a DevOps team and culture', 'Ability to travel 2-3 times a year, sometimes internationally', "If you're interested in learning more about this Product Owner role, please send your resume to\xa0Holly@primeteampartners.com.", 'Our global client is looking for a Systems Engineer-Product Owner to join their team for a 6-12 month contract-to-hire opportunity. We are looking for someone with a background in telecommunications and a strong understanding of location standards. This role may require early/late work, as you will be working with teams abroad.', 'Prime Team Partners is an equal opportunity employer. Prime Team Partners does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, national origin, pregnancy status, gender, age, marital status, disability, medical condition, sexual orientation, or any other characteristics protected by applicable state or federal civil rights laws.', '5+ years’ experience as a Product Owner, with a background in telecommunications', 'Understanding of telecommunications "location standards" specific to the mobile industry', '5+ years’ experience as a Product Owner, with a background in telecommunicationsUnderstanding of telecommunications "location standards" specific to the mobile industryExperience documenting and prioritizing requirementsUnderstand of APIs and software integrationStrong communication skills and business acumenExperience with a DevOps team and cultureFamiliarity with Kubernetes and OpenStack ideal, but not requiredAbility to travel 2-3 times a year, sometimes internationally', 'Strong communication skills and business acumen', 'Understand of APIs and software integration', 'Experience documenting and prioritizing requirements', 'Familiarity with Kubernetes and OpenStack ideal, but not required']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer: Full-Stack (E-commerce - Order Experience)
job_text: ['', 'You have at least two demonstrable experiences in leading full-stack deployments of systems into production.', 'Experience with distributed systems, CI/CD (ex: Jenkins) tools, and containerizing applications (ex: Kubernetes).', 'Promote iterative development, using best practices such as feature toggles, CI/CD, canary releases, test automation, logging, and monitoring to ensure confidence in our release process', 'Familiar with observability.', 'You have a solid understanding of object-oriented and functional programming design principles.', 'In This Role, You Will', 'Have a strong technical voice in team discussions and decisions.', 'Ability to say NO, respectfully challenge ideas, and call out potential trade-offs.', 'Experience with two or more aspects of our tech stack (Python, Kotlin, Javascript/TypeScript, Postgres, AWS, GraphQL, DataDog, Docker, Kubernetes).', 'Experience with multiple database engines (Postgres, MySql).', 'You have a love for clean, elegant code.', 'You worked on a system that had to deal with internationalization and localization.', 'Full-stack web application development with a variety of languages including but not limited to Python, Javascript/TypeScript, Kotlin, etc.', 'Write understandable, testable code with an eye towards maintainability and scalability.', ' Enjoy tech talks, katas, lunch and learns, and geeking over programming languages, architecture, category theory, or whatever engineering topic you are passionate about. Experience working within e-commerce and third-party payment gateways. Attend meetups, conferences, and participate in the software engineering community. Contribute to open-source projects. Experience migrating a monolithic system to an ecosystem of microservices. Have tried Test-Driven Development (TDD). Experience with or knowledge of DDD, CQRS, and Event Sourcing. Enjoy talking to product, design, and business stakeholders to understand the problem space better. You worked on a system that had to deal with internationalization and localization. ', 'Actively maintain and build a culture of learning, respect, transparency, and trust.', 'Become a domain expert in e-commerce by working closely with our product managers and stakeholders.', 'Qualifications', 'You have at least eight years of software development experience.', ' Have a strong technical voice in team discussions and decisions. Assume technical responsibility for new services and functionality, lookout for opportunities for platform improvement, and work with engineers to scale our production systems. Contribute to the adoption of software architecture and new technologies. Lead, coach, pair with, and mentor backend software engineers. Actively maintain and build a culture of learning, respect, transparency, and trust. Full-stack web application development with a variety of languages including but not limited to Python, Javascript/TypeScript, Kotlin, etc. Write understandable, testable code with an eye towards maintainability and scalability. Collaborate with other engineers by taking part in pair programming, whiteboarding solutions, team discussions to work as a team rather than working in isolation. Help to evolve our system, organically without over-engineering, to promote simplicity, and working software. Promote constant refactoring while developing features or touching existing code to keep the codebase as clean as possible. Promote iterative development, using best practices such as feature toggles, CI/CD, canary releases, test automation, logging, and monitoring to ensure confidence in our release process Active engagement in technical discussions during architecture meetings, code reviews, and design docs to help promote a culture of learning and constant improvement. Defend the integrity of the codebase, never compromising on code quality. Ability to say NO, respectfully challenge ideas, and call out potential trade-offs. Become a domain expert in e-commerce by working closely with our product managers and stakeholders. Partner with our SRE and infrastructure teams to scale and monitor our services. ', 'Assume technical responsibility for new services and functionality, lookout for opportunities for platform improvement, and work with engineers to scale our production systems.', 'You have an understanding of testing and CI/CD.', 'Enjoy tech talks, katas, lunch and learns, and geeking over programming languages, architecture, category theory, or whatever engineering topic you are passionate about.', 'Contribute to the adoption of software architecture and new technologies.', 'Have tried Test-Driven Development (TDD).', 'Partner with our SRE and infrastructure teams to scale and monitor our services.', 'Lead, coach, pair with, and mentor backend software engineers.', 'Experience migrating a monolithic system to an ecosystem of microservices.', 'Experience with or knowledge of DDD, CQRS, and Event Sourcing.', 'Active engagement in technical discussions during architecture meetings, code reviews, and design docs to help promote a culture of learning and constant improvement.', 'Familiar with at least one JavaScript framework like React (preferred), Vue, or similar.', 'Help to evolve our system, organically without over-engineering, to promote simplicity, and working software.', ' You have at least eight years of software development experience. You have at least two demonstrable experiences in leading full-stack deployments of systems into production. Passionate about technology, new ideas, and always willing to learn new things. You have a love for clean, elegant code. You have an understanding of agile, lean, and DevOps principles. You have an understanding of testing and CI/CD. You have a solid understanding of object-oriented and functional programming design principles. Experience with two or more aspects of our tech stack (Python, Kotlin, Javascript/TypeScript, Postgres, AWS, GraphQL, DataDog, Docker, Kubernetes). Experience with distributed systems, CI/CD (ex: Jenkins) tools, and containerizing applications (ex: Kubernetes). Experience with multiple database engines (Postgres, MySql). Familiar with at least one backend framework like Django, Rails, Spring, or similar. Familiar with at least one JavaScript framework like React (preferred), Vue, or similar. Familiar with observability. Capacity to work in high growth, fast-paced environments, and can adapt to change. You have an expert understanding of industry best practices and standards. You have excellent communication and teamwork skills. ', 'Bonus Points If You', 'Capacity to work in high growth, fast-paced environments, and can adapt to change.', 'Attend meetups, conferences, and participate in the software engineering community.', 'Enjoy talking to product, design, and business stakeholders to understand the problem space better.', 'You have excellent communication and teamwork skills.', 'About Peloton', 'You have an understanding of agile, lean, and DevOps principles.', 'You have an expert understanding of industry best practices and standards.', 'Contribute to open-source projects.', 'Experience working within e-commerce and third-party payment gateways.', 'Collaborate with other engineers by taking part in pair programming, whiteboarding solutions, team discussions to work as a team rather than working in isolation.', 'Defend the integrity of the codebase, never compromising on code quality.', 'Promote constant refactoring while developing features or touching existing code to keep the codebase as clean as possible.', 'Passionate about technology, new ideas, and always willing to learn new things.', 'Familiar with at least one backend framework like Django, Rails, Spring, or similar.']

['Company Overview:', 'Education', 'JOB SUMMARY', 'PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS', 'WORKING CONDITIONS', 'REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS', 'MAJOR DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Related Work Experience', "Company Overview:Charter Communications is America’s fastest growing TV, internet and voice company. We’re committed to integrating the highest quality service with superior entertainment and communications products. Charter is at the intersection of technology and entertainment, facilitating essential communications that connect 24 million residential and business customers in 41 states. Our commitment to serving customers and exceeding their expectations is the bedrock of Charter’s business strategy and it’s the philosophy that guides our 90,000 employees.JOB SUMMARYThe Advanced Analytics group has implemented and is operating a new advanced Big Data analytics platform that enables new self-service analytics, decision engineering support, machine learning, modeling, forecasting, and optimizations in Charter’s Advanced Engineering organization. This position is responsible to create and maintain scalable, reliable, consistent and repeatable platforms, systems, and models that support data, data products, and analytical products for advanced analytics by gathering, processing, exploring, and modeling raw and diverse data at scale. It requires lifecycle management of multiple data sources, data discovery, and models. This position architects and delivers models, analytics, automation, and self-service, which are major tenets of the analytics platform.The most successful candidate will have lifecycle experience in machine learning, deep learning, and/or artificial intelligence within modern parallel environments, such as GPU-enabled platforms and distributed clusters. This lifecycle includes conceiving, developing, prototyping, analyzing, and implementing models with very large (i.e., the top end of big data) and diverse datasets and in collaboration with stakeholders. Desirable experience includes using big data platforms for sources (e.g., Snowflake, AWS/s3, and Hadoop) to create deep learning and machine learning models with GPU-based Python (e.g., NVIDIA/DGX/RAPIDS).MAJOR DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIESFrames and models meaningful business and engineering scenarios that impact critical business and engineering processes, architectures, and/or decisionsResearches, develops, and implements machine learning models, deep learning models, artificial intelligence, and algorithms that solve business and engineering problemsDevelops innovative and effective approaches to solve model problems while communicating the results and methodologiesLeverages multiple data sources to produce products that solve the needs of business and engineering for descriptive models, predictive models, diagnostic models, and prescriptive modelsApplies data mining, data discovery, machine learning, deep learning, and artificial intelligence techniques to large structured and unstructured datasets for model creationGathers and processes raw data at scale from any source and in any formatBalances workloads and operational demands with open source technologies, cloud services, and commercial solutions while optimizing cost and time-to-solution demandsCreates highly reusable code modules, templates, and packages that can be leveraged across model lifecycleIncreases speed to delivery by architecting and implementing automated solutionsMentors, educates, and provides senior leadership to data scientists, data analysts, and data engineersREQUIRED QUALIFICATIONSAbility to create proof of concept experiments for analytics, machine learning, or visualization tools that includes hypothesis, test plans, and outcome analysis.Ability to create unsupervised and supervised models. Time series expertise is a plus.Solid statistical knowledge and techniques.Exceptional programming skills in PythonExperience with one of the deep learning frameworks, such as TensorFlow or PyTorch.Develop highly scalable systems, algorithms, and tools to support machine learning, deep learning, and artificial intelligence solutions.Lifecycle management using Docker and containerization.Experience with Snowflake, AWS, Hadoop, and/or Spark.Excellent pattern recognition and predictive modeling skills.Extracting data and delivering complete analytics and machine learning products primarily using Python; secondary experience with R, Java, Javascript, C, C++, Scala, or Julia is an asset.Work closely with other data scientists, data engineers, and systems/infrastructure teams to deploy end-to-end models capable of serving production traffic in real-time.Develop, integrate and optimize model/AI/ML/DL pipelines.Leverage modern parallel environments, e.g. distributed clusters, multicore SMP, GPU, TPU and FPGA.Design and implement feedback loops for continual model updates and improvementsExperience receiving, converting, and cleansing big data.Visualization or BI tools, such as Tableau, Microstrategy, RapidMiner, or anything Microsoft Power BI.Program, product, or project management experience delivering model and analytics results.Strong background in Linux/Unix/CentOS/MacOS and Windows installation and administration.Keen attention to detail with the ability to effectively prioritize and execute multiple tasks.Ability to read, write, speak and understand English.PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONSJupyter Notebooks, NVIDIA GPU-based Deep Learning, and NVIDIA RAPIDS.Familiarity with APIs: Javascript API, Rest API or Data Extract APIs.Familiarity with data workflow/data prep platforms, such as Alteryx, Pentaho, or KNIME.Familiarity with DevOps/CI/CD/automation/configuration/orchestration management using Puppet, Chef, Ansible, Jenkins, Kubernetes, Airflow, or equivalents.Knowledge of best practices and IT operations in an always-up, always-available service.Knowledge of Agile, Scrum, and SAFe environments. Experience delivering within these environment a plus.EducationBachelor's degree in a data science, engineering discipline, computer science, statistics, applied math, or related field required.Master’s degree in a data science, engineering discipline, computer science, statistics, applied math, or related field preferred.Related Work Experience3-5+ years of experience in one or more of the following areas: machine learning, deep learning, recommendation systems, natural language processing, fraud detection or artificial intelligence3-5+ years of experience of lifecycle management in one or more of the following from idea to deployment: artificial intelligence, deep learning models, machine learning models, recommendation systems, natural language processing, or fraud detection.3-5+ years of experience in data engineering position and/or software development.Experience delivering multiple systems where candidate was responsible for designing the architecture, implementing, operating, supporting, and managing the release lifecycle from inception to end of life.7-10+ years of hands-on working experience with Python, RDBMS, SQL, scripting, and coding.Proven experience in translating insights into business recommendations.WORKING CONDITIONSCharter Technical Engineering CenterHighly collaborative and innovative work spaceOccasional Travel ", 'The health and safety of our employees and candidates is very important to us. Spectrum has adopted virtual mobile recruiting tools that allow us to continue meeting new candidates. We look forward to “virtually” meeting you.The Spectrum brands (including Spectrum Networks, Spectrum Enterprise and Spectrum Reach) are powered and innovated by Charter Communications. Charter Communications reaffirms its commitment to providing equal opportunities for employment and advancement to qualified employees and applicants. Individuals will be considered for positions for which they meet the minimum qualifications and are able to perform without regard to race, color, gender, age, religion, disability, national origin, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other basis protected by federal, state or local laws.']

['', 'Job Description:', 'Protocol-level knowledge of programming (OSI 2, 3, 4)\xa0.', 'One of our client is looking to hire a "Senior C++ Software Engineer" in Washington DC. Please find the job details below-', 'Experience with network programming, Windows Services & Drivers, and Linux Drivers & Daemons\xa0', 'Flexible “Personal Time Off (PTO)” plan and 10+ paid holiday days per year', 'Responsibilities:', 'Benefits:', 'Expert-level understanding of authorization and authentication systems in computing environments\xa0.', 'As a Sr. Software Engineer, you will be responsible for designing and developing Services/Daemons/Drivers that enable information gathering and monitoring of system and network events. This work includes the design, development, and Tier 3 support across a variety of platforms and operating systems. The position is highly technical requiring comprehensive, knowledge of operating systems, Active Directory, WMI, LDAP and protocol level network programming. Our ideal candidate will have a strong work ethic, fantastic attitude and be comfortable addressing new challenges on a daily basis. We provide significant flexibility and autonomy to team members, have high expectations and expect everyone to contribute meaningfully to our broader collective goals.', 'Write exceptional code in either C/C++ or C# to meet the Product team’s requirements, including the development of all automated unit tests.\xa0', 'Nice to haves:', 'Adept at learning and applying new technologies Excellent communication skills', 'Competitive salary\xa0', 'Company Description:', 'General Requirements:', 'Full range of benefits, including 401(k) and medical, dental & vision coverage\xa0', 'Design applications as part of a multi-discipline team for Cyber, Insurance, and Finance offerings.\xa0', '10-15 years of experience developing similar Services/Daemons on Windows, MacOS, or Linux\xa0', 'Set and manage expectations with senior stakeholders, team members, and company management', 'Conduct root cause analyses of performance and instability of systems and designs with respect to accuracy and performance.\xa0', 'We apply artificial intelligence to solve complex, real-world problems at scale. Our Human+AI operating system, our:OS™, blends capabilities ranging from data handling, analytics, and reporting to advanced algorithms, simulations, and machine learning, enabling decisions that are just-in-time, just-in-place, and just-in-context.', 'Incentive stock options\xa0', 'A positive attitude around learning new skills and capabilities.', 'Technical team leadership skills with the ability to prioritize and execute in a methodical and disciplined manner\xa0.', 'Communication and collaboration skills for participating in & shaping the architecture and design of systems.', 'You will be working with functionally diverse teams and individuals to collaboratively design, develop, support, and maintain software applications.\xa0']

', '-Experience working with open-source projects and collaborating with open- source communities', 'Preferreds:', 'Overview', '-Good fundamentals of UDP, IP headers, IPv4/IPv6, and DNS protocols', '-Proven experience designing and implementing features in large distributed systems', "This company is building a dedicated Internet, initially to be used for online multiplayer games, by significantly reducing lag and creating a seamless, uninterrupted experience! ["You're disciplined at unit, integration, and acceptance testing. ", 'You have strong CS fundamentals. ', 'Our Search Team is looking for you, a senior engineer, to help us build and improve the key backend services that power the OpenTable search experience for diners on all kinds of platforms from desktop, mobile web, iOS, and Android apps. Our services help support a variety of search related capabilities, from creating personalized and contextualized homescreens, to improving the relevance of search results, optimizing query autocomplete, and many more. ', 'Design, develop, test, deploy, maintain and improve existing  systems. We’ll be mainly working in Java and using ElasticSearch. ', "At OpenTable, we deliver creative products through rapid, continuous development. Millions of diners and thousands of restaurants around the globe use our products. If you are an engineer with an interest in search, passionate about problem solving, and love to use technologies to improve customer experience, we'd like to meet you. Bonus points if you love restaurants. ", "Next up, we will invite you for a remote interview with a few of our team members, including engineers and product managers. We will pair with you on a coding task, and have a conversation where we can get to know each other. We'll ask some deeper technical questions, and talk about how you approach software development and the culture of building products. You'll have a chance to ask us what we are building, how we work, what we stand for, and anything else you'd like to know. ", '3+ years of Java programming experience. ', 'Responsibilities:', "As an employee of OpenTable, you will be part of a global network that includes OpenTable and KAYAK's portfolio of meta-search brands including momondo, Cheapflights, Swoodoo, checkfelix and Mundi. Many employees are dedicated to one brand, but we all have the benefit of using each other’s strengths and insights. Together, we’re able to help people experience the world through dining and travel. ", 'You have a deep understanding of data structures and OO design. ', 'Passion for continuous learning and self development. Learning new technologies, stacks, and frameworks. ', 'We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. ', '#LI-AB1', "OpenTable, part of Booking Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ: BKNG), is the world's leading provider of online restaurant reservations, seating more than 25 million diners per month via online bookings across approximately 45,000 restaurants. ", '5+ years in software engineering. ', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills. ', 'Optional, but a major plus: ', 'Help foster a strong team culture and cultivate innovation. ', 'Collaborate with other team members, software engineers, product managers, delivery managers, the data science team, and other stakeholders across the organization. Help foster a strong team culture and cultivate innovation. Design, develop, test, deploy, maintain and improve existing  systems. We’ll be mainly working in Java and using ElasticSearch. Crafting new systems and APIs as needed Innovating on ways to search through massive data sets. ', 'Logistics: ', 'Job Type: Full time ', 'You’ll fit right in if: ', 'We hope that you will come work with us. Our interview starts with a phone conversation with one of our engineers and our team lead. They will tell you more about what we do and ask you about your background and experience. ', "5+ years in software engineering. 3+ years of Java programming experience. You are experienced in refactoring code, optimizing software, debugging, and writing tests with great code coverage Solid debugging and analytical skills in generating result oriented metrics and dashboards. You're disciplined at unit, integration, and acceptance testing. You have strong CS fundamentals. You have a deep understanding of data structures and OO design. Excellent verbal and written communication skills. ", 'We believe in a healthy work-life balance, and that teams with people from diverse backgrounds create the best end user experiences. ', 'Collaborate with other team members, software engineers, product managers, delivery managers, the data science team, and other stakeholders across the organization. ', 'Experience in building highly scalable and highly available systems. ', 'We move fast, collaborate, release frequently, and believe strongly in engineering excellence. We strike a balance in writing good code with automation testing, great code coverage, metrics, and monitoring to help maintain our quality and velocity. We break things sometimes - and that’s fine, we learn from it and become stronger as a result. ', 'Department: Engineering ', 'How you’ll work:', 'Experience  working with one or more from the following: machine learning, data science, infrastructure, mobile application and front end development. ', 'We are a close-knit team of back-end engineers, product managers, designers and delivery management. We work closely with cross functional teams from app developers to front end engineers for the web. We collaborate with the data science team to improve our search experience with machine learning. ', 'Location: LA office or remote within the US ', 'You are not expected to come into the role already knowing all the things our team uses. We enjoy pairing to share knowledge, and will help you pick up new techniques and knowledge. We love to discuss engineering excellence and apply best practices to build scalable and resilient systems. We also look forward to you teaching us new things. A computer science degree is not required to join our team. ', 'Crafting new systems and APIs as needed ', 'You are experienced in refactoring code, optimizing software, debugging, and writing tests with great code coverage ', 'You’ll fit right in if:', 'Innovating on ways to search through massive data sets. ', '\xa0 ', 'Responsibilities: ', 'How you’ll work: ', 'About OpenTable ', 'About OpenTable', 'Solid debugging and analytical skills in generating result oriented metrics and dashboards. ', 'Logistics:', 'Since its inception in 1998, OpenTable has seated more than 1.5 billion diners in over 20 countries. The Company is headquartered in San Francisco, California, and the OpenTable service is available throughout the United States, as well as in Canada, Germany, Japan, Mexico, the UK and many more locations. ', 'You’ll help us:', 'You’ll help us: ', 'Experience in building highly scalable and highly available systems. Experience  working with one or more from the following: machine learning, data science, infrastructure, mobile application and front end development. Passion for continuous learning and self development. Learning new technologies, stacks, and frameworks. ', 'Optional, but a major plus:', 'OpenTable teams are independent and come up with their own way of working. Our team uses an agile process  with  two week sprints to prioritize and drive work. How do you prefer to work? You will have lots of opportunity to positively affect the way we work together. ']
