['', 'In this line of work, Engineers and Computer Scientists develop and sustain operational programs and software tools on various aircraft and weapon systems, utilize their hardware and software skills to integrate and test avionics/weapons systems and associated tools, and develop and sustain various web-based, remotely-controlled, networks and systems for the Air Force.\xa0Work is done on the B-1, B-2, B-52, E-3, KC-10/KC-135, KC-46, MQ-9/MQ-25 and trainer aircraft.\xa0The workload includes, but is not limited to: Open Missions System architecture, Mission Planning software, Mission Computing software, Operational Flight Programs, Ground Support systems, Data Management Systems, Cruise Missile Software, and Simulators, Pilot Evaluation Simulators (PES), Threat Emitter Location Systems (TELS), Air Traffic Control systems, Navigation systems, Space Fence, tablet and mobile applications, squadron applications.\xa0Depending on the workload, time is usually spent in the office or split between the office and a relevant lab.\xa0Some areas focus more on teamwork while others have more independent tasks. Some of the skills we look for in these areas can include: Knowledge of C, C++, C#, Java, iOS/Android development, web development, cloud services/architecting/migration, Visual Studio .NET, VBA, JavaScript, BASH/BATCH scripting, Ada, Jovial, Assembly, Linux OS, familiarity with object-oriented programming, knowledge of the agile development process, electronic warfare concepts, radar and antenna theory, communication systems, MatLab, LabView, IBM Doors/Clearcase/Clearquest, PowerHawks, scripting, Devops implementation, CSS, HTML, PHP, XML,Team Foundation server, SharePoint programming, and general software troubleshooting/testing skills.', 'To receive additional information about current and future job openings with AFCS via email notification, please register at www.Afciviliancareers.com/linkedin-careers and sign up to “Get Career Updates.”', 'Come be a part of something big! Smart Minds, Cool Jobs and Awesome Rewards! Fueled by innovation, talent and ambition, the Air Force Civilian Service (AFCS) is seeking civilian professionals prepared to deploy war-winning capabilities on behalf of the United States Air Force.', 'The 76 Software Engineering Group is the S&E civilian employer at Tinker AFB in OK with a workforce of 1200 engineering professionals. We are looking for talented entry-level and experienced Computer Science, Computer Engineering, and Electrical Engineering majors interested in developing and using their skills in aircraft software maintenance to support the U.S. Air Force! Our group hosts a variety of workloads ranging from systems engineering, coding/programming, cybersecurity, information assurance, and software/hardware opportunities. Our teams consist of multiple squadrons with differing areas of technical focus such as Engine Testing, Trainers & Simulation Software, Avionics Testing Development, Mission Planning, Systems Development, Industrial Automation, and Lab Simulation/Systems Integration Labs.', '\xa0']

['', 'Who we are:', 'More about us:', 'Who you are:', 'Experience', 'You have experience designing scalable/low latency systems ', 'The opportunity to help build a company with the founding team ', 'Bonus points:', 'Comprehensive medical, dental and vision insurance options ', 'Friendly', 'What we offer: ', ' ', 'Now we’re looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our team focused on the development of our real-time bidder, one of the most exciting and important products within Chartboost. The system powering this product must deal with 100,000’s of requests per second and presents unique engineering challenges. In addition, the bidder requires use of machine learning models that are trained in batch and then used to power decision making in real-time. ', 'Flex Vacation – personal time to refresh your mind/body/soul, spend time with loved ones and celebrate life events. There is no accrual or specific limit to the amount of time an employee may use ', ' You have experience running Machine Learning systems in production  You’ve worked with ETL/big data technologies (hdfs, Hive, etc.)  You have experience leading a small team  ', 'Curious', 'Technologies. Our stack is mainly written in Python and consists of a set of interacting microservices. We use AWS heavily for our data processing requirements and to power training of our machine learning models. ', 'Technologies', 'Experience. You’ve faced some problems and either solved them or learned an important lesson. Either way, your bag of tricks has some depth and you have strong opinions about what works and what doesn’t (that you’re willing to reconsider in the face of new evidence). ', 'You’ve worked with ETL/big data technologies (hdfs, Hive, etc.) ', 'Commuter Program and 401k savings plan ', 'What we offer:', 'Who we are: ', ' You are a professional software developer, experience in mobile is a plus  You are passionate about iterating team workflows to improve productivity and mentoring junior team members to enable them to learn and thrive  You have experience designing scalable/low latency systems  You have experience using monitoring tools in production  You are comfortable with the core parts of AWS stack (ec2, s3, etc.)  You are comfortable with DevOps/CI tools (travis, jenkins, etc.)  ', 'Chartboost is the leading in-app monetization and programmatic advertising platform. We reach an audience of over 900M unique users every month across more than 300,000 mobile games and work with 90% of the top grossing iOS and Android game developers, globally. The Chartboost SDK is the highest-integrated independent mobile ad SDK and through Chartboost Exchange, Ad Network, and other services, we empower developers to build businesses, while connecting advertisers to highly engaged audiences. ', 'You have experience running Machine Learning systems in production ', 'You are a professional software developer, experience in mobile is a plus ', 'You are passionate about iterating team workflows to improve productivity and mentoring junior team members to enable them to learn and thrive ', 'Stock Options - you will have a stake in the future success of Chartboost ', 'More about us: ', 'Passionate', 'Friendly. You know that communication can make or break a project. You are excited to mentor junior engineers. You know how to give (and receive) constructive feedback. You can collaborate with product managers, UX designers, other engineers, and maybe even business folk. ', 'Passionate. You take your work seriously, whether it’s sculpting beautiful and intuitive interfaces or crafting elegant and performant code. You can balance hitting deadlines with shipping quality products and care about things like unit tests and code reviews. ', 'You are comfortable with DevOps/CI tools (travis, jenkins, etc.) ', "We are proud of the product we have built and appreciate the impact it has on other people's businesses and lives. We want to be surrounded by people who are always finding opportunities to try something new and grow. We love data and anything that helps drive intelligent decisions and always design with the user in mind. Sounds like a fit? Join us, and be part of the team that will change the future of mobile gaming! ", 'We are an equal opportunity employer — we celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees and make our hiring decisions without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.', 'Bonus points: ', 'You have experience using monitoring tools in production ', ' The opportunity to help build a company with the founding team  Stock Options - you will have a stake in the future success of Chartboost  Comprehensive medical, dental and vision insurance options  Catered lunches and fully stocked kitchens  Commuter Program and 401k savings plan  Flex Vacation – personal time to refresh your mind/body/soul, spend time with loved ones and celebrate life events. There is no accrual or specific limit to the amount of time an employee may use  ', 'You have experience leading a small team ', 'Curious. You stay on top of trends, explore emerging technologies, and treat every project as an opportunity to learn new things. You’ve starred a bunch of repos in GitHub and could rattle off ten projects that we should totally check out. ', 'Catered lunches and fully stocked kitchens ', 'You are comfortable with the core parts of AWS stack (ec2, s3, etc.) ']

['', 'Basic Qualifications', '• Experience using web application frameworks, such as Vue.js or similar framework\xa0', 'How you work is as important to us as what you know.\xa0\xa0', 'About PremiumMedia360', 'GIT', 'Skill Required', 'Vue.js/React/Angular', 'JavaScript', 'Single Page Application', '• Use a variety of software development tools, programming languages, testing/verification\xa0\xa0applications and other tools, while adhering to development best practices and quality standards\xa0', '• Translate business requirements and user stories into functional applications\xa0\xa0', 'Skills that will enhance your candidacy:', 'CSS', 'We are looking for a front-end software developer to join our awesome software development team in Grand Rapids, MI.\xa0We use cutting edge technology and work in a collaborative, team-based environment.\xa0If you like working on a small team where each person’s contribution matters and enjoy a close connection to sales, senior leadership and end-users, we might be just the company you’re looking for.\xa0', 'This is NOT a remote job.  The job is in Grand Rapids, Michigan', '• Design, build, test, and maintain reusable and reliable code\xa0', 'Responsibilities\xa0', 'Dev Express', 'OAuth', 'front-end software developer', 'REST API', '• Strong interpersonal and communication skills and the ability to interact with our team members', '• Ability to troubleshooting and analyze issues\xa0', 'HTML5', 'HTML5Test Driven DevelopementVue.js/React/AngularJavaScriptTypeScriptBootstrapGITMS SQL ServerDev Express.net CoreC#.netSingle Page ApplicationOAuth', 'Bootstrap', '.net Core', 'C#', 'MS SQL Server', '• Demonstration excellent problem-solving skills and critical-thinking skills\xa0', 'PremiumMedia360 is a eight-year-old technology company in the AdTech space.\xa0Our technology solutions synchronize data between agencies and media partners.\xa0Our products help customer accelerate and automate their internal work processes, improving accuracy, timeliness and revenue.\xa0\xa0', 'Test Driven Developement', '• Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the applications\xa0', 'HTML', 'Visual Studio', 'Front-End Software Developer - Grand Rapids, MI', 'We work in small agile teams with 2-week sprints.\xa0Our teams consist of developers, quality assurance and business analysts which give us the ability to take light requirements and work together to produce code that is well planned.', '• Able to manage time effectively', 'How you work… our team of talented software professionals have created a vibe of quiet competency and collaboration.\xa0They are focused on building innovative, customer-driven software that solves real problems in the advertising and media world.\xa0Your day will be filled with exchanging ideas, testing concepts, listening to customers and having a little fun along the way.\xa0Because we’re a small team, everyone is expected to deliver their best effort, every day.\xa0There is nowhere to hide.\xa0The team prides itself on deeply understanding customer needs and creating reliable solutions on tight timelines.\xa0It’s not frenetic; it’s focused.', 'TypeScript', '• Validates proposed applications align with the architectural design and with business needs\xa0', 'What you need to know…', '• Solid understanding of object-oriented software design and related patterns', '• 3+ years of experience as a software developer', '.net', 'HTMLCSSVisual StudioREST API']

['', 'Experience in writing understandable, testable, secure code with an eye towards maintainability.', '5+ years experience in software development in languages such as: Java, Python, PHP, Go.', ' Developing secure libraries, tools, and services to prevent classes of risk and vulnerabilities. Assessing existing codebases for widespread, systemic or structural security issues and partnering with engineering teams to address them. Architectural review of important technical specifications and design proposals.  Contributing feedback to engineers during all phases of the development lifecycle. Communicating risks to engineering staff through training and technical demonstration of vulnerabilities and secure design patterns. Seeking out opportunities to automate processes when appropriate. Partnering with Product Security leads and other product engineering technical leaders to identify intrinsic product weaknesses, build component-specific security roadmaps to address them, and assist with the execution of those roadmaps. Mentoring Product Security engineers to be more effective, impactful, and reach their goals.  ', 'Seeking out opportunities to automate processes when appropriate.', 'What You Should Have', 'Knowledge of common security flaws and resolution as published by OWASP, SANS, etc.', 'Architectural review of important technical specifications and design proposals. ', 'What You Will Be Doing', 'Knowledge of internet security issues in software design and code.', 'Mentoring Product Security engineers to be more effective, impactful, and reach their goals. ', 'Partnering with Product Security leads and other product engineering technical leaders to identify intrinsic product weaknesses, build component-specific security roadmaps to address them, and assist with the execution of those roadmaps.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related field, or equivalent training, fellowship, or work experience.', 'Background in software engineering and common development practices in a collaborative and dynamic environment.', 'Several years of professional experience ensuring privacy and security of web applications is a plus.', 'Developing secure libraries, tools, and services to prevent classes of risk and vulnerabilities.', ' Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related field, or equivalent training, fellowship, or work experience. 5+ years experience in software development in languages such as: Java, Python, PHP, Go. Deep understanding of web application architecture and design principles. Knowledge of internet security issues in software design and code. Experience in writing understandable, testable, secure code with an eye towards maintainability. Several years of professional experience ensuring privacy and security of web applications is a plus. Background in software engineering and common development practices in a collaborative and dynamic environment. Knowledge of common security flaws and resolution as published by OWASP, SANS, etc. Experience with Amazon AWS services and familiarity with Slack products is a plus. ', 'Experience with Amazon AWS services and familiarity with Slack products is a plus.', 'Communicating risks to engineering staff through training and technical demonstration of vulnerabilities and secure design patterns.', 'Contributing feedback to engineers during all phases of the development lifecycle.', 'Deep understanding of web application architecture and design principles.', 'Assessing existing codebases for widespread, systemic or structural security issues and partnering with engineering teams to address them.']

job_title: Principal Dev Ops Engineer - Remote Position
job_text: ['', 'Troubleshoot connectivity challenges within the solution.', 'Attend and participate in team meetings to bring DevOps requirements and considerations into the design of solutions.', 'As a Principal DevOps Engineer for the Cloud Architecture and Platform organization, you will collaborate with architecture, product management, and security teams to design and deliver the best solutions with efficient use of resources and technologies.\xa0', 'How you will do it', 'Johnson Controls Cloud Architecture and Platform organization is looking for a Principal DevOps Engineer with a deep background in computer science, service-oriented architecture, and delivering consumer-facing offerings, software, and features.\xa0 As a Principal DevOps Engineer for the Cloud Architecture and Platform organization, you will collaborate with architecture, product management, and security teams to design and deliver the best solutions with efficient use of resources and technologies.\xa0 You will be a highly impactful contributor in the development across the cloud platform architecture and solution. ', 'Help JCI customers solution and understand the operational considerations, training, and handoffs.', 'Clearly communicate issues and escalate to internal members or create Azure Service/Help ticket.', 'Identify & triage issues.', 'Create business-facing demonstrations of your development activities and participate in functional and technical reviews.', 'Work with other software developers to embed protocols and libraries in JCI products and with our partner’s products.', 'Help integrate solution level smoke tests/validation state.', 'Plan, Develop, Test, and Document software for connecting devices and other software products to the JCI Cloud Architecture and Platform using our JCI agile process and practices. Create business-facing demonstrations of your development activities and participate in functional and technical reviews. Provide recommendations, gain buy-in and champion development to establish a clear position on platform architecture, features, and capabilities. Work with other software developers to embed protocols and libraries in JCI products and with our partner’s products. Work with Architecture and Product Management to define product features, and with our organization to communicate features to our sales channels, support organizations, and our customers. Create deployment scripts for Azure infrastructure using Chef & ARM Templates. Troubleshoot connectivity challenges within the solution. Identify & triage issues. Clearly communicate issues and escalate to internal members or create Azure Service/Help ticket. Lead & act as the point of contact to help triage customer environment issues from JCI folks into the JCI SRE/DevOps Team. Help develop utility and reports that will clearly tell what version of code is in our distributed environments as well as on onprem deployments of code. Assist in Security Assessments for 3rd party vulnerability Scanning/Container Vulnerability Scans/Static/Dynamic code analysis execution and reporting. Attend and participate in team meetings to bring DevOps requirements and considerations into the design of solutions. Help JCI customers solution and understand the operational considerations, training, and handoffs. Help integrate solution level smoke tests/validation state.', 'Johnson Controls Cloud Architecture and Platform organization is looking for a Principal DevOps Engineer with a deep background in computer science, service-oriented architecture, and delivering consumer-facing offerings, software, and features.\xa0', 'Provide recommendations, gain buy-in and champion development to establish a clear position on platform architecture, features, and capabilities.', 'What you will do', 'Help develop utility and reports that will clearly tell what version of code is in our distributed environments as well as on onprem deployments of code.', 'Principal DevOps Engineer', 'Work with Architecture and Product Management to define product features, and with our organization to communicate features to our sales channels, support organizations, and our customers.', 'Assist in Security Assessments for 3rd party vulnerability Scanning/Container Vulnerability Scans/Static/Dynamic code analysis execution and reporting.', 'Plan, Develop, Test, and Document software for connecting devices and other software products to the JCI Cloud Architecture and Platform using our JCI agile process and practices.', 'You will be a highly impactful contributor in the development across the cloud platform architecture and solution.', 'Create deployment scripts for Azure infrastructure using Chef & ARM Templates.', 'Lead & act as the point of contact to help triage customer environment issues from JCI folks into the JCI SRE/DevOps Team.']

['', 'Our culture of winning behaviors exemplifies our dedication to clients every single day. Delivering investment results enables us to distribute over 40% of our dividends—or more than $1.5 billion since 2000—to the Stowers Institute for Medical Research, a 550-person, non-profit biomedical research organization with a controlling interest in American Century Investments. Our dividend payments provide ongoing financial support for the Institute’s work of uncovering the causes, treatments and prevention of life-threatening diseases, like cancer.', 'Are you looking for an Emerging Technology Engineer role that encourages you to ask the Why and How, not just deliver the work? Are you interested in an opportunity where you are responsible for taking early stage investigations from an idea to full-blow projects?', 'The drive to learn and master new technologies and techniques.', 'Self-motivated, collaborative, and an excellent communicator who can explain your work in simple terms.', 'Chance to collaborate with business partners with honed skills in data science, big data, software engineer, web development and more.', 'We are committed to providing institutional-quality, actively managed solutions with a performance-centered mindset. Our expertise spans global growth equity, global value equity, disciplined equity, multi-asset strategies, global fixed income, alternatives and ETFs.', 'Intrapreneurship environment, working with technically proficient, forward-thinking and passionate team members.Opportunity to setup technical direction for investigations/projects working with the early stage leadership team.Chance to collaborate with business partners with honed skills in data science, big data, software engineer, web development and more.', 'We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request accommodation.', 'American Century Investments believes all individuals are entitled to equal employment opportunity and advancement opportunities without regard to race, religious creed, color, sex, national origin, ancestry, physical disability, mental disability, medical condition, genetic information, marital status, gender, gender identity, gender expression, age for individuals forty years of age and older, military and veteran status, sexual orientation, and any other basis protected by applicable federal, state and local laws. ACI does not discriminate or adopt any policy that discriminates against an individual or any group of individuals on any of these bases.', 'Startup or early stage product development experience.', 'Emerging Technology Engineer', 'Privately controlled and independent, we focus solely on investment management. This empowers us to align our decisions with client expectations and concentrate on their long-term money management needs.', 'What you will bring:', 'Hands-on experience with AWS and Python. Machine Learning and Data Science experience are a plus.', 'Opportunity to setup technical direction for investigations/projects working with the early stage leadership team.', 'What we will provide:', "Welcome to American Century's Innovation Lab!", 'Passion for financial data and problem solving, understanding that financial data comes in different formats and sizes.Knowledge and understanding of how to balance between theory and practice.The drive to learn and master new technologies and techniques.Self-motivated, collaborative, and an excellent communicator who can explain your work in simple terms.Hands-on experience with AWS and Python. Machine Learning and Data Science experience are a plus.Experience building robust data pipelines.Startup or early stage product development experience.', 'American Century Investment Services, Inc., Distributor.\xa0', 'American Century Investments® is a leading global asset manager with over 60 years of experience helping investors achieve their financial goals. Serving a broad client base including financial advisors, institutions and individual investors, we offer a wide range of investment strategies across a variety of investment disciplines.', 'Headquartered in Kansas City, MO, we also have offices located in New York; London; Hong Kong; Sydney; El Segundo, CA (Los Angeles area); and Mountain View, CA (Silicon Valley).', 'Passion for financial data and problem solving, understanding that financial data comes in different formats and sizes.', "If you have the kind of vision capable of seeing ahead and want a role where you can make a real impact, we have the opportunity you've been waiting for. We are looking for a self-starter, with a track record of effectively operating in a slightly ambiguous work environment to join our Innovation Lab.", 'As a member of our Innovation Lab you will be passionate about embracing new ideas and innovating in ways that are relevant to our customers, inspiring to our partners and meaningful to our business. We are a team of doers, engineers, designers and scientists with deep technical experience, looking to bring the next bold ideas to life. Our Innovation Lab has built a space for experimentation, ground-breaking ideas and casual-dress. ', 'Our Firm', 'Intrapreneurship environment, working with technically proficient, forward-thinking and passionate team members.', 'Knowledge and understanding of how to balance between theory and practice.', 'Experience building robust data pipelines.', 'For more information, please visit americancentury.com.']

', ' 5+ years experience in software development of a related field Experience working on backend systems at scale, using technologies like gRPC, REST, Python, Golang, AWS, Kubernetes, Helm, docker-compose, etc. Experience in operating, maintaining, and troubleshooting software running in the cloud. company: San Manuel Band of Mission Indians
job_text: ['', ' R0004593', 'Essential Duties & Responsibilities', ' Reviews and delegates work to the development team, provides technical advice to stakeholders, and provides the software development perspective on project requirements.', ' Oversees code check-ins by the rest of the development team to ensure that a high-level of quality is maintained.', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science with a minimum of seven (7) years’ work experience as a Software Engineer/Developer required.Must be familiar with application, web, and database development, specifically .Net Framework, .Net Core, WPF, SharePoint, MS MVC, jQuery, LINQ, LINQ to SQL, Web Services, Entity Framework, Mulesoft Anypoint, and Unit Testing.Must be familiar with source control systems, preferably Team Foundation Server, Git. Must be familiar with Visual Studio, MS Office Applications.Experience with systems engineering and integration (MS Server, IIS).Equivalent combination of education and progressive, relevant and direct experience may be considered in lieu of educational requirement.Preferred Languages: C#, C++, SQL (Specifically Microsoft T-SQL), JavaScript, CSS 3.0, HTML5.Must be familiar with Integration patterns and how disparate applications can be connected by developing interfaces.', 'Certificates/Licenses/Registrations', 'Must be familiar with Integration patterns and how disparate applications can be connected by developing interfaces.', 'Experience with systems engineering and integration (MS Server, IIS).', 'Preferred Languages: C#, C++, SQL (Specifically Microsoft T-SQL), JavaScript, CSS 3.0, HTML5.', ' Identify, recommend, and prioritize new software features and applications in conjunction with project managers and stakeholders.', ' Participate in Agile functions including Daily Scrums, Backlog Grooming, Sprint Planning and Sprint Retrospective.', ' Perform other duties as assigned to support the efficient operation of the department.', 'Must be familiar with application, web, and database development, specifically .Net Framework, .Net Core, WPF, SharePoint, MS MVC, jQuery, LINQ, LINQ to SQL, Web Services, Entity Framework, Mulesoft Anypoint, and Unit Testing.', 'Must be familiar with Visual Studio, MS Office Applications.', 'Education/Experience/Qualifications', ' Design, develop, code, install, test, debug, document programs and applications using appropriate editors, and according to specifications.', ' Ensures the development team is continuously improving their skills and provides their knowledge and assistance to the team when needed.', 'Must be familiar with source control systems, preferably Team Foundation Server, Git. ', 'At the discretion of the San Manuel Tribal Gaming Commission you may be required to obtain and maintain a gaming license.', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science with a minimum of seven (7) years’ work experience as a Software Engineer/Developer required.', 'Equivalent combination of education and progressive, relevant and direct experience may be considered in lieu of educational requirement.', ' Plan phases of the software development life cycle (SDLC) for a variety of projects.']

['', 'Basic Qualifications', ' Proficient in a broad range of software design approaches and common UX patterns. Experience with view layout and rendering technologies (e.g., responsiveness, progressive enhancement, browser/device support).', ' Experience in developing front-end software, with deep experience in one or more relevant front-end frameworks (React, Angular, Thyme Leaf, JQuery etc.), UI Test Automation frameworks, and MVC frameworks.', ' Meets/exceeds Amazon’s leadership principles requirements for this role', ' 2+ years of professional front end development around the user experience, and experience with responsive web design.', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or equivalent experience.', ' Create and manage application stacks across several domains including telemetry, analytics, planning, and performance management.', ' Design and deliver internet scalable, flexible, and integrated set of solutions for our selling team. This includes both first-party and third-party solutions.', ' Develop tools to accelerate contracting, speed planning cycles and operations, correlate metrics and set meaningful targets.', 'In Your First Few Months With WWRO You’ll', ' Meets/exceeds Amazon’s functional/technical depth and complexity for this role', ' Experience in developing rich applications with HTML, CSS, JS, Node', ' Proficient in a broad range of software design approaches and common UX patterns. Knows when (and when not) to use front-end software design patterns (e.g., asynchronicity, data binding, modules, MVC, objects, promises)', ' Experience with view layout and rendering technologies (e.g., responsiveness, progressive enhancement, browser/device support).', 'Company', ' Hands-on expertise in many disparate technologies, typically ranging from front-end user interfaces such as React, HTML5, JavaScript, GraphQL through to mobile app development (Android, iOS, etc.)', ' Design and deliver internet scalable, flexible, and integrated set of solutions for our selling team. This includes both first-party and third-party solutions. Create and manage application stacks across several domains including telemetry, analytics, planning, and performance management. Develop tools to accelerate contracting, speed planning cycles and operations, correlate metrics and set meaningful targets.', 'Description']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer, Machine Learning Platform
job_text: ['', 'The team does this by providing a platform which handles the common needs of the product teams including production system integration, model training, model availability, health and monitoring infrastructure for model serving, and a streamlined model release process.', 'At Sift we enhance trust and safety in the digital world with our AI driven technology platform. Our products deliver payment protection, ensure content integrity, and protect account defense for businesses around the world. The Machine Learning Platform team exists to enable product teams to construct and operate their production machine learning services as effectively as possible.', 'Bonus points:', 'Motivate, listen and empathize, and help engineers and data scientists to excel.', 'As a Senior Engineer in the Machine Learning Platform team you will build tools and processes to manage, improve, and rapidly scale our platform. Specifically, you will', 'About the team:', 'Ensure that our\xa0systems can continue to scale rapidly while addressing rapidly evolving product team needs.', 'Experience building highly available low-latency systems using Java, Scala, C++ or other object-oriented languages.', 'Design and build tools and processes to make the release of new machine learning models fast, easy, safe, and minimally disruptive.Lead architecture discussions to meet the requirement to serve hundreds of machine learning models at thousands of queries per second.Ensure that our\xa0systems can continue to scale rapidly while addressing rapidly evolving product team needs.Implement scalable, low-latency, high-throughput, fault-tolerant, extensible, and easily maintainable data processing pipelines for both batch and real-time systems.Motivate, listen and empathize, and help engineers and data scientists to excel.', 'Practical knowledge of how to build end-to-end ML workflows.', 'Interested in learning more about our engineering teams? Check out our posts:\xa0engineering.sift.com/articles', 'What would make you a strong fit:', '5+ years of professional software development experience or a degree in CS (or a related field) with 3+ years of experience.', 'Self-starter, with a quick learning curve.', 'Design and build tools and processes to make the release of new machine learning models fast, easy, safe, and minimally disruptive.', 'What you’ll do:', 'Strong debugging, testing, tuning, and problem-solving skills.', 'Experience working with large datasets and best in class data processing technologies for both stream and batch processing, such as Apache Spark, Apache Beam, MapReduce.', 'Familiarity with practical challenges in ML systems such as feature extraction and definition, data validation, training, monitoring, and management of features and models.Practical knowledge of how to build end-to-end ML workflows.Experience with building an ML feature store for batch and real-time aggregation/serving.Knowledge of GCP or AWS cloud stack for web services and big data processing.Interested in learning more about our engineering teams? Check out our posts:\xa0engineering.sift.com/articles', 'Implement scalable, low-latency, high-throughput, fault-tolerant, extensible, and easily maintainable data processing pipelines for both batch and real-time systems.', 'Strong communication & collaboration skills, and a belief that team output is more important than individual output.', 'Knowledge of GCP or AWS cloud stack for web services and big data processing.', 'Experience with building an ML feature store for batch and real-time aggregation/serving.', 'Familiarity with practical challenges in ML systems such as feature extraction and definition, data validation, training, monitoring, and management of features and models.', '5+ years of professional software development experience or a degree in CS (or a related field) with 3+ years of experience.Experience building highly available low-latency systems using Java, Scala, C++ or other object-oriented languages.Experience working with large datasets and best in class data processing technologies for both stream and batch processing, such as Apache Spark, Apache Beam, MapReduce.Strong debugging, testing, tuning, and problem-solving skills.Strong communication & collaboration skills, and a belief that team output is more important than individual output.Self-starter, with a quick learning curve.', 'Lead architecture discussions to meet the requirement to serve hundreds of machine learning models at thousands of queries per second.']

job_title: Software Quality Engineer (South San Francisco, CA)
job_text: ['', 'Working knowledge of the application of regulatory requirements for wellness, low-risk and high-risk software applications using a scalable approach to the SDLC practices and the QMS.', ' BA/BS degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Informatics, Biomedical, related technical field or equivalent practical experience. Minimum 2-5 years of experience in software design assurance in the FDA QSR/ISO 13485 medical device industry. Experience with the application of IEC 62304 (Medical Device Software Lifecycle Processes), AAMI TIR45, ISO 14971 (Risk management) and IEC 62366 Usability Engineering. Experience in project management, training, and working collaboratively with software development teams. ', 'Foster organizational compliance to the quality system including ongoing training and education on software QMS and SDLC framework. Provide CAPA, complaints, audit and overall QMS support in regards to software.', 'Minimum 2-5 years of experience in software design assurance in the FDA QSR/ISO 13485 medical device industry.', 'Qualifications', 'Experience in project management, training, and working collaboratively with software development teams.', 'Guide software development teams in design controls and risk management activities.', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Experience working with novel technologies in a lean, fast-paced and highly innovative environment.', 'BA/BS degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Informatics, Biomedical, related technical field or equivalent practical experience.', ' Participate in ongoing implementation of Software Quality Management System (QMS) in conformance with US FDA Quality System Regulations and ISO 13485 Design Controls, as well as SDLC processes and tools initiatives, through the integration of internal and external/medical device industry best practices. Support software development teams in the creation of Design History Files (DHFs) including software development plans, software verification and validation plans, software requirements specifications, software architecture and design documents, design and code reviews, software Risk Management File (RMF), test protocols and reports, traceability matrices. Support integration of ISO 14971 risk management and IEC 62366 usability engineering activities with SDLC processes. Guide software development teams in design controls and risk management activities. Foster organizational compliance to the quality system including ongoing training and education on software QMS and SDLC framework. Provide CAPA, complaints, audit and overall QMS support in regards to software. ', 'Support integration of ISO 14971 risk management and IEC 62366 usability engineering activities with SDLC processes.', 'Responsibilities', 'Participate in ongoing implementation of Software Quality Management System (QMS) in conformance with US FDA Quality System Regulations and ISO 13485 Design Controls, as well as SDLC processes and tools initiatives, through the integration of internal and external/medical device industry best practices.', ' Experience with digital health, Health IT or mobile medical applications. Experience working with novel technologies in a lean, fast-paced and highly innovative environment. Working knowledge of the application of regulatory requirements for wellness, low-risk and high-risk software applications using a scalable approach to the SDLC practices and the QMS. Demonstrated ability to implement and improve Software QMS processes using SDLC best practices, tools and agile/scrum/iterative methodology. Excellent organizational, interpersonal and verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to deliver quality outputs under minimal supervision.', 'Minimum qualifications: ', 'Experience with digital health, Health IT or mobile medical applications.', 'Support software development teams in the creation of Design History Files (DHFs) including software development plans, software verification and validation plans, software requirements specifications, software architecture and design documents, design and code reviews, software Risk Management File (RMF), test protocols and reports, traceability matrices.', 'Experience with the application of IEC 62304 (Medical Device Software Lifecycle Processes), AAMI TIR45, ISO 14971 (Risk management) and IEC 62366 Usability Engineering.', 'Excellent organizational, interpersonal and verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to deliver quality outputs under minimal supervision.', 'Description', 'Demonstrated ability to implement and improve Software QMS processes using SDLC best practices, tools and agile/scrum/iterative methodology.']

We try to keep our processes sensible, lightweight, and asynchronous to enable us to have a remote-first work environment. ['Senior Machine Learning Engineer – NLP ExpertNew York City - NY$150,0000 - 180,000 base + Great Benefit Package\xa0This is an opportunity for a well-rounded Data Scientist to cut their teeth in a data-first, fast paced environment where they are designing unique infrastructure to change B2B data. Working with some the leaders in the industry, you will be responsible for putting your Natural Language Processing, Machine Learning models into production. If you are an NLP, Machine Learning expert, this role could be a great fit.THE COMPANYAs a Senior Machine Learning Engineer, with and NLP focus, you’ll find yourself using machine learning techniques in this B2B powerhouse and the power of data to innovate the way we extract information form the internet.THE ROLE\xa0You will be asked to be forward thinking in your approach to applying analytical techniques to advancing the departments capacity. You will work mostly independently and use your strong analytic skills to finish projects.· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Develop different types of machine learning models from NLP to anomaly detection· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Develop production level code in Python and deliver high quality solutions· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Work cross functionally with the data engineering and research analyst teams· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Present your findings to business leaders and stakeholders within the companyYOUR SKILLS AND EXPERIENCEYou will need to be a proven problem solver, critical thinker, and have an advanced technical background to join this growing, yet experienced team. Commercial experience with hands on experience putting Machine Learning projects into production is a must,· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Proven commercial experience with a strong understanding of Deep Learning frameworks· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Prior exposure to putting Machine Learning and Deep Learning models into production· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Prior work presenting key findings to stakeholders· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Previous work in expanding the use of Machine Learning and Deep Learning· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Ph.D. preferred in Computer Science, Linguistics, Engineering, Stats, or a related field· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Technically sound in NLP, TensorFlow, NLTK, ELMo, GloVe, spaCy, WordNetTHE BENEFITSA base salary of $150,000 - $180,000 + amazing benefitsHOW TO APPLYPlease register your interest by sending your résumé to Sam Agre via the Apply link on this page.']

Founded in 1919, today AIG member companies provide a wide range of property casualty insurance, life insurance, retirement products, and other financial services to customers in more than 80 countries and jurisdictions. These diverse offerings include products and services that help businesses and individuals protect their assets, manage risks and provide for retirement security. We offer 24 PTO days to start. YES, 24! 9 paid holidays per calendar year.', 'This is a work from home position until further notice. Opportunity for the right candidate to work fully remote and live anywhere is a possibility for the right candidate.  Who we are:  American International Group, Inc. (AIG) is a leading global insurance organization. Building on 100 years of experience, today AIG member companies provide a wide range of property casualty insurance, life insurance, retirement solutions, and other financial services to customers in more than 80 countries and jurisdictions. These diverse offerings include products and services that help businesses and individuals protect their assets, manage risks and provide for retirement security.  We are seeking a creative and resourceful full-stack developer to take on multiple challenges. From creating and deploying applications or services to partnering with our testers to automate aspects of our manual, time-consuming, tests. Our team does extensive work with content and forms, and we are expecting you to help in streamlining existing practices and finding opportunities to adopt or improve content storage method, file structures and data abstraction. In addition, exposure or experience in DevOps shops will help us in adopting best practices to increase efficiency and automation of certain repetitive content propagation and deployment tasks.  Get to know the business:  Flex your financial expertise and provide peace of mind to people seeking a financially sound retirement. Securing the financial futures of our clients is what motivates us and is at the heart of what we do. We work with our clients to tailor a retirement plan that increases their assets and provides them with a protected income stream to last their lifetime. Our U.S. Individual Retirement business offers innovative annuity products that help clients build assets through tax-deferred growth opportunities, providing a guaranteed income for life while shielding it from market volatility.  Responsibilities: ', 'Ability to extend applications to support automated testing', 'We care about your professional development. job_title: Staff Software Engineer, Product and Customer Solutions
job_text: ['', 'Understand customers’ security infrastructure designs and implementations; join internal discussions to ensure best protection solution for customers’ scenarios.', 'A10 Networks is an equal opportunity employer and a VEVRAA federal subcontractor. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. A10 also complies with all applicable state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment.', 'Research and provide best mitigation practices using company product for various deployment scenarios.', 'Network Engineer', 'Participate in planning, design, implementation, test, and maintenance of critical or prospective mitigation solutions.', 'Strong coding background in Network Related Appliance or System.', 'Knowledge of BGP routing protocols and associated usage or automation.', 'Experience and working knowledge with any of the following: NGFW, Intrusion Detection and Prevention (IDP), Deep Packet Inspection (DPI), URL, Filtering, malware protection systems, and Web application firewall.', 'Understand DDoS well and be an expert on all protection techniques and offerings.', 'BS plus 5+ years or MS plus 3+ years in Computer Science/Engineering or equivalent.', 'Strong DDoS mitigation exposure', 'Validate current solutions and implementations against new threats (or new types of attack).', 'Strong networking experience especially in L4/L7 protocols, and hands-on development experience in Linux.', 'Optimize product deployment and implementation efforts for customers.', 'Advanced knowledge in the following languages: C, C++, Python', 'Responsibilities', 'Participate in planning, design, implementation, test, and maintenance of critical or prospective mitigation solutions.Interface with account team on recommended strategies.Work with key customers on the following:Optimize product deployment and implementation efforts for customers.Validate current solutions and implementations against new threats (or new types of attack).Write production code that will improve our internal tooling and our external support channelsBe synchronized with customers’ architecture design details on API compatibility and automation to ensure smooth deployment of new products and product releases.Understand customers’ security infrastructure designs and implementations; join internal discussions to ensure best protection solution for customers’ scenarios.', 'Strong DDoS mitigation exposureExperience and working knowledge with any of the following: NGFW, Intrusion Detection and Prevention (IDP), Deep Packet Inspection (DPI), URL, Filtering, malware protection systems, and Web application firewall.Experience with Automation Techniques and Scripting Languages', '       practices.', 'Work with key customers on the following:', 'Understand DDoS well and be an expert on all protection techniques and offerings.Stay on top of latest attacks, vulnerabilities, and trends.Research and provide best mitigation practices using company product for various deployment scenarios.Develop feature enhancements, new mitigation techniques, and fixes based on of field / attack', 'Interface with account team on recommended strategies.', 'Write production code that will improve our internal tooling and our external support channels', 'Be synchronized with customers’ architecture design details on API compatibility and automation to ensure smooth deployment of new products and product releases.', 'Stay on top of latest attacks, vulnerabilities, and trends.', 'A10 Networks (NYSE: ATEN), a leading provider of intelligent and automated cybersecurity solutions, delivers Reliable Security Always™, with a range of high-performance application networking solutions that help organizations ensure that their applications and networks remain highly available, accelerated and secure. The company routinely wins innovation awards, underscoring it product and market leadership. Founded in 2004, A10 Networks is based in San Jose, Calif., and serves its valued customers globally with offices worldwide.', 'Desirable Skills', 'Are you up for the challenge? Join us and make your impact on the future as our\xa0Network Engineer, located in our office in Cary, NC.\xa0', 'Experience with Automation Techniques and Scripting Languages', 'Required Experience', 'BS plus 5+ years or MS plus 3+ years in Computer Science/Engineering or equivalent.Strong coding background in Network Related Appliance or System.Advanced knowledge in the following languages: C, C++, PythonStrong networking experience especially in L4/L7 protocols, and hands-on development experience in Linux.Knowledge of BGP routing protocols and associated usage or automation.', 'Develop feature enhancements, new mitigation techniques, and fixes based on of field / attack']

['', 'As a Data Scientist, you will work directly with clients, managers and technical staff to understand business needs, develop technical plans, and deliver data-driven analytical solutions that solve client problems. You will primarily create and deploy predictive models from a wide variety of data sources and types using the latest mathematical and statistical methods.\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Preferred Qualifications:\xa0', '·\xa05+ years of experience in a data science role or graduate degree in related field\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0TS/SCI in the past 2 years\xa0', '·\xa0Security+ certified\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0Proficiency with unsupervised, semi-supervised, and supervised learning algorithms and technologies.\xa0', 'Work Location is Fort Meade, MD\xa0', 'About Elder Research, Inc.\xa0\xa0', 'Elder Research Inc. is a recognized leader in predictive analytics and data mining. We pride ourselves in our ability to find creative, cutting edge solutions to real-world problems. We are looking for innovative and inquisitive self-starters who enjoy translating complex models into actionable solutions that deliver real value for our clients. We have multiple openings in the Baltimore-Washington Metropolitan area for cleared analytics and data science professionals at varying skill levels to support our Defense & Intelligence business\xa0', '·\xa0Active TS in the past 2 years\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0Hands on experience using large data sets to solve problems\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0Domain expertise: counterintelligence, insider threat, intelligence data sources (HUMINT, SIGINT, IMINT, and OSINT)\xa0', 'Basic Qualifications:\xa0', '·\xa0Proficiency with scripting languages, Python and R\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0Experience using Data Science libraries in Python or R: tidyverse, NumPy, SciPy, Pandas\xa0\xa0', 'Achieving success on defense, intelligence and security projects requires a data science team with broad experience, critical thinking, a proven ability to solve complex problems, and the ability to effectively communicate results. Our scientists conduct analysis in a collaborative environment that frequently brings together the expertise of decision-makers, analysts, agents, investigators, and even behavioral scientists. Our team relies on well-trained technical personnel who have experience with tools, algorithms, best practices, and custom software development to navigate the frontier of unsolved problems we typically encounter. Our team enjoys great variety in the type of work they do and exposure to a wide range of analytic techniques and tools.\xa0\xa0', 'Home office is Linthicum, MD', 'Data Scientist', '·\xa0Capable of communicating complex models and concepts in non-technical language\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0Familiarity with relational databases, Oracle, SQL, and ETL tools\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0Strong English-speaking and writing skills\xa0\xa0', 'Elder Research, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, or protected veteran status and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disability.\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0Familiarity with commercial and open source data science software: IBM SPSS Modeler, SAS, KNIME, RapidMiner, Statistica\xa0\xa0', 'Basic Qualifications:\xa0\xa0', 'Elder Research is a fast growing consulting firm specializing in predictive analytics. Elder Research has been in the data mining business over 20 years providing analytic solutions to hundreds of companies and organizations across numerous industries. At Elder Research, you’ll be part of a fun, friendly community. In keeping with our entrepreneurial spirit, we want candidates that are self-motivated with an innate curiosity and strong team work ethic. We work hard to provide the best value to our clients and allow each person to contribute their ideas and put their skills to use immediately.\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0Familiarity with software development (Scala, C#, Java, JavaScript, etc.)\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0BA/BS degree in Math, Statistics, Engineering, Computer Science, or related field\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0Experience working with some of the following technologies: AWS/C2S, Solr, NoSQL databases (MongoDB, DynamoDB, Redis, HBase, Cassandra, Accumulo, Neo4j, etc.), Caffe/TensorFlow/Keras/etc, Hadoop, Spark, Pig\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0Knowledge and experience in data wrangling, advanced statistical data analysis and modeling\xa0\xa0', 'Elder Research, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, or protected veteran status and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disability.', '·\xa0Experience building models and tools to help analysts understand data and answer intelligence questions\xa0\xa0', '\xa0\xa0']

['', 'Prices', 'Orders', 'We are a full-stack team, delivering features through Mobile, Web, and API across nearly all of Square’s products.', 'We are reinventing Square’s models for pricing and taxes, building flexible primitives to manage complex needs.', 'Guice, Guava, Protocol Buffers, gRPC, jOOQ, Rails', 'We design high-volume, low-latency, distributed transaction processing systems, making thoughtful tradeoffs between consistency and availability when both are not possible.', 'Healthcare coverageRetirement PlansEmployee Stock Purchase ProgramWellness perksPaid parental leaveFlexible time offLearning and Development resources', 'Learning and Development resources', 'Payments', 'Our work spans client and server environments and we use Java, Go, Javascript and Ember.JS.', 'Employee Stock Purchase Program', 'We are a team that ties together many software components across Square, including Payments, Prices and Catalog, allowing developers to quickly combine all components to develop new features on top of Square’s platform.', 'The Prices team manages tools that help Square merchants set prices, manage taxes, and provide discounts to their customers.We are a full-stack team, delivering features through Mobile, Web, and API across nearly all of Square’s products.We are reinventing Square’s models for pricing and taxes, building flexible primitives to manage complex needs.We also own Square’s subscription platform, managing all subscriptions, usage, and billing.We use Java / Kotlin on Android, Objective-C / Swift on iOS, Javascript and Ember on the web, and Java and Ruby on the server. ', 'Paid parental leave', 'We use Java / Kotlin on Android, Objective-C / Swift on iOS, Javascript and Ember on the web, and Java and Ruby on the server. ', "The Payment Acceptance team owns the core of Square’s online payments stack and operates it at a massive scale. We provide APIs for first and third parties to access our platform.We move money between customers, credit card processors, and banks quickly, reliably, and securely – and our ambition is to make this easy.We solve several technical challenges: Security and privacy, monitoring, re-architecting for the future, scalability, supporting payment methods such as cryptocurrency, 3DS, ACH, and support Square's expansion to support new payment types in international markets.We are a backend service team, and use Java on Square's Linux servers and cloud platforms along with technologies like Guice, Guava, Protocol Buffers, jOOQ, MySQL, Kafka, AWS and GCP.", 'We are a team that ties together many software components across Square, including Payments, Prices and Catalog, allowing developers to quickly combine all components to develop new features on top of Square’s platform.Our Order Platform APIs are designed for use by first (internal) and third-party (external) developers.We design high-volume, low-latency, distributed transaction processing systems, making thoughtful tradeoffs between consistency and availability when both are not possible.Our work spans client and server environments and we use Java, Go, Javascript and Ember.JS.', 'Flexible time off', 'BS Degree in Computer Science or equivalent. Minimum 4 years of industry experienceNatural curiosity and a desire to explore solutions in a small and focused teamExperience pursuing side projects, research, or open source projects', 'You Have', 'We move money between customers, credit card processors, and banks quickly, reliably, and securely – and our ambition is to make this easy.', 'Experience pursuing side projects, research, or open source projects', 'Perks', 'Java, Ruby, Go', 'Technologies We Use', 'Java, Ruby, GoiOS, Android, webGuice, Guava, Protocol Buffers, gRPC, jOOQ, RailsMySQL, Redis, Kafka, Vertica', 'Job Description', 'We also own Square’s subscription platform, managing all subscriptions, usage, and billing.', 'iOS, Android, web', "We solve several technical challenges: Security and privacy, monitoring, re-architecting for the future, scalability, supporting payment methods such as cryptocurrency, 3DS, ACH, and support Square's expansion to support new payment types in international markets.", 'Retirement Plans', 'Wellness perks', "We are a backend service team, and use Java on Square's Linux servers and cloud platforms along with technologies like Guice, Guava, Protocol Buffers, jOOQ, MySQL, Kafka, AWS and GCP.", 'BS Degree in Computer Science or equivalent. Minimum 4 years of industry experience', 'Healthcare coverage', 'Our Order Platform APIs are designed for use by first (internal) and third-party (external) developers.', 'Natural curiosity and a desire to explore solutions in a small and focused team', 'The Payment Acceptance team owns the core of Square’s online payments stack and operates it at a massive scale. ', 'Company Description', 'We provide APIs for first and third parties to access our platform.', 'The Prices team manages tools that help Square merchants set prices, manage taxes, and provide discounts to their customers.', 'MySQL, Redis, Kafka, Vertica']

['', 'Take technical responsibility for a family of systems - build new services and functionality, manage technical debt, be on the lookout for opportunities for platform improvement, and work with system engineers to increase the scale our production systems will operate at while performing at their peak Work with product, tech, and business leaders to determine the roadmap and deliverables for the enterprise order taking suite of services. Actively contribute to the adoption of strong software architecture, software development lifecycle best practices, and new technologies. Be a leader within your team and the organization. ', 'Experience developing thoroughly tested code ', 'Grubhub is an equal opportunity employer. We evaluate qualified applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status, and other legally protected characteristics. The EEO is the Law poster is available here: DOL Poster. If you are applying for a job in the U.S. and need a reasonable accommodation for any part of the employment process, please send an e-mail to TalentAcquisition@grubhub.com and let us know the nature of your request and contact information. Please note that only those inquiries concerning a request for reasonable accommodation will be responded to from this e-mail address. \xa0 ', 'Experience mentoring/coaching engineers and coordinating with developers from other teams or 3rd party vendors. ', 'Familiarity with eventually consistent databases (Cassandra/MongoDB/CouchDB) ', 'Experienced developing with Java, Gradle, Spring and/or Guice, and n-tier web app design patterns ', 'And Of Course, Perks! ', 'React experience is a plus ', 'Actively contribute to the adoption of strong software architecture, software development lifecycle best practices, and new technologies. Be a leader within your team and the organization. ', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Science, Programming, or Engineering-related field 5+ years experience building highly-scalable consumer-facing applications (e-commerce preferred) Experience developing thoroughly tested code Experience mentoring/coaching engineers and coordinating with developers from other teams or 3rd party vendors. Understanding of and ability to converse in design patterns Experienced developing with Java, Gradle, Spring and/or Guice, and n-tier web app design patterns Familiarity with AWS EC2, SNS, SQS Awareness of Agile/Scrum, or equivalent SDLC methodologies Knowledge of or experience with developing distributed systems Familiarity with eventually consistent databases (Cassandra/MongoDB/CouchDB) React experience is a plus ', 'Grubhub is seeking an experienced software engineer to join our dynamic Corporate Initiative team. Our work is growing the business into new areas of opportunity, spearheading service creation, and expansion across all the core areas of the platform. Day-to-day activities involve coding against stories in a sprint, verifying tests, and getting peer reviews prior to having the code accepted. The work will be distributed across many of the platform systems within Grubhub, to bring holistic technology releases to support large expansions in the business offerings. As a Continuous Delivery organization, releases to production are frequent, avoiding classic challenges of meeting/discussion/planning fatigue and roll-back difficulties that comes with heavy, infrequent production releases. ', 'Better Benefits. Get quality insurance, flex-spending accounts, retirement options and commuter perks. \xa0 ', 'Some Challenges You Will Tackle ', 'You Should Have ', 'Understanding of and ability to converse in design patterns ', 'Take technical responsibility for a family of systems - build new services and functionality, manage technical debt, be on the lookout for opportunities for platform improvement, and work with system engineers to increase the scale our production systems will operate at while performing at their peak ', 'Work with product, tech, and business leaders to determine the roadmap and deliverables for the enterprise order taking suite of services. ', 'Here at Grubhub we’ve been dedicated to giving diners the most convenient way to order food from their favorite restaurants (whether that’s a late night Chalupa from Taco Bell or a salad for lunch from a local restaurant the day after they enjoyed said late night Chalupa).While we are food-obsessed, we are also customer-obsessed. We look to constantly innovate our technology so our diners’ food experience is memorable, restaurant owners get more business and individuals across the country looking for work can deliver the food from the restaurant to the diner flawlessly. We take great pride in knowing that we are a part of 22.6 million diners food ordering experience and we feature over 300,000 restaurants in 3,200 US cities across our suite of apps (Grubhub, LevelUp, Seamless, Tapingo, AllMenus and MenuPages). ', 'Flexible PTO. It’s true, no strings attached and all the time you need to recharge. PTO. It’s true, we provide you a generous amount of time to recharge. Better Benefits. Get quality insurance, flex-spending accounts, retirement options and commuter perks. \xa0 Free Food. Kitchens are stocked and free Grubhub each week. Casual Culture. Catch rays on the rooftop or get comfy on a couch and get to know your coworkers — because work, should be a place you want to be. ', 'Familiarity with AWS EC2, SNS, SQS ', 'Flexible PTO. ', '\xa0 ', 'Awareness of Agile/Scrum, or equivalent SDLC methodologies ', 'Knowledge of or experience with developing distributed systems ', 'PTO. You will be working with a group of world-class engineers to build breakthrough features that our customers will love, adopt and use while keeping our trusted platform stable and scalable. The software engineer role at Salesforce encompasses architecture, design, implementation, and testing to ensure we build products right and release them with high quality. ', ' From Marketing Cloud to Service Cloud, Platform to IoT, Einstein Platform, Security and everything in between we have many opportunities available across various applications and platforms. ', ' We are looking for the best and brightest new college graduates to join our team of world class, highly motivated software engineers and cloud computing experts. Familiarity with AWS a big plus5+ years of professional software development experience. Experience with two or more aspects of our tech stack (Python, Kotlin, Javascript/TypeScript, Postgres, AWS, GraphQL, DataDog, Docker, Kubernetes). Familiar with at least one backend framework like Django, Rails, Spring, or similar. Capacity to work in high growth, fast-paced environments, and can adapt to change. You have an expert understanding of industry best practices and standards. You have excellent communication and teamwork skills. You have acute attention to detail and dedication to quality. Experience with at least one database engine (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Cassandra, etc.) Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases ', 'Defend the integrity of the codebase, never compromising on code quality.', ' Experience integrating e-commerce software with ERP systems Enjoy tech talks, katas, lunch and learns, and geeking over programming languages, architecture, category theory, or whatever engineering topic you are passionate about. Attend meetups, conferences, and participate in the software engineering community. Contribute to open-source projects. Experience migrating a monolithic system to an ecosystem of microservices. Have tried Test-Driven Development (TDD). Experience with or knowledge of DDD, CQRS, and Event Sourcing. Enjoy talking to product, design, and business stakeholders to understand the problem space better. You worked on a system that had to deal with internationalization and localization. ', 'Experience integrating e-commerce software with ERP systems', 'Promote constant refactoring while developing features or touching existing code to keep the codebase as clean as possible.', 'Experience with at least one database engine (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Cassandra, etc.)', 'Passionate about technology, new ideas, and always willing to learn new things.', 'Familiar with at least one backend framework like Django, Rails, Spring, or similar.']

['', 'Job Description:', 'Protocol-level knowledge of programming (OSI 2, 3, 4)\xa0.', 'Experience with network programming, Windows Services & Drivers, and Linux Drivers & Daemons\xa0', 'Flexible “Personal Time Off (PTO)” plan and 10+ paid holiday days per year', 'Responsibilities:', 'One of our client is looking to hire a "Senior C++ Software Engineer" in Baltimore, Maryland. Please find the job details below-', 'Benefits:', 'Expert-level understanding of authorization and authentication systems in computing environments\xa0.', 'As a Sr. Software Engineer, you will be responsible for designing and developing Services/Daemons/Drivers that enable information gathering and monitoring of system and network events. This work includes the design, development, and Tier 3 support across a variety of platforms and operating systems. The position is highly technical requiring comprehensive, knowledge of operating systems, Active Directory, WMI, LDAP and protocol level network programming. Our ideal candidate will have a strong work ethic, fantastic attitude and be comfortable addressing new challenges on a daily basis. We provide significant flexibility and autonomy to team members, have high expectations and expect everyone to contribute meaningfully to our broader collective goals.', 'Write exceptional code in either C/C++ or C# to meet the Product team’s requirements, including the development of all automated unit tests.\xa0', 'Nice to haves:', 'Adept at learning and applying new technologies Excellent communication skills', 'Competitive salary\xa0', 'Company Description:', 'General Requirements:', 'Full range of benefits, including 401(k) and medical, dental & vision coverage\xa0', 'Design applications as part of a multi-discipline team for Cyber, Insurance, and Finance offerings.\xa0', '10-15 years of experience developing similar Services/Daemons on Windows, MacOS, or Linux\xa0', 'Set and manage expectations with senior stakeholders, team members, and company management', 'Conduct root cause analyses of performance and instability of systems and designs with respect to accuracy and performance.\xa0', 'We apply artificial intelligence to solve complex, real-world problems at scale. Our Human+AI operating system, our:OS™, blends capabilities ranging from data handling, analytics, and reporting to advanced algorithms, simulations, and machine learning, enabling decisions that are just-in-time, just-in-place, and just-in-context.', 'Incentive stock options\xa0', 'A positive attitude around learning new skills and capabilities.', 'Technical team leadership skills with the ability to prioritize and execute in a methodical and disciplined manner\xa0.', 'Communication and collaboration skills for participating in & shaping the architecture and design of systems.', 'You will be working with functionally diverse teams and individuals to collaboratively design, develop, support, and maintain software applications.\xa0']

['', 'Highly developed understanding of networking protocols, such as: TCP-IP, SSL/TLS, LDAP/S, IPsec, DNS', 'Qualifications:', 'A DevSecOps Engineer will work closely with architecture peers across all of Information Technology and Cybersecurity to ensure that wireless projects and new initiatives are secured in accordance with audit and policy requirements. This role will represent Information Security principles and requirements, maintain security of all platforms, provide proactive analysis, testing, and active monitoring of environments, develop strategies for risk mitigation, and cooperatively work with other teams to develop strategies for critical event response and recovery.', 'Proactive integration of security into the development process.', 'Pay: All salaries vary', "The DevOps Engineer will be responsible for\xa0building and managing the automation process for the continuous deployment of 5G Network functions. job_title: Architect/Lead Software Engineer, Autonomous Vehicles Platform
job_text: ['', ' BS, MS in CS/CE/EE with 5-7 years in a related field or equivalent experience.  Excellent C/C++ programming skills  Strong Linux kernel, low level system software experience  Strong debugging skills from application to kernel level  Ability and flexibility to work and communicate effectively in a multi-national, multi-time-zone corporate environment  Self-motivated and good teammate  Embedded system, SW/HW cross-domain knowledge  Device driver knowledge is a major plus  Experience in software architecture design  Master of software debugging tools: software debuggers, analyzers, trace loggers ', ' Strong debugging skills from application to kernel level ', ' Self-motivated and good teammate ', ' Work towards enabling the best user experience by analyzing complex technical issues and independently drive resolution across multiple teams ', ' Design and implement simulation-based automotive platform to accelerate development of Autonomous Vehicle software, including driver implementation/improvements, system integration, performance/power optimization, stress/stability/compliance test ', ' BS, MS in CS/CE/EE with 5-7 years in a related field or equivalent experience. ', ' Background in QNX RTOS and debug tools ', ' Familiarity with cloud-based workflows is a plus ', ' Lead development of simulation platform to match the actual car platform on road!  Design and implement simulation-based automotive platform to accelerate development of Autonomous Vehicle software, including driver implementation/improvements, system integration, performance/power optimization, stress/stability/compliance test  Collaborate across software, hardware, and product management teams to define, plan and deliver on simulation-first development workflows, following all the way through the development process from design, development, hardware bringup to productization  Drive the reliability of the software solution which includes RADAR, LiDAR, Camera sensors, egomotion modeling, processing and fusion  Work towards enabling the best user experience by analyzing complex technical issues and independently drive resolution across multiple teams  Work in an environment which involves embedded computing using Hypervisor, Linux, QNX RTOS as well as distributed computing using Linux and container  Provide technical leadership and career mentorship to the team ', ' Drive the reliability of the software solution which includes RADAR, LiDAR, Camera sensors, egomotion modeling, processing and fusion ', ' Collaborate across software, hardware, and product management teams to define, plan and deliver on simulation-first development workflows, following all the way through the development process from design, development, hardware bringup to productization ', ' Lead development of simulation platform to match the actual car platform on road! ', ' Prior experience in Automotive field ', ' Excellent C/C++ programming skills ', ' Master of software debugging tools: software debuggers, analyzers, trace loggers ', 'What We Need To See', 'Ways To Stand Out From The Crowd', ' Worked with CAN and tools, RADAR, LiDAR is a plus ', ' Strong Linux kernel, low level system software experience ', ' Experience with AUTOSAR SW and development tools ', ' Work in an environment which involves embedded computing using Hypervisor, Linux, QNX RTOS as well as distributed computing using Linux and container ', ' Provide technical leadership and career mentorship to the team ', ' Embedded system, SW/HW cross-domain knowledge ', ' Ability and flexibility to work and communicate effectively in a multi-national, multi-time-zone corporate environment ', ' Experience in software architecture design ', ' Prior experience in Automotive field  Background in QNX RTOS and debug tools  Worked with CAN and tools, RADAR, LiDAR is a plus  Experience with AUTOSAR SW and development tools  Familiarity with cloud-based workflows is a plus ', ' Device driver knowledge is a major plus ', "What You'll Be Doing"]

We are responsible for the recommendations you see under Search, Explore, Trends, Topics, and the Home Timeline. The unrivaled challenges that we face at Twitter are both the data scale and the real-time nature of the product. How do you find the most meaningful content among hundreds of millions of new tweets for hundreds of millions of users every day at Twitter? We build large scale personalized recommendation engines utilizing different kinds of signals such as social network, user activity, and geolocation. The Search and Recommendations teams job is to connect our users to the conversations and people that are relevant to them.Search and Recommendations build products to support this mission. We are responsible for the recommendations you see under Search, Explore, Trends, Topics, and the Home Timeline. The unrivaled challenges that we face at Twitter are both the data scale and the real-time nature of the product. How do you find the most meaningful content among hundreds of millions of new tweets for hundreds of millions of users every day at Twitter? We build large scale personalized recommendation engines utilizing different kinds of signals such as social network, user activity, and geolocation.
